23a5(rgyud 'grel): ta band+ha b+hA Sha bud+d+ha sang? gI ti birbe yaMstu no mi badzra bA tse bAM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+hU pa me g+ha spha ra Na pU dza karme ka ra ka ra/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pushpa pra sa ra spha ra Na pU dza karme ki ri ki ri/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta A lo ka dzwa la spha ra Na pU dza karme ka ra ka ra/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta gan d+ha sa mu
23a6(rgyud 'grel): dra spha ra Na pU dza karme ku ru ku ru /zhes bya bas/ sems dpa' bcu drug dang 'dra ba'i rig ma las kyi phyag rgya dang ldan pa rnams kyis mchod par bya'o/ /de'i phyag rgya ni 'di rnams yin te/ rdo rje bsdams pa dkur bzhag ste/ /bcing ba gnyis su byas pa yi/ /rdo rje khu tshung?
23a7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyis ni/ /bsgyings bcas gsor ba gnyis ka yis/ /lcags kyu 'dzin ltar gnas pa dang/ /mda''phang ba yi tshul dang ni/ /legs so zhes pa snying gar bzhag /dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje gnyis/ /snying gar nyi ma brtan par bya/ /g.yon pa la ni gru mo gzugs/ /de
23b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin kha phyogs bskor bar bya/ /g.yas pa yis ni g.yon par dbye/ /snying gar g.yon pa ral gri mdung/ /mgal me 'khor lo bskor ba dang/ /rdo rje gnyis ka kha nas dbyung/ /rdo rje gar bskor bkrol ba yi/ /thal mo 'gram pa spyi bor gzhag /go cha mthe'u chung mche ba dang/ /khu
23b2(rgyud 'grel): tshur gnyis ni mnan pa'o/ /de nas phyag bzhi byas la/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' i phyag rgya chen por gnas te/ oM badzra At+ma ko haM zhes bya ba 'dis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjer bdag nyid bsgom mo/ /de nas oM swa b+ha ba bi shud d+ho hi zhes
23b3(rgyud 'grel): bya bas rang bzhin gyis dag par mos par byas la/ oM sarba sa mo haM zhes bya bas bdag med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyis rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i lha thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid du bsam par bya'o/ /de nas dpal rdo rje sems dpa' i yi ge brgya pa rdo rje'i tshig gam yid kyis bzlas
23b4(rgyud 'grel): la/ thams cad bdag yin no zhes bsgoms la/ lha thams cad kyi zhal nas sngags kyi sgra 'byung bar bsam zhing/ bzlas pa la brtson par byas na de lta bus ni/ thams cad kyis bzlas par 'gyur ro/ /ji srid skye bar ma gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bsgoms la/ skyo bar gyur na yang mtshan
23b5(rgyud 'grel): brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod la/ mchod yon phul te/ mchod par phyag bzhi byas nas phyag rgya gang dang gang nas byung ba de dang de nyid las bkrol la/ rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya badzra mu:zhes bya ba dang dgrol bar bya'o/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i gnas kyi
23b6(rgyud 'grel): des pa ni bshad zin to/ /mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i gnas ni/ rdo rje sems dpa' dang/ rdo rje rin chen dang/ rdo rje chos dang/ rdo rje las kyi gnas nyid yin no/ /rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas ni spyi gtsug yin no/ /rdo rje rin chen gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya snying gnas byung ba/
23b7(rgyud 'grel): ? gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas su gnas pa dang/ oM badzra ratna a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes bya bas phyag rgya thams cad dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de'i rjes la sarba mu twaM me tri ku ru ba ra ka ba tse na baM zhes bya ba dang/ mdzub mo gnyis kyis snga ma bzhin du go cha gos la/ tha mar mnyam pa'i
24a1(rgyud 'grel): thal mos snga ma bzhin du mnyes par byas la/ rdo rje sems dpa' dang yi ge brgya pa bzlas nas/ mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyi phyir/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngos te/ bdag gis cho ga mtshang ba gang dag bgyis pa de bzod par mdzod cig ces
24a2(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba btab la/ mchod yon bul nas/ oM kri to b+ha sarba satwA rthAM sid+d+hi maM dat+tpa ya thA nu ga gats+tsha twi bud+d+ha bi Sha yaM/ bu na rA ga ma na ya tsa zhes bya bas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams gshegs pa'i phyir bskul bar bya zhing/ oM badzra satwa mu:zhes bya ba'i snying po
24a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dis/ rdo rje sems dpa' i phyag rgya gyen du dgrol bar bya'o/ /de ltar na thams cad kyang gshegs su gsol bar 'gyur ro/ /ji lta ba bzhin du sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i tshogs dang bcas pa rnams ni/ de bzhin du yid kyis legs pa'i sbyor bas rang gi lus la bcug la/ rdo
24a4(rgyud 'grel): rje bsrung ba dang/ rdo rje gnod sbyin dang/ rdo rje khu tshur dang/ rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis bdag nyid bsrung ba byas nas langs te/ dkyil 'khor gyi las dang/ glegs bam bklag pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /de ltar nyin re re zhing thun bzhir zla ba gcig gam/ zla ba drug gam/ lo
24a5(rgyud 'grel): gcig gam/ dus ji srid kyi lha rnams las snang ba thob par gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bya'o/ /yang na snga ma bzhin du rnal 'byor chen po dang/ mchod pa la sogs pa byas la/ de nyid kyis ni rdo rje gzung/ /chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya/ /dam tshig gis ni phyag rgya cher/ /byin gyis brlab
24a6(rgyud 'grel): nas snying po bzla/ /de nas badzra At+ma ko la sogs pa'i snying po gsum bzlas la/ de'i don gsum po rnam par bsgoms nas/ phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor la bsrungs pa'i sngags lnga pos rang gi snying gar rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor sprul la/ sngar bshad pa'i snying pos dpal rnam
24a7(rgyud 'grel): par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bkod de/ nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sbyor bas zhugs la/ badzra At+ma ko la sogs pa'i sngags kyis de rnams dang gcig tu gyur bar byas la/ badzra d+hA tu ra haM swa yang zhes bya bas/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por bdag nyid
24b1(rgyud 'grel): nges par byas te/ thams cad kyang bdag nyid kho na yin no zhes bsgoms la/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' i snying po 'am/ sngags zlos? shing lha thams cad kyi zhal nas kyang sngags kyi sgra 'byung ba der yang bsam par bya'o/ /phyogs de lta bu la sogs pas kyang/ rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa 'grub par
24b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /ngal zhing dub na mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bstod pa dang/ mchod pa phyag bzhi byas la thun bzhi'i tha? mar yang mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bstong pa sngon du 'gro ba'i cho ga byas la/ gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gsang sngags rnams ni/ rnal 'byor
24b3(rgyud 'grel): chen pos bsgrub par bya ba yin pas/ dkyil 'khor bsgom par mi nus pa gang yin pa des ni rnal 'byor chen po byas la/ thams cad kyi sngags re re zhing bzlas brjod 'bum 'bum byas la/ badzre? t+tiSh+Tha zhes lan 'bum bzlas la/ rdo rje slong ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod
24b4(rgyud 'grel): byas na grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas brtsams te bum pa la sogs pa de nam mkha' la 'jog par nus par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje mdzub sor gnyis legs par/ /rab mnyam gzhag pas bsnyams nas ni/ /shi ba thams cad slong ba ste/ /rdo rje slong ba zhes bya'o/ /badzra a be sha a zhes bya ba yang
24b5(rgyud 'grel): bzlas brjod 'bum byas la/ rdo rje dril bu mar la byugs te/ bsreg lugs stong gis mngon par sbyangs la/ rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgyas bzung la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na de 'grub par 'gyur ba lag na thogs pa thams cad 'bebs par 'gyur ro/ /sngon du bsnyen pa'i
24b6(rgyud 'grel): cho ga'o/ /de ltar sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas/ gtsug lag khang ngam? /kun dga' ra ba 'am /yul lam /grong khyed gyi shar ngam/ byang gi phyogs kyi char dam/ gang du yid dang mthun pa der dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o/ /der shin tu mnyam zhing snum la shar du gzhol ba/ tshad
24b7(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan zhing tsha sgo can ma yin pa'i sa'i char rgyal pos ni khru brgya 'am lnga bcu'o/ /blon po dang/ blon po chen pos ni/ khru lnga bcu 'am nyi shu rtsa lnga'o/ /tshong dpon nam ded dpon gyis ni khru nyi shu 'am de'i phyed do/ /sgrub pa pos ni khru bcu gnyis sam drug pa bya'o/ /de la dang po kho nar mngon par
25a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su/ mi rus kyi phye ma khrag dang dug dang bcas pa dang/ mngon spyod kyi sbyin sreg gi cho gas dkyil 'khor gyi bgegs bzlog la/ bdag dang slob ma dang sa bdag la sogs pa'i zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas sa sbyang du gzhug
25a2(rgyud 'grel): par bya ste/ 'dom gang cam la/ lkog ma 'am/ lte ba 'am/ pus mo nub pa tsam du 'og tu brkos la/ spos chu dri zhim pos sbrus pa'i sas bkang la/ rdo rje rtse mo yongs su bzlas pa'i spos chus chag chag btab ste/ 'thas par bcags la shin tu mnyam par byas pa khang pa brtsegs
25a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i nang du chud pa/ rta babs bzhis mdzes par byas pa/ sgo bzhi dang skar khung gis yongs su bskor ba/ tha mar dril bu legs par btags pa'i rgyal mtshan dang/ bla res mchod pa sna tshogs bres pa/ sangs rgyas rin po che la sogs pa'i ras ris dang sku gzugs kyi nye bar
25a4(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa/ grwa bzhir spos snod bzhag la/ me tog dang/ mar me dang gos la sogs pas nye bar mdzes par byas la dris byugs te/ rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i spos chus yongs su bsangs la/ rdo rje sems dpa' i yi ge brgya pa lan bdun bzlas par bya'o/ /sa sbyang ba
25a5(rgyud 'grel): dang yongs su gzung ba'i cho ga'o// //de nas bdag nyid khrus byas shing lus dris byugs la/ ji snyed pa'i gos dang rgyan gdags shing/ shin tu dmar ba'i gos bgos la/ me tog gi phreng ba gdags shing gdong dri zhi par byas la/ yar gyi de'i chos brgyad nas
25a6(rgyud 'grel): brtsams te/ tshes bcu 'am/ tshes bcu gsum mam/ bcu bzhi nas brtsams te/ bco lnga'i bar du dkyil 'khor gyi las bya'o/ /gnyug mar gnas pa'i sa'i char ni phyag bdar dang bskyang nul byas la/ de bzhin du lag pas deg par byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa' bzla
25a7(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o/ /de nas cho ga thams cad spyad par bya'o/ /yang tshes bco lnga'i snga dro nas brtsams te bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i zhag ni/ slob dpon dang slob ma dang bcas pas bsdung? bar gnas par bya'o/ /de la de zhig dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su 'dug la/ bdag bsrung ba dang
25b1(rgyud 'grel): bgegs gzhom pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje'i 'khor los dkyil 'khor sprul la/ phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba dang sdom pa gzung la/ rnal 'byor chen po dang khang pa brtsegs pa dang gdan la sogs pa bskyed la/ sems dpa' i skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste/ bdag
25b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid spro ba bskyed par bya'o/ /deng dus bdag tshe 'bras bu yod/ /bdag gi gson pa'ang 'bras bur bcas/ /lha dang dam tshig gis mnyam par/ /gyur par bdag ni som nyi med/ /byang chub sems dang sems gcig las/ /mi ldog par ni bdag 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
25b3(rgyud 'grel): su ni/ /deng bdag skye bar the tshom med/ /deng bdag nyi ma dam pa ste/ /bdag gi mchod sbyin bla na med/ /sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pas/ /deng bdag 'dus pa mchog yin no/ /de nas yan lag thams cad kyis phyag byas te/ spos snod lag tu thogs te/ sangs rgyas thams
25b4(rgyud 'grel): cad spyan drang bar bya'o/ /ma lus phyogs na bzhugs pa yin/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyis pa yis/ /rdo rje can gyis dkyil 'khor bri/ /deng 'dir sangs rgyas kun gshegs te/ /dngos grub 'di ni stsal du gsol zhes brjod la/ dang po'i
25b5(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba dang/ dkyil 'khor gyi mchog dang/ las kyi rgyal po mchog rnam par bsgoms nas/ yang sgo dbye ba sngon du 'gro ba nas/ rdo rje sems dpa' i gnas su dpal rdo rje sems dpa' i phyag rgya chen pos gnas pa'i ? byas nas/ de'i sngags zlos pa la brtson pa'i rnal 'byor pa la/
25b6(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa'i grogs mchog de bzhin gshegs pa'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir/ mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /de nas langs la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs la phyag byas la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis nam mkha' i
25b7(rgyud 'grel): khams gang bar mngon sum du bsams la/ bdag ni rang nyid rdo rje can/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag rang nyid/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas rgyal po che/ /stobs chen rdo rje can bdag yin/ /bdag ni rnal 'byor dbang phyug rgyal/ /phyag na rdo rje brtan bdag yin/ /bdag po rdo rje chen po bdag/ byin
26a1(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlabs par mi 'dor ro/ /de nas badzra driSh+Ti ma Ta zhes bya ba mig gnyis su bkod la/ yi ge a las rkang mthil gnyis su sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed la rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te/ badzra satwa ut+tiSh+Tha zhes bya bas dkyil 'khor de nam mkha' i
26a2(rgyud 'grel): steng du gdeg go/ de nas rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya des bdag nyid lan cig byin gyis brlabs la/ yang phyag rgya chen po bcings te/ phyag rgya la gnas de bzhin langs/ /kun tu rnam par bltas nas ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' zhes brjod nas/ bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis yongs su
26a3(rgyud 'grel): bskor/ /rdo rje lta bas phyogs dang mtshams dang/ dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang/ ra ba dang dra ba byas nas/ rkang mthil nas yongs su bzung ste/ sa gzhi nas ri rab kyi rtse mo'i bar du rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byas la/ yang bgegs gzhom pa la sogs pa byas nas/ sngags dang phyag
26a4(rgyud 'grel): rgya 'di dang ldan pas/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dgug par bya'o/ /oM badzra maN+Da la hUM dza:rdo rje khu tshur gnyis mdzub mo dang mthe bong rdo rjer bya ba ni/ dkyil 'khor thams cad 'gugs pa yin no/ /rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang/ ma hA badzra tsakra a d+hi tiSh+Tha sid+d+hya hUM zhes bya ba 'dis
26a5(rgyud 'grel): yang dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /rdo rje rgyu'i las kyi phyag rgya nyid 'di'i phyag rgya yin no/ /de nas ser ldeng las byas pa'i rdo rje'i phur bu/ dbus dang grwa bzhir rdo rjes brdung bar bya ste/ oM badzra kI la ya sarba big+haM band+ha hUM zhes bya ba'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ g.yon pa'i rdo
26a6(rgyud 'grel): rje khu tshur gyis gzung ste/ rdo rje rtsa lnga pa blangs la/ hUM zlos shing de dang dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar phur bu lnga bskyed la/ lag pa g.yas par rdo rje rtse gsum par byas pas brdung zhing 'di skad ces bzlas par bya'o/ /oM g+ha:g+ha:g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya sarba duSh+TaM phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya sa da pA
26a7(rgyud 'grel): paM phaT/ badzra kI la ya/ badzra d+ha ro Adz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i bsang chu'i bum pa dkyil 'khor gyi sgor bzhag la/ rdo rje khu tshur gyi las kyi phyag rgyas srung ba thams cad brtan par byas la/ rdo rje go chas go bskon par bya ste/ de yang bcing ba'i cho
26b1(rgyud 'grel): ga sbyor ba la/ /rdo rje khu tshur rab tu brtag/ rdo rje go chas go bskon pas/ dkyil 'khor kun nas bsrungs par bya/ /zhes gsungs pa yin no/ /yang dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug la/ dkyil 'khor yongs su brtag ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi gnas dris nye bar byugs la/ de bzhin gshegs
26b2(rgyud 'grel): pa lnga'i gnas su tsandan dang gur gum la sogs pa'i lde gus dkyil 'khor grwa bzhi par byas la/ lhag ma rnams ni zlum por bya zhes rang rang gi sngags kyang las bdun bdun du bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas nam mkha' i phyogs nas da bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dgug pa dang/
26b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhug pa dang/ bcing ba dang mnyes pa la sogs pa byas la rang gi snying gar bcug ste/ mchod pa lnga pos legs par mchod do/ /de nas dbang bskur ba'i bum pa 'bru la sogs pa thams cad dang ldan par chu nyung zad gcig blugs la/ rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bzlas
26b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mchod yon phul te/ spos chu dang me tog kyang bcug la spos kyis bdugs te/ cho ga bzhin du gnas par bya'o/ /nyin zhag gnyis pa la thun gsum du yang dag par bzla bar bya zhing/ de nas dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /yang dkyil 'khor du bzlas la/ 'og nas bshad pa'i mtshan
26b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid bdag nyid chen pos shes par byas la? rdo rje sems dpa' spyan sngar gzhag par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin dang/ rdo rje sems dpa' dang/ sangs rgyas spyan la re re zhing mar la sogs pa'i sreg lugs dbul bar bya'o/ /lhag par gnas pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o// //
26b6(rgyud 'grel): de nas phyi rol tu gtor ma byin la/ nye reg byas nas/ mchod brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod de/ me tog la sogs pa dang sgeg mo la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa mchod la/ phyag byas nas slob ma lhag par gnas par bya'o/ /de la re shig dang bor khrus legs par bya'o/ /gos
26b7(rgyud 'grel): gtsang ma bgo zhing/ lag na me tog thogs pa'i slob mas slob dpon la phyag byas la/ 'di skad smrar gzhug go/ dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub sems dpa' tshul bstan pa/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig de
27a1(rgyud 'grel): nyid stsal du gsol/ /byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /skyabs gsum dag ni bdag la gsol/ /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon po bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal/ /de nas sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byed du gzhug ste/
27a2(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa rnams ni legs par bsdus nas ni/ /shin tu bsam pa bzang po ldan pas nyon/ /brjed ngas blo la rdo rje sems sogs pa'i/ /bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis byin mi rlob/ /dbang med bdag gis mi dge bgyis pa dang/ /rjes su yi rang yang na bgyid stsal gang/ /de dag thams
27a3(rgyud 'grel): cad byang chub mchog gi ni/ /spyan sngar da ltar ma lus so sor bshags/ /bde gshegs sras kyi tshogs gnyis zab pa dang/ /rgya ches 'gro ba ma lus pa yi don/ /sgrub par byed dang de las gzhan la'ang/ /rtag tu bdag ni rjes su yi rang ngo/ /thugs rjes khyab pa'i thugs dang
27a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan gyur cing/ /blo gros sdig bral gti mug tshogs kun bcom/ /ma lus rigs kyi pad+ma'i nang zhugs pa/ /bde bar gshegs pa rnams la skyabs su mchi/ /blo mchog rnams kyi kun dga' ra ba ste/ /dman pas 'jigs pa rnams kyi rgyal byed tshal/ /srid pa'i 'byor pa zil
27a5(rgyud 'grel): gyis gnon pa'i mchog/ gsung mchog chos la bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /'dod chags la sogs sbrul gyi dug bcom zhing/ /blo gros rnam rgyas thugs rje cher ldan pa'i/ /brtul zhugs bzang po'i tshogs la skyabs mchi zhing/ /srid dang bral ba rnams la bdag phyag 'tshal/
27a6(rgyud 'grel): rgya yi rjes la bdag po'i yul bdag nyid/ /'bras bu'i stobs kyi dgra las rgyal gyur pa/ /snying rje'i rtsab zug cing yang dag rtogs/ /mnyam med byang chub rnam par gzung bar bgyi/ /sems can rnams ni yongs su smin pa 'am/ /yang na yongs su bskyang bar bya phyir ngam//
27a7(rgyud 'grel): rang gi sems ni dag par bya ba'i phyir/ /'di dag thams cad rtsa sogs bzhin du btang/ /de bzhin tshul khrims bzod dang brtson 'grus dang/ /bsam gtan shes rab bla na med pa ni/ /bdag dang gzhan rnams dag par bya ba'i phyir/ /skad cig re re zhing yang bsgom par bgyi/ /bde
27b1(rgyud 'grel): bar gshegs pa'i sngags la mkhas pa yis/ /chos rgyal rtag tu lhun gyis grub pa ni/ /'gro ba 'di yis thob par bya ba'i phyir/ /khyad 'phags gnas la bdag ni gnas par bgyi/ /zhes lan gsum brjod do/ /bdag gis de skad ces brjod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ bdag gi
27b2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad yongs su gtang bar bgyi'o/ /bdag gi sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems bskyed par bgyi'o/ /bdag gis sems can thams cad theg pa thams cad dang/ thabs kyi bye brag thams cad kyi brtul nas/ mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings la rab tu
27b3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad yongs su gtang bar bgyi'o/ /bdag gi sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems bskyed par bgyi'o/ /bdag gis sems can thams cad theg pa thams cad dang/ thabs kyi bye brag thams cad kyi brtul nas/ mi gnas pa'i mya ngan ldas 'das pa'i dbyings la rab tu
27b4(rgyud 'grel): gzhag par bgyi'o?/ /bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur kyang/ sems can 'ga' yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa med do zhes sems bskyed par bgyi'o/ /bdag gis chos thams cad skye ba med pa nyid du rjes su rtogs par bya'o//
27b5(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis ma 'ongs pa'i sems dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sems kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab par bgyi'o/ /bdag gis theg pa gcig gi tshul du gnas par yang rtogs par bgyi'o/ /bdag gis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la gnas
27b6(rgyud 'grel): pa so sor rtogs par bya ba'i phyir bslab par bgyi'o/ /bdag gis stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyis chos ma 'dres pa rnams so sor rtogs par bya ba'i phyir mngon par brtson par bgyi'o/ /de bzhin du bdag gis sangs rgyas
27b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi chos tshad med pa ma lus pa'i bar la mngon par gnas par bya ba'i phyir bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /'di nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub chen por sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
27b8(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi bka' bzhin byed pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras kyi thu bo ste/ 'di nyid ni bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po'o/ /de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis ji lta bu bzhin du yang dag par rdzogs par bya ba'i stobs kyis bdag sems bskyed pa 'di la gnas pas
28a1(rgyud 'grel): kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa zhes bya ba sgo mdza' yas pa la gnas pa mdza' med par gyur pa rdzogs par byas/ gdul bya'i 'gro ba'i tshogs ma lus pa rnams la spyod pa'i rab tu dbye ba'i sgo mang po bstan pas yang dag par mgu bar bya ba dang/ yang dag
28a2(rgyud 'grel): par dga' bar bya ba dang/ yang dag par gzengs bstod pa la nges par sbyar bar bgyi'o/ /de nas sa ma ya a zhes bzlas pas slob ma'i snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la/ de'i steng du rdo rje rtse lnga pa de la bzhag la/ su ra ta sa ma ya stwaM ho/ badzra sid+d+hya ya thA su khaM zhes
28a3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i snying gar bzlas la/ spyi bor spos chus brlan pa'i lag pa bzhag ste/ rdo rje sems dpa' bzlas shing /rdo rje bsam par bya'o/ /dpral bar yi ge traM las rin po che/ lkog mar yi ge h+rI:las pad+ma/ spyi bor kaM las sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la/ badzra satwa/ badzra ratna/ badzra d+harma/
28a4(rgyud 'grel): badzra karma zhes zlos shing rang gi snying ga la sogs par byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje dris de rnams kyi lag par dri sbyin par bya ste/ me tog gis me tog go/ bdug pas bdug spos dbul lo/ /mar mes mar me'i snang ba bya'o/ /de nas u dum ba ra dang/ a shwad tha la
28a5(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i so shing sor bcu gnyis pa rtse mor me tog bcings pa/ rdo rje bzhad pa bzlas la sbyin par bya'o/ /des kyang shar ram byang du bltas te rtse mo nyid nas bca' bar bya'o/ /de nas ku sha sar pa la rdo rje rnon po dang/ rdo rje sems dpa' yongs su bzlas pa byin nas/ 'dis
28a6(rgyud 'grel): ni gdan du gding shing 'dis ni sngas su bgyis la nyol cig ces bsngo'o/ /de nas dpung pa g.yon par ni/ /rdo rje bsrung bas bzlas pa yis/ /bsrung skud mdud pa gsum ldan pa'i/ /bdag nyid kyis ni legs par bcing/ /de nas zab cing rgya che ba'i chos ci nus par bstan pas/
28a7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la gzengs bstod pa byas nas/ bzhin bzangs dag 'ongs shig/ nang par dkyil 'khor chen po mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bsgo ba lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o// //de nas nyi ma shar kar dkyil 'khor de de bzhin du steng du nam mkha' la gzhag la ?
28b1(rgyud 'grel): gdab par bya'o/ /de la dang por re zhig chon rtsi sngon po dang/ ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ ljang gu dang/ dkar po dri zhim pos bsgos pas srad bu so sor kha dog so sor bsgyur la/ go rims 'di nyid kyis bzhag nas/ de la hUM traM h+rI:a oM zhes bya ba'i rang rang gi sa bon las mi bskyod pa la
28b2(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa srad bu la bkod de/ dI pata driSh+Ti aM ku sha dza:zhes bya ba mig gnyis su bkod la/ rab tu g.yo zhing 'bar ba'i mig/ mig gi rdzi ma 'dren pa ni/ /zhes bya ba'i 'bar ba'i lta bas/ mi bskyod pa la sogs pa la bskul zhing/ bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor chen po'i thig gdab bar
28b3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i phyir/ rdo rje'i thig bdag la stsol cig ces bya bas kyang bskul bar bya'o/ /de nas rang gi sa bon gyi 'od kyis bskul ba'i mi bskyod pa la sogs pas btang ba'i srang bu 'bar ba'i lcags kyus bkug ste/ rang gi lag na gnas pa la srad bus des gang bar byas la/ a n+yo n+ya a nu ga
28b4(rgyud 'grel): ta sarba d+harmA(rgyud 'grel): pa ra spha ra a nu pra piSh+Ta/ sarba d+harmA:a tyan ta/ a nu pra biSh+Ta /sarba d+harmA oM badzra satwa hUM zhes zlos shing bsgril bar bya'o/ /bsgril nas/ mig g.yas dang g.yon gnyis su ma dang Ta las nyi ma dang zla ba bskyed la/ badzra driSh+Ti maT ces bya bas brtan par byas la/ srad bu de'i dris byugs
28b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gsang la sogs pa'i snod du legs par bzhag la/ dri dang/ me tog dang bdug spos la sogs pas mchod la/ oM badzra sa ma ya sU traM mA ti kra ma hUM zhes bya ba rdo rje bsdams pas bzung ste/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas sems dpa' bcu drug bzlas pa'i dris/
28b6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi gzhi yang byugs la/ phyi rol kun tu me tog gis mdzes par byas nas par snang la bzhugs pa'i rigs thams cad mchod yon phul te/ me tog la sogs pa dang/ sgeg mo la sogs pas thams cad mchod la/ phyag byas te/ mig g.yas dang g.yon du yi ge dza
28b7(rgyud 'grel): ser po bkod la/ nyi ma dang zla ba ser por snang ba bskyed de/ glu dang rol mo la sogs pa dang bcas pas dkyil 'khor brtag par bya'o/ /de la re zhig sngar sngags bzlas pa'i srad bu dri zhim pa tha ma dkar po dang ldan pa/ yid kyis badzra d+hA tu zhes bya ba rdo rje tshig gis bzlas la/ rnam par snang 
29a1(rgyud 'grel): mdzad du gyur par byas nas/ bsgrub pa po'i grogs mchog badzra karma zhes brjod de/ rang gi snying gnas rdo rje las kyi gzugs su sprul par bya'o/ /de nas badzra satwa zhes brjod de/ rdo rje sems dpar bdag nyid bsams la srad bu de g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung la/
29a2(rgyud 'grel): dza zhes bya bas sgrub pa'i grogs mchog rdo rje las kyi gzugs can gyi lag tu srad bu de btang la/ phyogs thams cad mnyam pa nyid du bsgom shing/ shar phyogs su bltas te rdo rje srad bu gdab par bya'o/ /yang slob dpon lhor 'dug la/ byang du bltas te gnyis pa gdab par bya'o//
29a3(rgyud 'grel): de nas me'i phyogs kyi char gnas pa la byang du bltas te phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi shar du thig gdab pa/ /rlung gi phyogs su gnas te lho phyogs su bltas la nub kyi thig gdab bo/ /de nyid du 'dug ste byang gi thig gdab bo/ /yang me'i phyogs su 'dug ste lho phyogs kyi thig gdab
29a4(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /kha khyer gyi thig kyang gdab par bya'o/ /yang me'i mtshams su gnas te rlung gi mtshams kyi bar gyi thig gdab pa dang/ yang bden bral gyi mtshams su gnas te dbang ldan gyi mtshams kyi thig gdab par bya zhing/ slob dpon dang sgrub pa'i grogs mchog skor phyogs
29a5(rgyud 'grel): su 'gro bar bya'o/ /de la re shig srad bu'i sngags ni/ oM badzra sa ma ya sU traM mA ti kram hUM zhes bya ba dang/ dza zhes bya ba gsum gyis sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gis drang bar bya'o/ /de la sgo ni cha brgyad pa'o/ /sgo khyud ni sgo'i tshad kyi phyed do/ /kha khyer phyi'i thams cad dang nang gi kun ni sgo'i
29a6(rgyud 'grel): byed do/ /tshon sna lnga'i sa ni kha khyer gyi phyed kyi ched du bya'o/ /rta babs ni sgo'i sum 'gyur du bya'o/ /nang gi dkyil 'khor ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyed la zur bzhi pa sgo bzhi pa kha khyer gyis yongs su bskor ba/ ka ba brgyad dang ldan par thig btab la/ dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar
29a7(rgyud 'grel): seng ldeng gi phur bu 'og rdo rje rtse gcig ba lta bu la/ steng rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i dbyibs can gyi phur bu la/ rdo rje phur du'i sngags bzlas la rdo rje tho bas brdungs te snga ma bzhin du btab la/ de la brtod pa'i srad bus nang gi dkyil 'khor dang phyi'i rdo rje phreng ba dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsamS
29b1(rgyud 'grel): te g.yas nas bskor ba'i rims kyis gdab par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi tshad kyi nyis 'gyur la/ mdza' bskor khru drug par bya ba ni tshad chung du yin te/ gzhan dag tu ni ji tsam 'tsham par bya'o/ /da ni lung las gsungs pa'i thig gi mtshan nyid brjod par bya ste/ sar ba las ni
29b2(rgyud 'grel): bkal nas kyang/ /tshad dang ldan pa mdzes pa yi/ /thig gis mkhas pa ci nus kyis/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni thig gdab po/ /gru bzhir bgyi zhing sgo bzhi dang/ /rta babs bzhis ni mdzes bgyis la/ /thig bzhi dang ni ldan gyur pa/ /dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan/ /grwa bzhi phyogs ni
29b3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad du/ /sgo khyud kyi ni nang rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen spras par ni/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rol thig gdab bo/ /de yi rim pa'i nang zhugs la/ /'khor lo 'dra bar rdo rje yi/ /thig gis yongs su bskor bya zhing/ /ka ba brgyad kyi mdzes bgyis par/ /phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid dmigs
29b4(rgyud 'grel): la/ shes rab can gyis thig gdab bo/ /shar dang nub dang byang dang lhor/ /thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad/ /nang dang phyi rol gyi kha khyer dang dra ba dang/ dra ba phyed pa dang/ rlung yab dang/ zla ba dang/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor yang bri ba dang/ dkyil 'khor gyi grwa'i mtshams thams cad
29b5(rgyud 'grel): du/ rlung gis bskyod pa'i dril bu btags pa'i bdan sna tshogs btags pa dang/ de'i sgo rnams kyi sgo khyud kyis mtshams rnams su/ /zla ba phyed pa la gnas pa'i rdo rje rin po ches mdzes par bri bar bya'o/ /gal te bgegs byung ba bzlog par 'dod na/ phur bu'i sngags lan 'bum
29b6(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pa'i phur pa dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te gdab par bstan pa dang/ dbyibs 'dra ba'i phur bus bgegs thams cad la phur bus gdab par bya'o/ /de yang ji skad du bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba la btags nas/ shar nas skor phyogs su zlum par bskor
29b7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor thig btab pa de'i phyi rol tu/ khor yug chen po de bzhin du zlum por thig btab la 'od kyi dkyil 'khor der grog mkhar gyi sa la sogs pa la bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan byas la/ brgya byin gyis gzugs brnyan shar phyogs na gnas pa la/ yi ge i las
30a1(rgyud 'grel): brgya byin mdog ser po'o/ /me la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan la yang de bzhin te/ ri? las me lta dmar po/ /oM haM las gshin rje nag po/ kaM las srin po nag po/ baM las chu lha dkar po/ yaM las rlung lha dud ka /phaT las lus ngan po ser po/ suM ba zhes bya ba
30a2(rgyud 'grel): las dbang ldan dkar po bskyed la/ rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas bkug ste/ bcug la bcings te dbang du byas nas phur bus gdab bo/ /shin tu yang yun rings su bgegs med par byed 'dod pas sas dgab par bya'o/ /de ltar yang gal te bgegs byed na/ rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi sbyor
30a3(rgyud 'grel): ba byas la/ 'dod pa'i rgyal pos bkug nas/ lcags kyu la sogs pas kyang dgug pa la sogs pa byas te/ rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcings te rkang pa g.yon pas bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan mnan te/ hUM baM hUM zhes bya ba la sogs pas spel ba'i tshul gyis/ g.yon pa brkyang pa'i
30a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas pas 'dug la/ bgegs byed pa'i sprin la sogs pa la mngon par bltas te/ phyag rgya 'phangs la/ nam mkha' i khams thams cad du spros pas 'od zer 'bar ba kun tu 'khrugs pa'i rdo rje hUM mdzad kyis/ rkang pa bteg cing bsnun pas/ sprin la sogs pa thal bar byas
30a5(rgyud 'grel): par bsams par bya ste/ de lta bus ni bcom pa nyid du 'gyur ro/ /yang na stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon du byas la/ de'i 'og tu a las rnam par snang mdzad du gyur nas/ rgyud las bshad pa'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi skur nges par byas la/ haM las 'phags pa mi
30a6(rgyud 'grel): g.yo ba yid kyi thugs ka nas phyung ste/ badzra haM band+ha zhes yid la brjod la/ phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rim du rlung gi phyogs su dris thig le bdun byas te/ thig le re re zhing yang re re'i nang du chud par byas la/ dbus ma dang tha ma dang thig le bdun dang ldan par byas te/ thig
30a7(rgyud 'grel): le bdun po de dag kyang rlung lha bdun po ri dags la zhon pa mdog nag po/ /'phags pa mi g.yo bas zhags pas bkug nas bcings par gyur par bsams la/ de rnams kyis dbus ma gcig ni gtso bo yin la/ lhag ma drug de ni de skor te kun gnas par bsam mo//
30b1(rgyud 'grel): de nas kham phor a las ri rab tu bsams la/ de'i steng du a nyid las dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du rdo rjes g.yogs pa/ dbus su yang rdo rje rtse lnga pa yi ge hUM gi sa bon las byung ba/ mtshams rnams su mdung rtse gsum pa rnam par bsams la/ de bzhin du
30b2(rgyud 'grel): badzra haM band+ha zhes brjod de/ kham phor des ji skad du bshad pa'i thig le bdun dgab par bya'o/ /de nas kham phor dang ri rab kyi steng du oM las bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bsams te/ 'phags pa mi g.yo ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar g.yon rkyang bas ri rab
30b3(rgyud 'grel): mnan nas/ ral gri dang zhags pas rlung rnams la sdigs mdzub mdzad par bsams te/ de lta bus rlung rnams thams cad bcing bar byas par 'gyur ro/ /de las chu la sogs pa'i bgegs bzlog pa bshad par bya ste/ haM las rlung dang me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i 'phags
30b4(rgyud 'grel): pa mi g.yo bar bdag nyid bskyed la/ grog mkhar gyi sa'am/ ba lang gi lci ba sa la ma lhung bas bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan byas nas/ khaM las ral gri/ raM las me'i snying po bskyed la/ kaM las zhags pa dang/ lcags kyu bskyed de/ lag pa g.yon pas gzung la/ lag pa
30b5(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pas lcags kyu dang zhags pas drangs nas/ bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan gyi nang du bcug ste/ g.yon brkyang pa'i gnas pas gnas la/ rkang pa g.yon pas spyi bo nas btsir la/ 'di skad ces brjod do/ /na ma:sa man+ta badzra NAM/ tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na spho Ta ya hUM tra ka
30b6(rgyud 'grel): haM maM zhes brjod nas gzugs brnyan de ral gris gtub par bya'o/ /dug dang ske tshe dang lan tsha la sogs pas gzugs brnyan bskus la mes gdung bar bya'o/ /me yis gdungs pas de nyid kyang/ /gdungs par 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /tshangs pa 'am brgya byin yin na yang//
30b7(rgyud 'grel): de'i mod la myur du 'tshig/ ces bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs so/ /las 'di dag kyang 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rnal 'byor gyis de'i gsang sngags khri bzlas pa'i sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas/ de'i 'og tu las bya'o/ /yang oM A:hUM zhes bya ba 'dis 'phagS
31a1(rgyud 'grel): ba 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed sku mdog nag po/ /zhal bzhi pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ zhabs drug pa/ phyag g.yas gnyis na ral gri dang dgra sta bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon gnyis na zhags pa dang gtun shing bsnams pa/ lho phyogs su gzigs pa/ khro bo'i tshogs rnams
31a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis nam mkha' i khams kun tu gang bar mdzad par rnam par bsams la/ mdung thung gi phyag rgya bcings la/ sprin la sogs pa bzlog pa'i bsams pas tsham dam dang bcas pas rab tu sbyar bar bya'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings la/ mdzub mo gnyis sbyar ba ni mdung
31a3(rgyud 'grel): thung gi phyag rgya'o/ /de ltar na yang gal te bgegs zhi bar ma gyur na/ kham por so ma btar ba gnyis kyi nang du khrag dang dur khrod kyi sol ba dang dug dang ske tshe dang/ da du ra'i lo ma'i khu bas sngags bris la/ yungs kar la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas/ kham phor kha
31a4(rgyud 'grel): sbyar te/ de'i nang du bzhag la/ me'i bgegs la sogs pa bsams la/ sreg lugs brgya 'am/ sreg lugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas de dag 'jigs pa 'am/ 'chi ba 'am/ mi ma yin pas gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi sbyor bas yi ge hUM bzlas brjod
31a5(rgyud 'grel): 'bum byas la/ mi rus kyi rgyu las byas pa'i phur bu sor bzhi pa'i tshad tsam la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ de bzhin du rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas bkug cing bcug ste bcings nas/ gzugs brnyan la phur bus gdab bo/ /de nas me'i tsha bzhi ba bshad
31a6(rgyud 'grel): par bya ste/ me'i steng du baM las chu'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du pad+ma'i dbus su gnas pa'i 'khor lo/ /de'i steng du baM nyid las bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dung dang kun da ltar dkar bar bzhugs te/ mtsho chen po ma dros pa 'dra ba'i rgya mtsho chen po bzhi las/ chu bo
31a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhi 'bab pa lta bu'i char gyi rgyun bab pas phyogs bcur 'phengs par gyur par bsams par bya'o/ /rdo rje spyan dang rdo rje me ltar 'bar bas kham phor ri rab dang phur bu yang dag par gsungs la/ rdo rje gnod sbyin dang/ rdo rje 'jigs byed spyan dag gis /de rnams kyi nam mkha' bcings
31b1(rgyud 'grel): ma byas la/ rdo rje bcings pas dra ba bya'o/ /yang na mngon spyod kyi sbyin sreg gis bgegs bzlog par bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na gnas pa'i phur bu hUM bzhis bton la/ 'og nas bshad pa'i tshon sna lngas phur bu'i bu ga bkang la mnyam por gzhag go/ de nas hi zhes
31b2(rgyud 'grel): bya bas mig g.yas pa dang g.yon par nyi ma dang zla ba bskyed la/ khro bo'i lta bas kun tu bltas la/ sgo rnams bya'o/ /de nas tshon rtsi byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ oM badzra tsi tra sa ma ya hUM zhes bya bas 'dis phyag rgya dang ldan pas tshon rtsi thams cad la lan bdun gyi bar du mngon par bzlas na rdo
31b3(rgyud 'grel): rje'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so/ /de la phyag rgya ni 'di yin te/ rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis las ni/ /mdzub mo rtse mo mnyam sbyar ba/ /byas nas tshon rtsi thams cad ni/ /'bar ba'i lta bas dgug par bya/ /hi zhes bya ba dang/ rdo rje nyi ma'i khro
31b4(rgyud 'grel): bo'i dam tshig gang gi phyag rgya dang/ g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis mthar spang bar bya'o/ /oM badzra tsi tra sa ma ya hUM zhes zlos shing dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams te/ g.yas nas bskor bas g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur kyis tshon rtsi dgye bar bya ste/ phyis ci bder bya'o/ /de'i rim pa
31b5(rgyud 'grel): ni 'di yin te/ sngon po dang/ ser po dang dmar po dang/ ljang gu dang/ dkar po'o/ /rim pa 'dis ci bder dgye'o/ /khru drug par bya ba ni tshon rtsi'i ri mo chung tshad yin te/ de phan chad khru bkyed pas rkang pa bkyed par bya'o/ /de yang rdo rje rtse mo'i rgyud las/ sngon po rdo rje rtse rang bzhin/ /gnyis
31b6(rgyud 'grel): pa gser la dmigs pa ste/ /pad+ma rA ga'i rang bzhin gzhan/ /de bzhin gzhan dag mar gad 'dra/ /dkar po nang du shes bya ste/ /'di na tshon gyi rim par bshad/ /ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so/ /shar phyogs su ni sngon po che/ /lhor ni ser po dang ldan pa/ /nub
31b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi cha ni dmar po ste/ /bya ba ni ljang gur yang dag ldan/ /dbus kyi sa yi cha nyid ni/ /shel ltar snang ba bla na med/ /rtag tu rdo rje dril 'chang zhing/ /rab mnyam gzhag ste de yis bri/ /rdo rje ka pa'i nang logs su/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lngas brgyan la/ /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /sangs
32a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas gyi ni gzugs bzhag cing/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun gyi/ /dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dbus rnams su/ /rim bzhin du ni dam tshig mchog /bzhi po legs par gzhag par bya/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi po de dag tu/ /rdo rje gom pas song nas ni/ /mi
32a2(rgyud 'grel): g.yo ba la sogs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas bzhi po thams cad gzhag/ mi g.yo ba yi dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje 'dzin sogs mnyam par bzhag/ rin chen 'byung ldan dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje snying sogs rdzogs par bzhag/ tshe dpag med pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje spyan sogs rdzogS
32a3(rgyud 'grel): par bzhag/ gdon mi za yi dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje rgya gram la sogs bzhag/ /'khor lo yi ni grwa rnams su/ /rdo rje lha mo rnams kyang bzhag/ dkyil 'khor phyi rol grwa rnams su/ /sangs rgyas chod pa rnams kyang bzhag/ sgo rnams kun gyi nang du ni/ /sgo srungs bzhi yang bzhag
32a4(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rim phyogs su ni/ /sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang bzhag/ de la rdo rje shugs kyi snying po ni 'di yin te/ oM badzra be gA kra ma hUM/ de la 'di'i phyag rgya ni 'di yin te/ yid kyis ri mo bteg nas ni/ /rdo rje srad bu 'am gzhan yang rung/ /phyir 'byung
32a5(rgyud 'grel): nang du zhugs kyang ni/ /dam tshig nyams par de mi 'gyur/ /de la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snang mdzad ni/ sku mdog dkar po seng+ge'i gdan la rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsnams pa/ nyi ma'i 'od mnga' ba/ dar la'i
32a6(rgyud 'grel): stod g.yogs dang/ smad g.yogs mnabs pa/ rin po che'i cod pan dang dar dbyangs kyis dbang bskur pa dang ldan pa/ zhal bzhi pa zhal dang po shar du gzigs pa'o/ /de bzhin du mi bskyod pa la sogs pa yang de bzhin te/ sku mdog kyang sngon po dang/ ser
32a7(rgyud 'grel): po dang/ dmar po dang/ ljang gu dang/ glang po che la sogs pa'i gdan la rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ rdo rje rtse lnga ba dang/ rdo rje rin po che dang/ rdo rje pad+ma dang/ sna tshogs rdo rje la sogs pa bsnams pa'o/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che
32b1(rgyud 'grel): cod pan dang/ dar dbyangs kyis dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa/ zhal gcig rnam par snang mdzad la mngon sum du phyogs pa rnams rang rang gi phyag rgya chen po dang badzra d+hA tu zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i snying po zlos shing bzhugs su gsol la/ bris ba ltar bar snang
32b2(rgyud 'grel): la bzhugs pa rnams kyang de bzhin du phab ste gcig tu bya'o/ /de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi spyan sngar/ satwa badzri zhes bya bas rdo rje sems ma sku mdog sngon mo/ /rdo rje rtse lnga pa dmar po bkod la/ badzra A be sha a zhes bya bas dbab par bya'o//
32b3(rgyud 'grel): g.yas su ratna badzri zhes bya bas rin chen sems ma sku mdog ser mo/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che rtse mo rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa'o/ /rgyab tu d+harma badzri zhes bya bas rdo rje chos ma sku mdog dmar mo/ /pad+ma dkar dmar 'dab ma bcu drug pa la 'dab ma brgyad thur du gyes pa/
32b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dab ma brgyad gyen du bltas pa kha ma bye ba'i nang na rdo rje rtse lnga pa chud pa'o/ /g.yon du karma badzri zhes bya bas/ rdo rje las ma sku mdog ljang gu/ sna tshogs rdo rje rtse mo bcu gnyis pa kha dog lnga pa'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa nas bskal pa bzang po'i mthar thug pa'i bar ni/
32b5(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya chen pos rang rang gi mtshan ma/ rdo rje la sogs pa bsnams pa/ rab tu dgyes pas spyan gdangs pa/ sems dpa' i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa yin no/ /rnam par snang mdzad ni de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yin la/ 'di dag thams cad kyang chos kyi dbyings la dmigs
32b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir/ rnam par snang mdzad la mngon par phyogs par bya'o/ /mi bskyod pa'i mdun du ni rdo rje sems dpa' o/ /g.yas su ni rdo rje rgyal po'o/ /g.yon du ni rdo rje chags pa'o/ /rgyab tu ni rdo rje legs pa'o/ /rin chen 'byung ldan gyi mdun du ni rdo rje
32b7(rgyud 'grel): rin chen la sogs pa yang de bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /lhag ma ni shes pa kho nar zad do/ /phyir dkyil 'khor gyi khyams la byams pa la sogs pa/ bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' bzhi yis stong du ma tshang ba/ shar phyogs la sogs pa'i phyogs su cha mnyam po 
33a1(rgyud 'grel): go rims bzhin du bri bar bya'o/ /de la shar phyogs pa rnams ni rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsnams pa'o/ /lho phyogs pa rnams ni rdo rje rin po che bsnams pa'o/ /nub phyogs pa rnams ni rdo rje pad+ma bsnams pa'o/ /byang phyogs pa rnams ni sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams pa'o//
33a2(rgyud 'grel): de nas 'di rnams dgod pa'i rim pa dang/ mtshan ni 'di yin te/ oM sarba soM ka ra pa ri shud+d+harma teg ga nas mud ga te ma hA ya na pa ri bA re swA hA/ zhes bya ba 'di ni rig pa'o/ /de la de rnams kyi mtshan ni/ byams pa/ seng+ge/ rab gsal/ thub pa/ me tog me tog gnyis pa/ spyan legs/ deng
33a3(rgyud 'grel): dpon/ legs chen/ stobs chen/ rgyu skar rgyal po/ rtsi sman/ snyan pa tog/ 'od chen po/ grol ba'i phung po/ rnam par snang mdzad/ nyi ma'i snying po/ zla 'od 'phro/ 'od bzang/ mya ngan med/ skar rgyal/ rab gsal/ phreng thogs/ yon tan 'od/ don gzigs/ mar me/ mthu ldan/ sman
33a4(rgyud 'grel): pa/ des pa/ mdzod pu/ brtan ldan/ lha'i dpal/ gdugs dga' / yon tan rgyal mtshan/ sgra gcan/ tshogs can/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs/ tshig brtan/ mi 'gying ba/ 'od mdzad/ lhun chen/ rdo rje/ sdom pa can/ mi bsnyengs pa/ rin chen/ pad+ma'i spyan/ stobs sde/ me tog 'od zer/
33a5(rgyud 'grel): ye shes dgyes/ gzi chen/ tshangs pa/ 'od dpag med/ klu sbyin/ brtan par gshegs/ don yod mthong/ brtson 'grus sbyin/ bzang skyong/ dga' bo/ 'chi med/ seng ge'i rgyal mtshan/ rgyal ba chos/ mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po/ kha lo bsgyur/ dgyes par gshegs/ chu lha/ yon tan
33a6(rgyud 'grel): lag/ spos kyi glang po/ rnam par gzigs/ 'brug sgra/ legs sems/ yid bzangs/ dri med/ zla ba/ grags chen/ gtsug na nor bu/ drag shul can/ seng ge'i stabs/ ljon pa/ rnam par rgyal ba can/ shes rab brtsegs/ legs gnas blo gros/ yan lag skyes/ blo mdza' 
33a7(rgyud 'grel): yas/ gzugs bzang/ mkhyen ldan/ 'od zer/ brtul zhugs brtan/ bkra shis/ bden pa'i rtog/ pad+ma/ sred med kyi bu/ lag bzangs/ ye shes 'byung gnas/ yon tan 'od 'phro/ tshangs pas byin/ rin chen 'byung gnas/ lha'i me tog/ don legs sems pa/ chos kyi dbang
33b1(rgyud 'grel): phyug/ blo gros grags pa/ spobs pa brtsegs pa/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan/ phan par bzhed pa/ rnam par rol ldan/ mun pa dang bral ba/ sgra gcan lha/ ri bo'i rgyal mtshan/ tshogs can 'od/ rin chen snying po/ shin tu mthong gshegs/ skar rgyal/ ru rings/ yon tan grags pa/ nyi zla/ nyi ma'i 'od
33b2(rgyud 'grel): skar mkhan seng ge'i tog/ dus mkhyen rgyal po/ /dpal gyi snying po/ srid mdza' gzigs pa/ glog gi 'od/ gser gyi ri bo/ seng ges byin pa/ gzhan gyis mi thub rgyal mtshan/ mchog dga' grags pa/ brtson 'grus brtan pa/ grags pa rdzogs pa/ bsnyengs pa dang bral ba/ mchod
33b3(rgyud 'grel): 'os lha/ sgron ma chen po/ 'jig rten 'od/ spos dri zhim pa/ yon tan mchog 'dzin/ mun pa rang rnam par bral pa/ seng ge'i 'gram pa/ rin chen grags pa/ skyon rab zhi ba/ bdud rtsi 'chang ba/ mi'i zla ba/ shin tu gzigs pa/ rab tu rgyan pa/ nor bu'i 'od/ ri bo brtsegs pa'i
33b4(rgyud 'grel): tog/ chos kyi 'byung gnas/ tshe sbyin/ rin chen 'byung gnas/ skye dbang mtshungs pa/ stabs kyis gshegs pa/ blo gnas/ gdugs mdzes pa/ gtso bo/ shin tu 'phags dpal/ seng ge'i sgra/ rnam rol ldan pa/ klu'i 'od/ me tog ri bo/ klu dga' / spos kyi dbang phyug/ shin tu grags
33b5(rgyud 'grel): pa/ stobs kyi lha/ yon tan phreng ldan/ klu'i lag pa/ mig brgyan pa/ legs par sbyangs pa'i blo/ zil gnon ye shes/ mdza' las pa'i spyan/ bad bar gsung/ nyi ma'i 'od/ des pa'i blo/ mdza' yas gzugs/ rnam par snang mdzad/ rin chen tog/ the tshom rnam par spangs pa/ 'jig rten
33b6(rgyud 'grel): 'das pa/ don yod/ rnam par gnon pa/ rtog par mdzad pa/ me tog rgyal mtshan/ ri dbang rgyal po/ gzi brjid chen po/ don mdzad gzigs pa/ grags pa mdza' yas/ rin chen lha/ don gnas mkhyen pa/ blo rdzogs pa/ mya ngan med pa/ dri ma dang bral ba/ tshangs lha/ sa'i dbang phyug/ me tog spyan
33b7(rgyud 'grel): rnam par 'byes pa'i sku/ chos kyi 'od/ kun gzigs/ yon tan 'od gsal/ zla ba'i zhal/ rin chen 'od/ rin chen tog/ grags ba'i bla ma/ 'od byed gzi brjid dpag med/ dus mkhyen seng ge'i sku mkhas blo/ /rgyal bar dga' / yon tan phung po/ /zla ba'i tog/ mthu thob/ mthu rtsal mdza' yas/
34a1(rgyud 'grel): zla ba/ dri med/ don thams cad gzigs pa/ dpa' bo/ 'byor ldan/ bsod nams/ sgron ma/ yon tan 'od 'phro blo yangs/ legs skyes/ nor lha/ yid gnyis spong/ 'dzin pa dpag med/ mchog sred/ choms med/ mi gnas pa/ der gnas/ tshogs can gtso bo/ 'gro ba'i 'od zer
34a2(rgyud 'grel): phal chen rgyal ba/ gzi brjid mdza' yas/ don blo gros/ sman pa'i rgyal po/ tha ba spangs pa/ rims nad med pa/ legs sbyin/ grags byin/ me tog byin/ skyes bu byin/ rdo rje sde/ phal chen sbyin/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ spos kyi glang po/ sred med kyi bu/ des pa/ mi tshugs pa/ nyi zla/ glog gi tog/
34a3(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa/ zhes bya ba ste/ nyis brgya lnga bcud gcig gis mtshangs pa ni shar phyogs kyi khyams kyi nang du bris par bya'o/ /dpal sbas/ ye shes nyi ma/ don grub/ lhun po brtsegs/ dgra 'dul/ pad+ma/ dgra bcom grags pa/ ye shes 'gros/ nyon mongs bral/ 'dam bu/ spos
34a4(rgyud 'grel): bzangs/ yul 'khor rangs/ lha grags/ srid mdza' gzigs/ zla ba/ sgra gcan/ rin chen zla ba/ seng ge'i rgyal mtshan/ bsam gtan dgyes/ rdzogs ldan/ rnam par rol pa/ yon tan rin chen/ dgra bcom grags pa/ pad+ma'i ngos/ mdzod spu ldan/ spobs pa grags/ rdo rje nor bu/ che
34a5(rgyud 'grel): dpag med/ nor bu bkod/ dbang chen/ yon tan 'byung gnas/ lhun po grags/ 'od zer bcu pa/ ma smad pa/ glang po'i 'gros/ yid 'thad/ rin chen zla ba/ zhi ba/ rab gsal rgyal bo/ kha lo sgyur/ dga' ba'i dbang phyug/ gtsug na rin po che/ bsnyengs bral/ rin chen snying po/ zla zhal/ dri
34a6(rgyud 'grel): ma med par grags pa/ zhi ba'i gzi brjid/ dga' ba'i tog/ sgra gcan lha/ na tshod bzang po/ lha dga' /rin chen phung po/ mdzes par gshegs/ seng ge'i phyogs pa/ shin tu mthor gshegs/ skye ba'i dbang po/ /blo gros bzang po/ /'jig rten 'od/ rin chen gzi brjid/ skal ldan/
34a7(rgyud 'grel): shing rta/ kun tu rgyal ba/ dga' ba bkod pa/ stobs mdzad pa/ spos kyi glang po/ blo gros 'od 'phro/ ri bo'i rgyal mtshan/ rin chen spos bzang/ chos brtan/ gzi brjid drag shul can/ chos kyi nor bu/ bzang pos byin pa/ bde gshegs zla ba/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs/ seng ge'i zla ba/ mtshungs pa
34b1(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i dpal/ legs par skye ba/ thub pa med pa'i tshogs/ grags pa'i bshes gnyen/ bden pa/ dka' thub chen po/ lhun po'i 'od zer/ yon tan brtsegs pa/ mchod pa grags pa/ chos grags/ sbyin pa'i 'od/ glog 'byin/ bden par gsung ba/ 'tsho byed/ na tshod bzang po/ legs pa'i tshogs
34b2(rgyud 'grel): can rnam par nges pa'i blo gros srid mdza' nor bu'i spos/ rgyal bas dgyes pa/ seng ge'i 'od zer/ rnam par snang mdzad/ grags pa mchog/ thugs rab tu gzhungs pa/ nor bu'i zla ba/ drag shul 'od zer/ brtul zhugs thub med/ 'gro bas mchod pa/ nor bu'i tshogs/ 'jig rten bla ma/ glang
34b3(rgyud 'grel): chen seng ge/ zla ba/ rin chen 'od zer/ sgra gcan sbed pa/ yon tan rgya mtsho/ 'od zer ldan pa/ rab tu zhi ba'i stabs/ 'jig rten bzang po/ ma ngan med pa/ shugs bcu pa/ stobs la dgyes pa/ mthu dpal/ mthu thob pa/ mthu chen po/ yon tan snying po/ bden par spyod pa/ dge mchog /rgyal po/ skar
34b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal/ 'od zer chen po/ glog gi 'od/ yon tan rgya chen/ rin po che/ dpal 'od/ bdud 'dul bar mdzad pa/ go cha bgos pa/ seng ge'i phyag/ me tog bzang po/ rin chen mthon po/ rgya mtsho/ sa 'dzin/ don gyi blo mnga' ba/ yon tan bsags pa/ yon tan tshogs/ rin chen me/ 'jig rten 'das pa/
34b5(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten zla ba/ dbyangs snyan pa/ tshangs pa'i tog/ tshogs can gtso bo/ seng ge'i stabs/ drag shul gyis byin pa/ chos kyi dbang phyug/ gzi brjid 'od/ 'od zer chen po/ rin chen grags pa/ tshogs can gsal ba/ grags pa mdza' yas/ 'od zer don yod/ lha'i drang srong/ skye ba'i dbang po
34b6(rgyud 'grel): dge 'dun brtan/ phyogs bzang/ tog/ yul 'khor me tog/ chos kyi blo gros/ rlung gi shugs ltar gshegs pa/ legs bsams grags pa/ snang ldan/ lha tshogs/ yon tan bsrungs/ don gyi blo gros/ bsnyengs med/ grogs brtan/ 'od gnas mtshungs/ nor bu'i zhabs/ thang pa'i gzi brjid/
34b7(rgyud 'grel): ngos bzangs/ blo bzangs/ kun tu gzi brjid/ ye shes mchog/ tshangs par gnas/ bden par gsungS/ blo bzangs/ stobs byin/ seng ge stabs/ me tog/ ye shes 'byung gnas/ me tog byin/ yon tan snying po/ rin chen grags pa/ grags pa rmad du byung pa/ mi mtshungs pa/ brnyengs med/ nyi
35a1(rgyud 'grel): ma'i 'od/ tshangs par gshegs pa/ lha'i mthu rtsal/ ye shes dgyes/ lha bden/ nor bu'i snying po/ ye shes dpal/ bcings med/ brtul zhugs brtan/ lha'i gzi brjid/ tshangs pa thub/ dal gyis bzhud/ brtul zhugs/ dka' thub/ 'od zer phung po/ gzi brjid chen po/ tsam
35a2(rgyud 'grel): pa ka/ dga' mdzad tshogs can bzang po/ dbang po'i rgyal mtshan/ dgyes pa chen po/ sna ma'i me tog 'od/ tshogs can 'od/ skrun par mdzad/ mdangs 'gro/ don legs nges/ khyu mchog/ lag bzangs/ 'od zer chen po /bsam pas byin/ bsod nams 'od/ rin chen dbyangs/ rdo rje'i
35a3(rgyud 'grel): sde/ 'byor ldan/ seng ge'i stobs/ dri ma med pa'i spyan/ 'od bsrungs/ blo gsal/ ye shes 'gros/ gtsi brjid drag shul can/ 'od zer chen po/ nyi ma'i 'od dri ma med pa'i 'od/ gzi brjid rnam par 'byes pa/ khengs med/ sbrang rtsi'i zhal/ zla 'od glog sbyin/ rab tu zhi bar gshegs/
35a4(rgyud 'grel): mi 'khrugs pa/ dgra bcom grags pa/ chos kyi yon tan/ zhing bzang po/ bkod pa'i rgyal po/ mngon par 'phags pa/ sbyin sreg 'od 'phro/ pad+ma'i dpal/ rin po che'i bkod pa/ shin tu bzang po/ rin po che'i mchog/ thugs shin tu gzhungs pa/ 'od dpag med/ rgya mtshos byin/ tshangs
35a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'og? zla ba'i gdugs/ 'od 'phro pa/ dri med rgyal po/ 'di rnams ni lho phyogs kyi khyams kyi nang du bri bar bya'o/ /ye shes grags pa/ kun las rgyal ba/ yon tan 'od/ sgra rnam par grags pa/ zla ba rgyas pa/ pad+ma'i 'od zer/ brtul zhugs bzang po/ sgron ma rgyal po
35a6(rgyud 'grel): glog gi tog/ 'od zer rgyal po/ skar mkhan/ grags pa rdzogs ldan/ pad+ma'i snying po/ rgyal spyan mdzes/ rnyog pa med pa'i don/ drag shul sde/ bsod nams gzi brjid/ mthu rtsal can/ thogs med blo/ sgra gcan lha/ ye shes phung po/ kha lo sgyur ba/ skye dbang mtshungs pa/ me tog tog/ sgra
35a7(rgyud 'grel): gcan 'dzin/ rtsi smin chen po/ rgyu skar rgyal po/ sman pa'i rgyal po/ bsod nams glang po/ mchod par mdzad pa/ rnam par grags pa'i rgyal po /nyi ma'i 'od zer/ chos kyi mdzod/ blo gros bzang po/ yon tan dbang mtshungs/ rdo rje'i sde/ shes rab brtsegs/ legs par gnas/ blo sbyangs/ tshangs
35b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dbyangs/ yon tan mchog/ 'dug? sgra dbyangs/ mngon par shes pa'i tog/ tog gi 'od/ mi 'dren dge ba/ tshangs pa/ skyes mchog/ spyan sdug klus byin/ bden pa'i tog/ brgyan pa/ zhums pa med dbyangs/ rin chen 'od/ dbyangs byin/ seng ge /'od zer sna tshogs/ ye shes dpa' bo/ /pad+ma'i
35b2(rgyud 'grel): phung po/ me tog rgyas la/ mthu rtsal stobs/ bsod nams phung po/ gzugs mchog/ skar mkhan/ zla ba'i sgron ma /gzi brjid phung po/ byang chub rgyal po/ mi zang pa/ mngon par rtogs pa'i spyan/ yan lag rgyas pa/ yul 'khor shes rab mchog/ gzi brjid tshim mdzad/ shes rab byin/ 'jam
35b3(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs/ chags pa med mdzad/ gtso bos byin/ gtso bo/ ye shes mthu rtsal/ 'od 'phro can/ dbang po/ shugs 'chang skar rgyal/ 'od bzang po/ grags pa byin pa/ gzugs bzang po/ rgyal po don grub pa/ seng ge'i sde/ nor lha'i bu/ grags pa/ rgya pa/ brgya byin snying po/ bsod nams
35b4(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer/ 'od zer bzang po/ smrad 'don/ sgron ma'i rgyal po/ ye shes brtsegs lha mchog/ sa'i bdag po/ rnam par grol ba brnyes pa/ gtsug gi gser/ sgra gcan bzang po/ thub dka' / thub gsal/ zla ba'i 'od zer/ gser gyi 'od/ legs byin/ lha'i yon tan dbang po/ chos kyi gdugs
35b5(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams lag/ chags pa med pa/ ye shes bya nom/ blo gros zhib mo/ gzi byin thams cad pa/ rtsi sman/ rnam par grol ba'i tog/ 'od kyi mdzod/ ye shes rgyal po/ 'jigs mdzad/ chu bo spong ba/ thobs med grags pa/ bden pa'i phung po/ dbyangs snyan pa/ ri dbang mtshungs/ chos brtsegS
35b6(rgyud 'grel): thar pa'i gzi byin/ legs mdzad/ rab tu zhi ba'i sku/ yid du 'ong ba'i gsung/ blo sbyangs/ chu lha/ 'gro bas mchod/ seng ge'i logs/ chos kyi mthu rtsal/ skal ba bzang po/ mi 'khrugs pa'i mdog/ gzi brjid rgyal po/ rtog mdzad/ spyan legs/ don la gnas pa'i blo dang ba?/ snang
35b7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i 'od zer/ spos kyi gzi brjid/ kun tu dga' bar mdzad pa/ don yod par gshegs pa/ khra ba bcom pa/ gzugs mchog/ legs gshegs/ rab tu sbyin par grags pa/ 'od gtsang/ lha'i nyi ma/ shes rab byin/ mnyam par bzhag pa'i bdag nyid/ gzi mdangs/ rgyal rigs/ skal
36a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan shing rta/ gser mchog rnam par grol ba'i gtsug/ chos ldan/ spos gnas/ dregs pa spangs/ ye shes kyi mdzod/ tshangs par gshegs/ tsandan/ mya ngan med pa/ seng+ge'i 'od zer/ yul 'khor tog/ pad+ma'i snying po/ gzi brjid mdza' yas/ lha'i 'od zer/
36a2(rgyud 'grel): shes rab me tog/ mkhas pa/ ye shes 'byor ldan/ tshangs pa dbyig/ phyag na rin chen/ dbang ldan rdzogs par gsung pa/ mchog gsung/ mchod 'os/ skad rgyal/ nyi ma/ 'dam las rgal ba/ ye shes brnyes/ grub pa/ rma bya/ chos sbyin/ phan par bzhed pa/ ye shes ldan pa/ grags pa/ 'od
36a3(rgyud 'grel): zer gyi dra ba/ rnam par bcom pa/ bairU rgya'i snying po/ me tog lha'i rgyal po/ zla ba /dran pa'i 'od/ dge ba'i 'od/ yon tan mchog ma kun 'od/ rin po che'i dpal/ skyes bu zla ba/ sgra gcan/ bdud rtsi'i 'od/ 'jig rten mchog/ skar ma'i 'od/ zhi ba'i stabs/ ye shes rgya mtsho/ ri'i dbang po/
36a4(rgyud 'grel): rab tu zhi ba/ yon tan mdza' stobs/ lha'i dbang po/ dbyangs snyan pa/ ngos bzang/ don la gnas pa/ yon tan gzi brjid dpal/ mkhyen ldan zla med pa/ nga ro dpag med/ 'od zangs/ shin tu thugs gzhungs pa/ don dgongs gti mug khral/ dbyangs kyi yan lag khyad 'phags/ mchog
36a5(rgyud 'grel): tu mdzes par gshegs pa/ zhi ba'i don/ skyon med/ blo dbyangs dge ba/ pad+ma'i mdzod/ 'od zer bzang po/ spobs pa'i mdog/ stegs bzang po/ tshogs kyi dbang po/ bsnyengs dang bral ba/ ye shes bzhed pa/ spobs pa'i spyan/ blo'i mchog /zla ba/ rin chen zla 'od/ bsnyengs pa med
36a6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ gzi brjid chen po/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs/ dbyangs bzang po/ shes rab chen po'i stegs/ blo gros zla med/ rdo rje mkhregs pa/ byang chub blo gros/ ljon shing dbang po/ gdengs snyan pa/ bsod nams stobs/ mthu'i dpal/ 'phags pa dgyes pa/ mthu stobs/ skar mal dgyes
36a7(rgyud 'grel): pa/ sprin gyi rnga sgra/ 'di rnams ni nub kyi phyogs kyi nang du bri bar bya'o// //spyan sdug pa'i zhal/ ye shes bzang ldan/ 'byor par ldan pa/ yon tan phung po/ gsal ba/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan/ ye shes nga ro/ nam mkha' / mchod sbyin nga ro/ /shes rab rnam rgod nga ro/ /yon
36b1(rgyud 'grel): tan 'od zer gzi brjid/ drang srong dbang po/ blo dang ldan pa/ spobs pa'i tshogs/ mchod sbyin bzang po/ zla ba'i zhal/ shin tu gzigs ba/ rdul dang bral ba/ yon tan tshogs/ tog dang ldan pa/ bsod nams rgyal mtshan/ yul 'khor spobs pa/ rin chen rab sbyin/ zla ba dgyes pa seng ge'i
36b2(rgyud 'grel): stobs/ dbang sgyur rgyal po/ bdud rtsi gsal ba/ bsam gtan stoms pa/ 'khrug pa med pa/ dri ma rab zhi/ phyogs ma slad pa/ mdzes pa zhal bzangs/ shugs gnas ye shes ldan pa/ gsung ba'i dbang po/ blo gros zab mo/ bdud rtsi/ chos kyi stobs/ mchod par ldan/ me tog 'od/
36b3(rgyud 'grel): khams gsum mchod gnas/ sgra gcan nyi ma'i snying po/ /lha'i mchod pa/ thar pa'i rgyal mtshan/ dge ba'i gtsug/ bdud rtsi 'od/ rdo rje brtan pa/ rin chen phung po/ mdzes par gshegs pa/ nyi ma ltar gshegs pa/ dga' ba'i 'od yon tan gtsug/ dpal rdzogs/ seng ge'i stobs/ gyen du
36b4(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa/ me tog phyin/ 'od 'gyed/ pad+ma/ ye shes dgyes/ bkod pa mdzes/ gti mug med par gnas pa/ rma med pa/ tog gi rgyal mtshan/ bde bar dgongs/ gti mug med pa'i rgyal po/ cho ga mkhyen/ dag pa'i rgya mtsho/ rin chen mnga' / mi dma' ba/ skye bo dga' bar mdzad pa/ rma
36b5(rgyud 'grel): bya'i nga ro/ /ma zhum ? srid pa'i sred pa dri ma spangs pa/ spyod pa'i stegs/ lha mang pos snyan par grags pa/ rin po che'i stabs/ phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa/ dpal/ dgra las rgyal ba/ 'byor ldan grags pa/ yul 'khor bzang? po/ me tog 'od/ seng ge'i nga ro/ zla ba ltar shar ba?
36b6(rgyud 'grel): 'joms pa'i mchog/ mi g.yo ba/ phan pa dang ldan par gshegs pa/ bsod nams sgron ma'i rgyal po/ dbyangs kyi bskul ba/ gau ta ma/ mdangs stobs/ blo gnas pa'i rang bzhin/ zla ba bzang po/ byang chub yan lag me rtog bkra shis/ legs ston/ ye shes gzi brjod stobs
36b7(rgyud 'grel): dge ba'i sgron ma/ mthu rtsal brtan po/ lha dgra/ rab tu zhi ba/ nyi ma'i zhal/ thar pa'i brtul zhugs/ tshul khrims 'od/ brtul zhugs gnas/ rdul med/ snying po 'phags/ mig sman/ 'phel bar mdzad pa/ spos kyi 'od/ dus mkhyen 'od/ dran pa'i dbang po/ thogs pa med pa'i rgyal 
37a1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan/ byang chub mchog bgrod/ spyod pa gsal/ rin chen dgyes/ chos kyi dbang phyug/ lha thams cad pa/ bshes gnyen chen po/ bshes gnyen bzang po/ rab tu zhi ba'i stobs/ bdud rtsi'i bdag po/ lhun po'i 'od/ 'phags pas stong pa/ snang ldan/ gzi brjid 'bar ba/
37a2(rgyud 'grel): snang ba gzigs/ legs spyan rnam par smin/ legs dgyes/ mya ngan bral/ rin chen 'od/ sbyod pa dang ldan pa /bsod nams stobs/ yon tan rgya mtsho/ rmad du byung ba/ nga rgyal spong/ bdud brlag par mdzad pa/ bag chags las rgal ba'i stobs/ mi phyed pa'i blo mnga' ba/ rgya mtsho/
37a3(rgyud 'grel): dag par mdzad pa/ tshogs can 'grol ba'i rgyal po/ dga' ba'i 'od/ byang chub rgyal mtshan/ ye shes rin chen/ shin tu bsil ba/ tshangs pa rgyal ba/ ye shes dgyes/ rdzu 'phrul tog/ skye dbang mtshungs pa/ sa'i dbang phyug/ nyi ma dgyes/ sgra gcan zla ba/ me tog 'od/ smad pa'i bdag
37a4(rgyud 'grel): po/ mdangs mnga' / bsod nams dgyes/ dga' ba'i stobs/ dbyangs snyan pa/ chos kyi dbang phyug/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs/ spyod pa bzang po/ 'khrul pa med pa'i blo/ dbyangs chen po snyan par grags pa/ tog ldan/ gzi brjid/ rnam par grags pa/ 'gro ba'i dbang phyug/ ljon pa/ gti mug
37a5(rgyud 'grel): rab zab/ dpag tu med pa/ zla ba bzang po/ spobs pa mdza' yas tog /brtul zhugs bstar ba/ mchod pa'i gnas/ mya ngan rgal/ dge ba dgyes pa/ 'gro ba'i blo gros dgyes par gshegs pa/ zhabs mdzes/ utpal/ dul gnas me tog/ spobs pa mdza' yas 'od zer/ drang srong
37a6(rgyud 'grel): gsal ba/ yon tan brtson 'grus/ snying po/ lha'i bdag po/ rin chen mthon po/ gsal ba/ skal ldan shing rta can/ bsod nams blo gros/ sbyin sred 'od 'gro/ yon tan mdza' yas/ gzi brjid phung po/ seng ge stabs/ mi g.yo ba/ rab gsal 'od spyod pa/ glu dbyangs/ 'khor lo 'dzin
37a7(rgyud 'grel): pa/ dbyig gi mchog/ 'jig rten dga' ba/ dga' ba mdza' yas grags pa/ sprin gyi tog/ shes rab 'gros/ spros bzangs/ nam mkha' i dbyings/ lha/ lha'i rgyal po/ nor bu gsal ba/ nor bzangs/ sgron ma/ rin chen ? ro dbyangs/ skye dbang rgyal po/ sgra gcan sbed pa/ dge ba mdzad/ seng
37b1(rgyud 'grel): ge'i blo gres/ rin chen grags pa/ don mdzad pa/ mdzad mdza' gzigs pa/ srid pa'i me tog/ mdzod spu ldan pa/ spobs pa mtshungs med pa rgyal po/ ye shes rnam 'byed ? ro/ /seng ge'i mche ba/ mdzes par gshegs pa/ bsod nams sgron pa/ bkra shis ldan pa/ yul 'khor mya ngan
37b2(rgyud 'grel): med pa/ blo gros sems pa/ blo dang ldan pa/ chos kyi sgran ma spyan/ shin tu gzigs pa/ shugs kyis 'dor ba/ stobs chen/ shes rab me tog/ brtan pa'i dbyangs/ bde dang ldan pa/ don gsung ba/ dgyes pa gsal ba/ seng ge'i zhal gtsug bud?/ snang bar mdzad pa/ 'di rnams ni
37b3(rgyud 'grel): byang phyogs kyi khyams kyi nang du bri bar bya'o// //yang na byams pa dang/ mthong ba don yod dang/ ngan song kun 'dren dang/ mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros/ spos kyi glang po/ dpa' bar 'gro ba/ nam mkha' i mdzod/ ye shes tog/ 'od dpag tu
37b4(rgyud 'grel): med pa/ zla ba'i 'od/ bzang skyong/ dra ba can gyi 'od/ rdo rje snying po/ blo gros mi zad pa/ spobs pa brtsegs pa/ kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba bcu drug po ji ltar mngon par dga' ba'i sku mdog dang/ rgyan dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i cod pan dang dar dbyangs kyis dbang bskur ba dang ldan
37b5(rgyud 'grel): pa dgod par bya'o// //phyogs bzhi yang rta babs bzhi dang ka ba brgyad/ khru drug gam bdun gyi tshad tsam rin po che la sogs pa'i rgyu las byas pa/ me tog gi phreng ba dang dril bu dang dar la sogs pas brgyan pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' mngon par bzlas par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor
37b6(rgyud 'grel): gyi shar phyogs kyi char/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ sdor pos brgyan pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba dang/ gser 'od dam pa klog du gzhug go /chos smra ba de dag kyang sangs rgyas ltar ci nus pas/ mchod par bya'o/ /de lta bus ni bgegs thamS
37b7(rgyud 'grel): cad nye bar zhi ba dang/ dkyil 'khor grub par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs mtshams brgyad du spos snod las ga pur dang/ a ka ru dang/ du ru ka dang/ tsan dan la sogs pa rgyun mi 'chad par gtul bar bya'o/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor legs par bkod nas/ /phyi rol nye 'khor
38a1(rgyud 'grel): kun tu dris nye bar byugs la/ me tog gi sil ma bkram nas/ rgongs ka'i dus su/ rdo rje sems dpa' i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas me tog gi phreng ba blangs la/ rdo rje shugs kyis dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya zhing /oM badzra satwa hUM zhes kyang brjod par bya'o/ /yang
38a2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi lhag pa dang mtshang ba nyes pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bltas la/ rdo rje dril bu dkrol zhing dkyil 'khor la lan bdun skor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la/ phreng ba phul te/ rdo rje gar byas nas blangs la rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o/
38a3(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra satwa hUM zhes kyang rgyun mi 'chad pa kho nar bzla bar bya'o/ /de yang rdo rje dril bu rab bskul bas/ /sangs rgyas mtshang yongs su skong/ /lhag pa gang yin 'dor mdzad pas/ /grub gyur smad par mi bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa yin no/ /de'i rjes la yi ge hUM las bdag nyid rdo rje hUM
38a4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad du bsam par bya'o/ /de nas dbus su 'dug nas ni/ /rdo rje slob dpon mnyam gzhag pas/ rdo rje sgo ni rnam bzhi po/ /yid kyis su ni dbye bar bya/ /oM badzro g+haT ya sa ma ya pra be sha hUM/ rdo rje mdzub mo yang dag sbyar/ /sbyar ba bkan te bsdams nas su/ /rab tu khros nas dbye ba
38a5(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /sgo dbye ba? yi mchog yin no/ /de nas rin po che 'am sa las byas pa'i bum pa/ rtsa ba mi gnag pa/ gsum pa che ba mgrin pa ring ba/ mchu 'chan ba byu ru dang/ gser dang/ dud dang mu tig dang pad+ma rA ga ste rin po che thams cad dang/ bri ha sti dang/ kaN+Da ka ri dang/ ha
38a6(rgyud 'grel): sa dang/ ? pa la dang/ she ta a pa rA dzI ta ste sman thams cad dang/ 'bras dang nas dang gro dang til dang/ ma sha ste 'bru thams cad dang/ spos chu dri zhim pa dang/ me tog dkar po dri zhim pas yongs su bkang la/ dris kun tu byugs pa'i me tog gi phreng ba btags
38a7(rgyud 'grel): la/ mgul pa? ras dkar po bzang pos bcings pa/ 'dab ma dang 'bras bu dri zhim pas kha brgyan pa/ sngar bsnyen pa byas pas mchod yon phul la rdo rje bsdams pa la sems ma rdo rje mas yongs su gzung ba'i rdo rje me tog gi lcug ma las/ oM badzra satwa hUM zhes
38b1(rgyud 'grel): lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ badzra u da ka hUM zhes bya ba yang bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad byas la/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' i spyan sngar gzhag go/ gnyis pa la yang rdo rje sems dpa' i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ 'jug pa'i sgor mngon par phyogs par bya zhing
38b2(rgyud 'grel): chu des bdag nyid dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /'jug ba'i dus su slob ma rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya bcing ba 'am/ 'ching du bzhug go/ dpal rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i bum pa la yang/ so so rang gi mtshan mas mtshan la/ de rnams kyi rang rang gi sngags brgya rtsa brgyad
38b3(rgyud 'grel): yongs su bzlas la/ dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi mtshams su gzhag par bya'o/ /de rnams kyi yang phyi rol tu ni bum pa gang ba'o/ /ma rnyed par gyur na bcu las nyung bar mi bya'o/ /zhes gsungs dpal rdo rje sems dpa' dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bum pa dang/ bum pa gang ba
38b4(rgyud 'grel): yod? dbul bar bya ste/ rdo rje sems dpa' dang/ rin po che dang/ chos dang/ las kyi rdo rjes mtshan la/ rang gi rigs kyi sngags brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bzlas pa'i bum pa bzhi dang/ bum pa gang ba bzhi dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad mngon sum lta bur bsams
38b5(rgyud 'grel): ? me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de/ phyag bzhi la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas/ sdom pa bzung la/ rdo rje sems ma ji lta ba bzhin du bcings la 'jug par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje chu ji lta bar 'thungs la/ bdag nyid la dbab par bya ste/ g.yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyis lag
38b6(rgyud 'grel): pa g.yas pa'i sems ma rdo rje ma'i gung mo yang du dral zhing/ a zhes bya bas ji lta ba bzhin du brtan par byas la/ dbab pa nas/ de nyid kyi ni rdo rje gzung/ /chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya/ /dam tshig gis ni phyag rgya cher/ /byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzla/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gyi cho
38b7(rgyud 'grel): ga sngar bshad pa rnams byas la/ 'og nas bshad pa'i tshigs su bcad pa lngas rjes su gnang ba dang gzengs bstod pa dang/ lung bstan pa dang/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' i sngags kyang blang bar bya'o/ /de nas bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas/ bdag rab tu dga' ba'i
39a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa ming gang yang rung ba brjod la/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings te/ de'i gnas su badzra d+hA tu a zhes pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i bdag nyid du phab la/ badzro haM zhes brjod do/ /de nas badzra d+hA tu ra haM byas pas rdo rje
39a2(rgyud 'grel): dbyings su bsgom par bya'o/ /de bzhin du rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la/ de'i gnas su badzra a be sha a zhes bya bas/ rdo rje dril bu bdag nyid phab ste/ badzra g+ha Na To haM/ de nas badzra A be shA haM zhes bya bas dril bu der bsgom par bya ste/ de ltar na rdo rjes bsgrubS
39a3(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje slob dpon sems dpa' rdo rje lcags kyu bcings nas ni/ /se gol mang po brdab bgyis la/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bgyi/ /oM badzra sa ma ya dza(rgyud 'grel): dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod do/ /de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /phyag rgya chen po bsgom byed
39a4(rgyud 'grel): cing/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni/ /lan gcig rab tu brjod par bgyi/ /de bzhin du rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas/ dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/ bcing pa dang/ dbang du byas la/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bskrad pa dang/ ra ba dang dra ba byas te/ dam tshig gi rdo rje khu tshur
39a5(rgyud 'grel): gyis dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bcad la/ yi ge gnyis kyi go chas bsrungs pas thams cad yang dag par bsrung nas/ mchod yon phul la sngon du 'gro ba'i dam tshig gis phyag rgya rnams kyis blta ba byas la/ dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho:sam ya stwaM sa ma ya stwaM a haM zhes brjod par bya zhing?
39a6(rgyud 'grel): rang rang gi snying po dang sngags kyis kyang mthar yang dag par bskul la/ chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis kyang rgyas btab ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa nas/ bskal pa bzang po'i mthar thug pa'i bar du dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyis kyang dbang
39a7(rgyud 'grel): bskur bar bya'o/ /de la rdo rje sems pa? la sogs pa'i rang gi snying po nyid chos kyi phyag rgya yin no/ /rdo rje dang/ rin po che dang chos dang las ma rnams kyi las kyi phyag rgya dang/ rgya chen po ni rdo rje la sogs pa'i nang du tshud pa'i bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin pa'am/ yang na de rnams
39b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i gzugs can no/ /g.yon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur bkan la/ lag pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong dang mdzub mo gnyis kyi mthe'u chung nas brtsams nas phye la/ thal mo khor stong du byas pa 'di ni/ byams pa la sogs pa'i dam tshig
39b2(rgyud 'grel): gi phyag rgya ste/ 'di rnams kyi rig pa ni sngar bshad pa yin no/ /rig pa de dag nyid de rnams kyi ljags la bkod pa 'di ni de rnams kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'o/ /yi ge a las rang gi thugs kar sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed la bris pa dang de'i rjes su mthun par/ de rnams phyag rgya chen
39b3(rgyud 'grel): por bcings pa ni/ de rnams kyi las kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro/ /rang gi snying kar rdo rje rtse lnga par bsams la/ bris pa dang rjes su mthun pa kho nar de rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o/ /rig ma de nyid kyang spyi'i yin no/ /de nas mchod yon phul nas mchod
39b4(rgyud 'grel): par bya ste/ ras zung 'bum mam gzung khri 'am/ zung stong dam/ zung brgya 'am/. zung re re 'am/ thams cad la spyir zung gcig dbul ba 'am/ bla re rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang/ grwa bzhir ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs gdags pa dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang ba dan rnams kyang yi ge oM
39b5(rgyud 'grel): dang? rdo rje sems dpa' lan bdun bzlas la dbul bar bya'o/ /me tog gi shing brgya 'am/ bzhi 'am/ me tog thams cad kyang snga ma bzhin du mngon par bzlas la/ oM badzra spha ra Na khaM zhes bya bas dbul bar bya'o/ /dri rig pa bzlas pa'i dris byugs la/ dri zhim pa'i dri bzang
39b6(rgyud 'grel): po thams cad dang/ bdug spos kyi rig pa bzlas pa'i/ ga pur dang a ka ru dang tu rus ska dang tsan dan la sogs pa legs par sbyar ba'i bdug pa btul ba'i spos snod 'bum mam/ khri 'am/ stod dam/ brgya dbul bar bya ste/ bcu las nyung ba ni mi bya'o/ /mar me'i snod
39b7(rgyud 'grel): 'bum mam/ khri'am stong dam/ brgya 'am bcu 'am/ bzhi la snga ma bzhin du mar me'i sngags bzlas pa dang/ swa sti ka la sogs pa'i lha bshos kyi kha zas bza' ba dang/ bca' ba rnam pa sna tshogs pas gang ba'i snod/ 'bum mam/ khri 'am/ stong dam/ brgya 'am/ bcu la ?
40a1(rgyud 'grel): kA ro mu khaM zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin du bzlas te/ lha thams cad la dbul bar bya'o/ /rol mo'i cha sbyang stong phrag snyed la yi ge hUM rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi lag pa'i sor mo rnams kyis rol mo brdung ba lta bu'i phyag rgya rnams kyis/ rol mo bcu po
40a2(rgyud 'grel): 'di lta ste/ pi wang dang/ gling bu dang/ rnga dang/ cang te'u dang/ cha lang dang/ rnga po tsha dang/ rdza rnga dang/ rnga rings dang/ guny+dza dang/ ti mi li dang/ brdung ba'i tshul du byed pas dbul bar bya'o/ /phyi rol tu gar mkhan dang/ rol mo pa dang/ cod pan dang/ gdu bu dang/ rna rgyan la sogs
40a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mchod pa rnams kyang/ oM dang hUM dang mngon par bzlas la dbul bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du dar dbyangs sbyangs par bya ba dang/ me tog gi phreng ba dang/ rnga yab kyis brgyan cing/ dra ba dang dra ba phyed pas spras pa/ zla ba phyed pas nye par mdzes par byas pa/ rta dang glang po che dang/
40a4(rgyud 'grel): ba lang gi khyu shin tu brtags pa rnams byang dbul bar bya'o/ /rta babs yid du 'ong ba'i dril bu la sogs pa dang bcas pa yang dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas sgeg mo la sogs pas kyang yang dag par mchod la/ dngos grub thams cad grub pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad
40a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi don mdzod cig ces de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /de nas sgrub pa'i grogs mchog dkyil 'khor du bzhag la phyi rol tu gtor ma sbyin par bya ste/ 'bras yos bcas shing til dang bcas/ /'bras chen me tog chu dang
40a6(rgyud 'grel): bcas/ /sran chan bcas shing mang du bya/ /snum khur la sogs bza' ba rnams ces bya ba'i gtor ma la/ a kA ra zhes bya ba la sogs pa bzlas nas/ shar phyogs nas brtsams nas/ gtong ma gsum gsum gtor bar bya zhing/ dri dang spos dang/ me tog dang/ mchod
40a7(rgyud 'grel): yon rnams kyang thog ma dang tha mar dbul bar bya'o/ /de la dang por re zhig maN+Dal rnams byed du gzhug par bya'o/ /de nas spyan drang ngo/ /de nas dam tshig bstan la/ mchod yon yang phul te/ dri la sogs pas legs par mchod la gtor ma phul te/ de nas gshegs su
40b1(rgyud 'grel): gsol bar bya'o/ /de la sngags dang phyag rgya ni 'di rnams yin te/ shar phyogs su kha bltas te/ rkang pa g.yas pa brkyang ba'i tshul gyis 'dug nas/ lag pa g.yon pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya bstan la/ g.yas pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya sta zur phyogs su bzhag ste g.yas pa'i mdzub mo'i lcags kyus
40b2(rgyud 'grel): spyan drang ba ni/ brgya byin spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de mdzub mo lcags kyu ltar ma byas pa ni brgya byin gyis dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /rkang pa g.yon brkyang ba'i tshul gyis 'dug la/ spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nas de'i sngags ni
40b3(rgyud 'grel): na mo badzra sya ce di shi di shi badzra pA Ni rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ me'i phyogs su bltas nas/ lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo zlum por bkug ste/ gung mo'i tshigs gsum par btsugs la/ mthe bong lag mthil du bzhag pa ni/ me lha spyan drang pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /spyan drang ba'i phyag rgyas mthe bong gi
40b4(rgyud 'grel): ngos la mdzub mo btsugs pa ni/ me lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo mthe bong ngos la btsugs te/ phyir dag tu brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /'di'i sngags ni/ agne e hye ka pi la a ka pi la/ dzwa la dzwA la da nya shi kha tod dU lA k+Sha swA hA/ gshin rje'i
40b5(rgyud 'grel): phyogs su bltas nas snyim pa bdun du bzhag ste/ sor mo phan tshun bsnol la khu tshur bcings nas/ srin lag gnyis bsgreng ste/ gshibs la g.yabs te/ de nang du bzhag pa ni gshin rje spyan 'dren pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /srin lag gnyis yang phyi rol tu de bzhin du gshibs te
40b6(rgyud 'grel): bsgred la snying gar bzhag pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las srin lag sbyar ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sngags ni/ ya ma ye swA hA/ bden bral gyi phyogs su bltas te/ rkang pa mnyam par 'dug la/ lag pa g.yas pa'i khu tshur bcangs pa la/ mdzub mo dang gung mo ral
40b7(rgyud 'grel): gri 'dra bar gshibs te bsgreng la bzhag/ lag pa g.yon pa yang de ltar byas te sta zur logs su bzhag la/ g.yon pa'i mdzub mo bkug ste/ g.yab pa ni bden bral spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid las g.yon pa sta zur logs su ral gri 'dra bar lbzhag pa ni/ bden
41a1(rgyud 'grel): bral gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sngags ni/ sarba b+hu ta b+ha yaM ka ra ku ru ku ru swA hA/ chu lha'i phyogs su rkang pa mnyam par 'dug la/ lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs nas/ mthe
41a2(rgyud 'grel): bong dang mdzub mo gnyis gcig tu sbyar te/ zhags mig ltar byas la/ g.yon pa'i khu tshur yang de ltar byas te/ snying gar bzhag la/ g.yas pa'i mdzub mos lcags kyus g.yabs pa ni/ chu lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid las g.yon pa'i mdzub mo khu tshul gyi tshul
41a3(rgyud 'grel): du bzhag pa las/ zhags mig ltar byas pa ni chu lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /g.yon pa'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang pa ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sngags ni/ tri tri pu sha/ tri tri shi gi to li bu rU pAk+Sha swA hA/ rlung lha'i phyogs su bltas te 'dug la lag pa g.yon pa khu tshur
41a4(rgyud 'grel): bcangs te/ gung mo bsgreng pa'i tshigs dang por/ mdzub mo bkug pa'i ther te gtsugs la/ lag pa g.yas kyang de bzhin du bya ste/ sta zur logs su bzhag ste/ mthe bong bsgul ba ni/ rlung lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya bya'o/ /de nyid las mthe bong snga ma bzhin du bzhag pa ni rlung
41a5(rgyud 'grel): lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mthe bong brkyang ba ni/ slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sngags ni/ oM sA saM khA khA khu kha swA hA/ ku be ra la mngon du bltas te 'dug nas/ lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar la/ rdo rje bcing ba nang du bzlog ste/ mthe'u chung gnyis
41a6(rgyud 'grel): gshibs la brkyang/ de'i rgyab tu srin la'o? gnyis so sor bzhag nas/ gung mo gnyis rdo rje ltar bkug ste/ g.yabs pa ni/ ku ber spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid las gung mo gnyis nang du rdo rje bcing ba'i tshul du bzhag pa de ni/ ku be ra'i dam tshig gi phyag
41a7(rgyud 'grel): rgya'o/ /spyan drang pa'i phyag rgya las/ gung mo gnyis brgyad pa ni slar btad pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /sngags ni/ oM ku be rA ya swA hA/ dbang ldan gyi phyogs su bltas te 'dug la/ lag pa gcig tu sbyar te/ thal mo sbyar pa byas la/ srin lag dang mthe'u chung nang du bkug ste/ bsnol la
41b1(rgyud 'grel): gung mo gnyis gshibs te bsgreng ba'i rgyab logs su mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje 'dra bar bya'o/ /mthe bong gnyis rab tu gshibs te bzhag la/ de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis phan tshun rtse mo sprang nas nang du g.yab pa ni/ dbang ldan gyi spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las snga ma bzhin du mdzub
41b2(rgyud 'grel): mo rdo rje'i tshul du bzhag pa ni/ dbang ldan gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sngags ni/ dzum dzum shi ba swA hA/ steng gi phyogs su bltas te 'dug la/ g.yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas 'dug la thal mo khong stong du
41b3(rgyud 'grel): sbyar te bzhag la/ steng du bltas te mdzub mo gnyis kyi lcags kyu ni/ tshangs pa la sogs pa spyan drang par bya'o/ /de nyid mdzub mo gnyis snga ma ltar bzhag pa ni/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /spyan drang pa'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni/ slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sngags
41b4(rgyud 'grel): 'di yin te/ oM ur d+haM prahma Na swA hA/ sU rgyu ya gra ha a d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ tsan+d+ra ya nak+Sha tra ya a d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ rkang pa gnyis mnyam par gnas pas 'dug la/ lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar te/ sor mo rnams par mtshams med par rtse mo phan tshun sbyar te/ mthe bong zlum por
41b5(rgyud 'grel): byas la/ 'og gi phyogs su bltas te/ sa'i lha mo la sogs pa mdzub mo'i lcags kyus spyan drang ba ni/ 'og gi lha spyan drang pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las/ snga ma bzhin du mdzub mo bzhag pa ni/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /mdzub mo gnyis btang ba ni slar btang
41b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sngags ni ? pri shwi de bya swA hA/ a su re b+hya:swA hA/ nA ge b+hya:swA hA/ de nas rang gi sngags de nyid kyis thams cad la 'thor 'thung phul la/ bdag dang slob ma'i tshogs su bcas pa la bgegs med par mdzod cing/ las kyi dngos grub kyang bdag la gsol tshig/
41b7(rgyud 'grel): ces brjod la thams cad slar gtong ngo/ /yang na dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa las byung pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis gtor ma dbul par bya ste/ lha dang lha min gnod sbyin lto 'phye grul/ /nam mkha' lding dang 'dab bzangs lus srul po/ /dri ja srin po gdon kyi rigs
42a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang/ /gang dag sa la gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul can/ /bu smad tshogs bcas g.yog 'khor bcas rnams la/ /bdag gi pus mo sa la btsugs nas su/ /thal mo sbyar te khyod la gsol 'debs kyis/ /gsan nas phan gdags phyir ni 'dir sbyon
42a2(rgyud 'grel): cig/ 'byung po gang dag ri rab steng gnas dang/ dga' ba'i tshal dang lha yi gnas rnams dang/ /shar nub ri dang nyi zla'i khyim rnams dang/ /ri bo kun la gang dag gnas pa dang/ /chu bo kun dang chu po'i mdo rnams dang/ /rin chen gnas na lhag par gnas pa dang//
42a3(rgyud 'grel): mcho dang rdzing dang lted ka'i chu ngogs dang/ /g.ya' chu gil ma can na gang gnas dang/ /grong dang phyug lhas grong khyer stong pa dang/ /khang stong dag dang lha yi khang pa dang/ /gtsug lag khang dam grong khyer gnas dag gam/ /dka' thub gnas dang glang chen bres dang ni//
42a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po'i dkor khang dag na gang gnas dang/ /lam srid bzhi mdo dag dang sum mdo dang/ /gang dag lam chen dang ni shing gcig drung/ /dur khrod chen po nags khrod chen po 'am/ /seng ge ded dang gcan zan gnas dag dang/ /'brog chen 'jigs su rung bar gang
42a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas dang/ /gang dag gling mchog dag na gnas pa dang/ /lhun po dur khrod dag na gnas pa rnams/ /rab tu dgyes te mgu bar gyur nas su/ /me tog phreng dang dri dang gdug pa dang/ /bstod dang gtor ma mar me gus 'bul bas/ /'di dag bzhes te btung zhing
42a6(rgyud 'grel): bsnams nas su/ /las 'di rnams kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod/ /de ltar gdon la mchod pa byas nas su/ /de nas phyogs skyob rnams la gtor ma sbyin/ /shar phyogs rdo rje can te lha tshogs bcas/ /gtor ma phul pa 'di dag bzhes su gsol/ me dang
42a7(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje bden bral srin po bdag/ chu bdag rlung bdag nor gyi bdag po ste/ /dbang ldan lha ste 'byung po'i bdag po dang/ /steng gi nyi zla tshangs pa chen po dang/ /lha rnams kun dang sa yi klu rnams dang/ /ri yi lha dang gnod sbyin tshogs rnams la/ /so so so sor
42b1(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma phul ba rnams/ /rab tu dgyes pa yis ne bzhes nas kyang/ /rang rang phyogs su legs par bzhugs nas su/ /rang gi bu smad mdza' bshes gnyen mdun dang/ /nang gi dmag dang dpung bcas thabs cig tu/ /me tog dri dang byug pa gtor mar bcas/ /'di rnams btung zhing legs
42b2(rgyud 'grel): par gsol nas kyang/ /bdag gi las 'di 'bras bu mchis par mdzod// //de nas nye reg byas la/ dpal rdo rje sems dpas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho gas/ sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad dbul lo/ /dpal rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i snying pos na/ sreg brugs? bdun
