153a4(rgyud 'grel): dza:hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): badzra dz+nyA na a d+hI tiSh+Tha swa mAM A(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod par bya ste/ sngags 'di dag dang bcas pas dang po byin gyis brlab pa byas la/ de'i 'og tu gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis byin gyis brlab pa dang/ dbang bskur ba dag bya'o/ /dkyil
153a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor chen po las gsungs pa ni ma byas kyang nyes par mi 'gyur ro/ /byas su zin kyang der shin tu byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa rnams kyang nges par bya ba yin pas dbang bskur ba la a b+hi Shiny+tsa mA
153a6(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i khyad par 'dis bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa sems dpa' rnams kyis thugs ka la sogs par bkod pas byin gyis brlab pa dang/ dbang bskur ba ni rgyud las gsungs pa'i
153a7(rgyud 'grel): rim pas bya ste/ snying ga rtsibs logs rgyab sbyor dang/ /de bzhin dpral ba la sogs dang/ /kha dang rna ba lhag pa dang/ /spyi bo dpral ba kha rgod bzhag ces bya ba dang/ snying ga dpal? ba kha spyi gtsug /'doms dang mig dang brang dang ni/ /brla
153b1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis dang ni pus mo gnyis/ /byin pa gnyis dang rkang gnyis so zhes bya ba'o/ /de la lkog ma'i phyogs su yi ge raM las du bsams la/ rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyis 'od zer gyi rang bzhin can de'i kha'i cha las byung ba'i lce h+rI(rgyud 'grel): las byung bar byin gyis

153b6(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba rdo rje bzhad pa byin gyis rlob par byed pa bsams la/ mtshan thams cad dang ldan pa'i so'i 'phreng ba bsgom par bya zhing/ so gsal bas rnam par spras pa'i khal mdun so gnyis su yi ge ho gnyis su 'og tu yang gnyis po nyid 'od
153b7(rgyud 'grel): zer dmar po'i tshogs kyi bkod pas rnam par 'phro ba bsam mo/ /mig g.yas su hUM ma hUM las rdo rje nyi ma rdo rje 'phreng du gnas pa'i tshad zungs kyi dbus su rnam par 'phro ba rnon pos dkrigs pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya'o/ /mig g.yon

154a2(rgyud 'grel): gi khyab pa mthong ba rnams kyang de lta bu'i rnam par dkrugs shing/ gzings pa de nyid rang gi lus la zhugs pas zhi bar thob par bsam mo/ /hUM zhes bya ba 'dis bsam la/ gtsug tor bskyed par bya'o/ /de'i dbus su yi ge b+huM dus mdza' i me 'bar ba
154a3(rgyud 'grel): ltar snang ba'i 'od kyis 'phro ba ma lus par bkang bar bsam mo/ /de nas kaM haM kaM zhes bya bas dbu rgyan gyi rtse mo'i mdza' nas brtsams te/ 'od zer ljang gu rnam par 'phro bas brgyan pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i tshogs kyi go cha chen po rkang pa'i

154b6(rgyud 'grel): gsal zhing 'od kyi tshogs 'phro ba 'dus par gyur pa las lha'i sku bsam par bya'o/ /yang na rang gi lus las phyung ste sngar bshad pa'i sngags kyi thugs kar mtshan nas gzhag par bya'o/ /de nas de ltar phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la phyogs
154b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhir sangs rgyas bzhi po 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa rang gi lus la bcug ste/ de phyung nas rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa bzhugs te/ byin gyis brlabs nas bzhugs par bsam mo/ /byams pa la sogs pa 'khor gyi tshogs rnams kyang phyogS
155a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhir? phyi rol gyi snam bu la bsam par bya ste/ de rnams kyang ming yi ge dang po las byung ba'o/ /de la 'di dag ni byams pa la sogs pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ byams pa dang/ mthong ba don yod dang/ dan song kun 'dren dang/ mya ngan dang
155a2(rgyud 'grel): mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros dang/ spos kyi glang po dang/ dpa' bar 'gro ba dang/ nam mkha' mdzod dang/ ye shes tog dang/ 'od dpag tu med pa dang/ zla ba'i 'od dang/ bzang skyod dang/ dra ba can kyi 'od dang/ rdo rje snying po
155a3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ blo gros mi bzang ba dang/ spobs pa brtsegs pa dang/ kun tu bzang po ste/ de dag la sogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi bdag nyid mchod bar gyur par bsam mo/ /de nas yi ge shaM gyis 'gro ba thams cad stong par byas nas rdo rje rlung
155a4(rgyud 'grel): gi dkyil 'khor nas brtsams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs bskyed pa'i ngo bo nyid du rim pa 'dis bskyed la/ 'gro ba rnams byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ hUM yaM hUM zhes bya ba rdo rje rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi'o/ /hUM baM hUM zhes bya ba
155a5(rgyud 'grel): ni de nyid kyi steng du chu'i dkyil 'khor gyi'o/ /hUM raM hUM zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi steng du me'i dkyil 'khor gyi'o/ /de'i steng du yi ge khaM las rnam par snang mdzad bsams la/ de nyid kyi sku'i yan lag dang nyid lag gi ba spu'i bu ga rnams las byung
155a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i char gyi rgyun sbom po dpag tu med pa 'bebs pa gtong bas snod kyi 'jig rten ma lus bar chus yongs su gang bar byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyang de nyid du thim par gyur par bsams nas/ me dang chu'i dkyil 'khor dag gi bar du hUM laM
155a7(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes bya ba bkod la/ de bskol ba sngon du 'gro bas/ 'dus pa'i ting nge 'dzin brtan par gyur pa'i mthus/ sa'i dkyil 'khor dpag tu med par bsam par bya'o/ /de'i steng du yi ge khaM las phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa
155b1(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ba'i gzhal yas khang chen po rnam par bsam par bya'o/ /de'i dbus su seng+ge'i gdan chen po la sogs pa phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi grangs dang mnyam par sngar bshad pa'i sa bon gyi yi ge la bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams
155b2(rgyud 'grel): dpag tu med pa las yang dag par 'dus par gyur pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lta 'bye chen po la sogs pa'i sems can gyi
155b3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mchod par gyur pa dang/ bstod par gyur cing gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan la sogs pa rnams dang/ glu dang/ gar dang/ rol mo la sogs rnams kyis 'khor ba thams cad kyi bdag por gyur pa
155b4(rgyud 'grel): rjes su thob cing 'gro ba'i don la de 'jug par gyur par bdag nyid bsam mo/ /der zhugs nas 'jug ste/ gnas ji lta ba bzhin du mdun du de bzhin du gzhal yas khang chen po bsams te/ sngar bshad pa'i sa bon nyid las stan dang/ phyag rgya bzhi'i
155b5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i sku bskyed la/ rim pa 'dis lha rnams spyan drangs par bya ste/ rdo rje se gol gyi phyag rgya bcings la/ rang gi snying ga las yi ge ho dang A(rgyud 'grel): badzra d+ha tu ho(rgyud 'grel): dza(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba 'di dag las rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du steng gi phyogs su
155b6(rgyud 'grel): song bar gyur bar bsams la/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar rjes su zhugs par bsam par bya'o/ /de la yi ge ho zhugs nas yongs su mnyes par byed do/ /yi ge A(rgyud 'grel): yis ni de rdzogs par byed par byin gyis rlob la
155b7(rgyud 'grel): ? gzi byin bskyed pa dang/ thugs su chud pa bya ba dag byed do/ /badzra d+hA tu zhes bya ba'i sgras ni rigs bzhi'i ngo bo nyid du byin gyis rlob par byed do/ /yi ge ho(rgyud 'grel): yis ni yang yongs su mnyes par byed do/ /yi ge dza(rgyud 'grel): ni de nyid kyi snying po'i yi ge
156a1(rgyud 'grel): A(rgyud 'grel): bcings nas 'gugs par byed do/ /rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgya yang bcings la/ bcom ldan 'das bsdu ba sku mdog dkar po 'od zer gyi chogs kyi khams gsum ma lus pa 'gengs pa de las byung ba rang gi rnam pa lta bu'i lha'i
156a2(rgyud 'grel): gzugs rnam par bsams la rang nyid kyang yi ge dza(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba'i rdo rje lcags kyu phyag na bsnams pa bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar zhugs la/ gzhan rnams ni lha gzhan gyi thugs ka dang/ 'jig rten pa rnams la zhugs pas bcom ldan 'das 'gro
156a3(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyis yongs su bskor ba spyan 'dren bar bsam mo/ /bcom ldan 'das byon pa nam mkha' i ngos la 'od zer gyis tshegs 'byin par mdzad pas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa dngos grub kyi mchog thob
156a4(rgyud 'grel): par mdzad cing zhal rab tu 'dzum pa dang/ nyid kyi dkyil 'khor la mngon par phyogs te byon nas dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bsam mo/ /de nas yid kyis rang gi phyag rgya bzhi bzhag nas/ yang bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje 'chang gi glu dang mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad
156a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi bstong par bya ste/ rdo rje'i dbyings kyi sems dpa' che/ /sems can don mchog bdag nyid de/ /shAkya'i rgyal po ye shes che/ /rdo rje bdag nyid khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sems dpa' 'byung ba de nyid don/ /sems can rgyu ste tshul chen po/ /sems can don
156a6(rgyud 'grel): chen dgongs pa'i don/ /sems dpa' sems dpa' khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas chos te chos chen po/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba/ /smra ba chen po rang rigs mchog /sems dpa' chen po khyod phyag 'tshal/ /las chen bsrung ba chen po ste/
156a7(rgyud 'grel): las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa/ /nyid chen sems can spyod pa mchog /sems dpa' rgyu khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /pha rol phyin pa kun brnyes pa/ /kun mkhyen ye shes mkhyen pa po/ /shes rab chen po khyod phyag 'tshal/ /thugs rje chen po mchog gi mchog
156b1(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje thugs rje'i bdag nyid de/ /thams cad gtong ba byams pa che/ /kun mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shAkya sing+ge shAkya che/ /shAkya'i shAkya thub pa che/ /'dul ba chen po khyab pa po/ /'gro don 'dul mchog khyod phyag 'tshal/ /chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam
156b2(rgyud 'grel): brnyes pa/ /chos dbyings de bzhin gshegs pa ste/ /rdo rje mgon po mgon chen po/ /sems can tshogs ni khyod phyag 'tshal/ /'od chen snang ba chen po ste/ /brtson 'grus chen po stobs chen po/ /dpal ba chen po rab dpa' mchog /bde spyod dpa' ba khyod phyag
156b3(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal/ /tshangs par dbyung bcom ldan 'das/ /shAkya dpa' bo thub pa che/ /kun bdag thub pa dag pa yi/ /chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nam mkha' i sku ste sku'i mchog /sku gsum sku min ston pa po/ /kun gyi sku ste sku che ba/ /rdo rje'i sku khyod phyag 'tshal lo//
156b4(rgyud 'grel): gsung min gsung ste gsung gi mchog /gsung gsum gsung min ston pa po/ /gsung kun shin tu gsung che ba/ /rdo rje'i gsung khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems min sems te sems kyi mchog /sems gsum sems min ston pa po/ /kun gyi sems te sems
156b5(rgyud 'grel): che ba/ /rdo rje'i sems khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje ma yin rdo rje'i mchog /rdo rje gsum pa rdo rje spyod/ /rdo rje thams cad rdo rje che/ /rdo rje rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal/ /kun khyab srid pa'i rtse mo mchog /bde gshegs bdag po rgyal ba ni/ /khams gsum pa yi rgyal po che/
156b6(rgyud 'grel): snang mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag ni/ /gang gi lan cig nyan byed dam/ /klog gam yang na bsgom yang rung/ /kun gyis sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur/ /de nas rim pa 'di phab ste/ /gzugs brnyan la zhugs pa dang/ bcing ba dang/ mnyes
156b7(rgyud 'grel): pa byas nas bzhugs su gsol lo/ /rdo rje khu tshur bcings la lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyur byas te/ kha phyir bltas par bzhag la/ g.yon pa'i mthe'u chung bkug ste g.yas pa'i mdzub mo'i drung du bzhag la dgug par bya zhing de yang lha rnams spyan
157a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dren pa'i tshul gyis gzhag pa ni rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya ste/ 'di'i sngags ni badzra aM ku sha dza(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ste 'dis bkug nas rang gi sku'i gzugs brnyan gyi mdun du thugs ka dang nye bar bzhugs par bsam mo/ /rdo rje khu tshur

157a3(rgyud 'grel): brnyan ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su mthun pa rnams la yang dag par zhugs par gyur par bsam mo/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis po nyid kyi mdzub mo gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis lcags sgrog bcing pa'i tshul du bcing ba ni rdo rje lcags sgrog gi phyag rgya ste/ 'di'i sngags

157a6(rgyud 'grel): bas na/ /dang por dam tshig gi phyag rgya nyid bstan par bya'o/ /lha dang lha mo 'di dag thams cad kyi rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni thugs kar rang gi sa bon gyi yi ge rnams bsams la/ sngags dang bcas pa brjod par bya'o/ /de la 'di dag ni dam tshig

157b2(rgyud 'grel): gzugs can nyid du bsam par bya'o/ /dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ba'i dus su ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya la yid kyi dmigs par bya'o/ /las kyi phyag rgya bstan ba'i dus su ni las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis te 'di ni khyad par yin no/ /rdo rje sgeg mo'i ni rdo rje dang

159a7(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlabs nas/ sems can thams cad kyi skyabs mdzad par rnam par dag pa nyid du mdzad par bsam par bya'o/ /rdo rje sems ma ni rdo rje'i nang du chud pa sku mdog dkar ba de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i cod pan can/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par
159b1(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa/ bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa'i rdo rje rigs byin gyis brlab par mdzad par gnas shing sa gnon gyi phyag rgya bzhugs par bsam par bya'o/ /rin chen sems ma rin po che'i nang du chud pa sku mdog ser po/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i cod pan dang
159b2(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad kyi thun mong ste khyad par brjod par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ni rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bdag la byin gyis rlob par bzhed pa/
159b3(rgyud 'grel): mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgyas bzhugs par bsam mo/ /chos kyi sems ma ni pad+ma'i nang du chud pa/ sku mdog dmar ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs dang/ chos kyi rigs kyi dbang bskur bar byed pa ting nge 'dzin mchog gi phyag
159b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas bzhugs par bya'o/ /las kyi sems ma ni sna tshogs rdo rje'i nang du chung pa bcom ldan 'das kyi las kyi phyag rgya byin gyis rlob par byed pa dang las kyi rigs kyi dbang bskur ba stsol ba/ mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag rgyas bzhugs par bsam par
159b5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /rdo rje sgeg mo ni sku mdog dkar po bcom ldan 'das la sgeg pa la sogs pas dka' ba'i mchod pa byed pa/ g.yon phyogs su cung zad 'dud par byed cing mngon par 'dod pa dang bcas pas blta bar byed par bsam mo/ /rdo rje phreng ba ma ni mdog
159b6(rgyud 'grel): ser po rdo rjes mtshan pa'i me tog gi phreng ba phyag gi pad+ma gnyis kyis bsnams pa/ bcom ldan 'das la rin po che'i dbang bskur ba ston par bsam par bya'o/ /rdo rje glu mkhan ma ni sku mdog dmar mo rdo rjes mtshan pa'i pi wang thogs te de bzhin gshegs
159b7(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad kyi chos kyi phung po ston par byed pa ste/ ji ltar pad+ma rab dmar ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa de kho na nyid ston pa'i tshig gis de kho na nyid ston par bsam par bya'o/ /rdo rje gar mkhan ma ni sku mdog ljang gu me tog gi thal mo la sogs pa'i
160a1(rgyud 'grel): kar thabs kyis dga' ba'i yid 'phrog pa'i yan lag bskyed pa dang rjes su 'brel pa yan lag can dang tshig can dang/ rjes su mtshon pa dang/ sems dpa' i tshul gyi sgo'i chags pa'i nyams dang ldan bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gar
160a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'khor lo 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med par gar mdzad pa/ de bzhin g+hsegs pa ma lus pa byang chub sems dpa' i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyidkyil 'khor dang bcas pa la rab tu 'jug cing sgeg pa la sogs pa'i mchod pa'ang byed par bsam par bya'o/ /lha mo bdug
160a3(rgyud 'grel): pa ma ni u tpal sngon po 'dab ma lta bu'i mdog can bdug spos kyi sprin rab tu 'dzin cing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thugs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes bskul bar byed par
160a4(rgyud 'grel): bsam par bya'o/ /rdo rje me tog ma ni sku mdog ser mo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan kyi me tog gis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la kun tu 'thor bar byed par bsam par bya'o/ /rdo rje mar me ma ni sku mdog dmar mo
160a5(rgyud 'grel): phyag na mar me thogs te/ de nyid nas 'jig rten kyi khams dpag tu med par nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i 'od la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid kyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang/ bcas pa dang/
160a6(rgyud 'grel): nyan thos dang/ rang rgyal ba dang/ lha dang/ klu thams cad dang/ de las bzhan pa snod kyi 'jig rten dag kyang shin tu gsal bar gyur par bsam par bya'o/ /rdo rje dri ni mdog ljang gu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/
160a7(rgyud 'grel): shes rab dang/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dri chen po sems can thams cad la gyug par byed par bsam par bya'o/ /rdo rje lcags kyu ni sku mdog dkar po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren par
160b1(rgyud 'grel): byed pa/ sems can thams cad su stegs kyi lam las bzlog ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes la mngon par phyogs par sems 'dren par byed par bsam par bya'o/ /rdo rje zhags pa ni sku mdog ser po zhags pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
160b2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor du bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi lam la 'dzud par bsam par bya'o/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog ni sku mdog dmar ba rdo rje lcags sgrog gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byin gyis rlobs par byed pa dang/ sems can
160b3(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa thams cad yongs su mnyes par byed pa dang/ sems can bya'o/ /rdo rje dril bu ni sku mdog ljang gu snying rje dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin gyi rdo rje dang dril bus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yongs su mnyes par byed pa dang/ sems can rnams kyang
160b4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi lam la gnas par byed par ma bsam par bya'o/ /de dag gi las kyi phyag rgya ni 'di dag yin te/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la g.yon pa'i mdzub mo sgreng la g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyi nang du bcug pa 'di ni byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya zheS bya
160b5(rgyud 'grel): ste/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi phrin las kyi ngo bo nyid do/ /rang gi snying gar sna tshogs rdo rje dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar yang sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la/ lce'i dbus su yi ge hUM las rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsgoms te/ las kyi phyag rgya bstan par bya
160b6(rgyud 'grel): zhing/ sngar bstan pa'i sngags brjod par bya ste/ de bzhin du las kyi phyag rgya thams cad la yang shes par bya'o/ /rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa rnams kyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du dam tshig gi phyag rgya med cing las kyis phyag rgya yang bstan pa med pas/
160b7(rgyud 'grel): mi bskyod pa la sogs pa dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang/ de bzhin du las kyi phyag rgya de dag kyang de dang tha mi dang pa yin par shes par bya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur brla g.yon pa'i rtsa bar bzhag la/ g.yas pa bus mo g.yas
161a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i steng du brkyang nas lag pa thur du bstas pas sa la reg pa lta bur bzhag pa ni sa gnon gyi phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya 'di nyid bcings la lag pa g.yas pa gan rkyal du byas te/ lag pa g.yas pa la gnas pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor
161a2(rgyud 'grel): bu'i char 'bebs pas mchog stsol ba'i tshul du gzhag pa ni mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis pa dbang?  bzhag ste snyoms par zhugs pa bzhin du gnas pa ni ting nge 'dzin mchog gi phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la g.yon pa
161a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yon logs su snga ma bzhin du bzhag nas/ g.yas pa ba ngan gyi lag pa'i tshul du bzhag la mi 'jigs sbyin pa ltar bdag dang nye bar 'jog pa ni mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag rgya ste/ 'di dag ni rim pa ji lta bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs
161a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la/ brla rtsa gnyis su bzhag ste g.yon phyogs su btung la sna tshogs rdo rje la sogs pa rnams kyang sngar bshad pa bzhin du bsam par bya'o/ /de bzhin du 'og ma rnams la yang mgo la 'phreng ba 'ching
161a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i tshul du las kyi phyag rgya snga ma bzhin du shes par bya ste/ de rnams kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba yin la/ 'di dag ni rdo rje khu tshur las byung ba yin pas na khyad par ni de dag yod do/ /de nas rim pa 'di rdo rje bdug pa ma la
161a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa phyi rol gyi mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod cing dkyil 'khor gsang pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis kyang mchod par bya ste/ snying gar sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la de'i 'og tu rdo rje bdug pa ma la sogs pa'i sa bon gyi yi ge bsams
161a7(rgyud 'grel): la/ de spros pa las bdag nyid rdo rje bdug pa ma la sogs pa'i gzugs su yongs su gyur par bsams nas lag pas las kyi phyag rgya bcings te/ de'i dus su de nyid kyi sngags 'don cing 'khor ba thams cad du spros nas rdo rje gdug pa ma la
161b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i gzugs kyi sngar bshad pa'i las rnams byas nas mchod par bya'o/ /de nas yang dag par bsdus nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang na gnas pa'i rdo rje bdug pa ma la sogs pa la gzhug cing bcings pa dang/ dbang du byas te bzhag
161b2(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /de bzhin du rdo rje gar mkhan ma'i bar thams cad kyi mchod par bya ste/ rang gi sa bon gyi yi ge yongs su gyur pa sngon du song pa las rang gi lha'i gzugs su gyur te snga ma bzhin du gnas so/ /de nas bstod pas mchod par bya ste/ rdo rje sems
161b3(rgyud 'grel): dpal bsdus? pa na/ /rdo rje rin chen bla na med/ /rdo rje chos ni glung blangs pa/ /rdo rje las kun byed pa'o/ /zhes bya ba'i rkang pa re re dang gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dus su sgeg mo la sogs pa dang rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du rkang pa bzhi dang glu blang bar shes par bya'o/ /
161b4(rgyud 'grel): gzugs sogs 'dod pa'i bde ba dam pa'i thugs/ /bcom ldan khyod ni glur bar bsdus pa ste/ /bdag la deng ni dga' bde kun mdzod cig /dam pa'i bdag nyid cho ga bzhin myur grub/ /de nas bsgom pa 'di dag byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
161b5(rgyud 'grel): cad kyis byin gyis rlob par mdzad pa/ bsod nams kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa la rab tu 'jug pa'i glu chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byin gyis brlabs pa glur len cing bstod pas mchod par bya'o/ /rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa 'ang rang gi sa don
161b6(rgyud 'grel): las spro? bar bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig pa'i lha mo rnams kyi rang rang gi nga rgyal dang ldan pas rang dang rjes su mthun pa'i mchod pa la brtson pas 'gro ba ma lus par bkang la glu blang bar bya'o/ /ji skad du /de nas de nyid dam pa
161b7(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /thad pa thams cad rmongs pa yi/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i bdag nyid la/ /glu 'di yis ni bskul bar bya/ /rjes su chags pa'i rnam mang dga' ba'i padmo yi/ /rnam par dag pa'i mchod pas gsal bar rjes su mchod byas pa /mchog tu rtag pa'i rnal
162a1(rgyud 'grel): 'byor bde bas bde ba grub par mdzod/ /kye ma'o mchog tu bde ba dam tshig ngo bo nyid/ /mchog tu bde ba'i shin tu rnal 'byor skal bzangs mchog /dgyes pa rang gi dam tshig skyon med rtag la rol cig rol cig ho/ /kye ma'o mchog
162a2(rgyud 'grel): tu gsang ba'i bdag po rang gi dam tshig yin pa'i phyir/ /rab tu gsang ba'i lha mo mchog rnams so/ /'gro ba'i rgyud ni rnam pa sna tshogs gdul bar gsal bar mkhyen/ /dam tshig thams cad dngos po brtan g.yo kun gyi ngo bor gyur/ /rgyal ba
162a3(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi bdag nyid rnal 'byor bde ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'o/ /kye ma dam pa rtag pa'i dngos grub chen po rab tu bsgrubs la ston/ /dza:hUM baM ho:kye ma'o bde mchog bde ba drongs/ /rnam par sprul hUM snang bar mdzod/ /a la la ho/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi//
162a4(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro sgyu ma sna tshogs kyis/ slob mar rab tu gzhug tu gsol/ /glu yi rgyal po 'di dag gis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal la bstod/ /kun gyi sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub/ /glu 'di dag ni len pa na/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad du//
162a5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thams cad rnam 'phrul ba/ /ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub/ /rab tu dga' ba'i bdag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa grub par mdzod/ /oM hUM/ dam tshig dam pa 'grub par mdzad du gsol/ /mchod pa chen po thams cad
162a6(rgyud 'grel): 'grub par mdzod/ /oM hUM/ mchod pa chen po thams cad 'grub par mdzod/ /glu yi phyag rgya 'di ni dpal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la gnas te/ /mchod pa ma lus lus med pa'i/ /rab 'byams las la sbyar du rung/ /gang dag grub par ma gyur dang/ /mdzod
162a7(rgyud 'grel): pa dag kyang mi 'byor pa/ /phyag rgya 'di yis mchod byas pa/ /mchod pa thams cad myur du 'grub/ /de nas dkyil 'khor 'di dag thams cad rang rang gi snying ga'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya la gzhug par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i phyag rgya
162b1(rgyud 'grel): bcings la/ A:badzra d+hA tu dza:hUM baM ho:badzra dz+nyA na ? brgya rtsa brgyad brjod par bya'o/ /de nas rim pa 'dis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor phyung la bzhag par bya ste/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi spyi gtsug nas phyung ste/ snga ma bzhin du gzhag la/ sngags brjod nas de'i
162b2(rgyud 'grel): mthar dri Dha badzra tiSh+Tha zhes brjod la brtan par bya'o/ /oM badzra muSh+Ti bi zhes bya ba phyag rgya dang bcas pas kyang byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /phyag rgya yang rdo rje dril bu dang 'dra bar thad kar bcing bar shes par bya'o/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor gzhag nas dbang bskur bar 'dod
162b3(rgyud 'grel): na/ dung gi? nang du spos kyi chu sngar bshad par gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa bzhag la rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mas dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya'o/ /der spos chu phyag rgya bzhi'i lha rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i dbang bskur ba yang blang bar bya
162b4(rgyud 'grel): zhing bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer pad+ma'i dra ba stong phrag gi dbang bskur bar gyur cing byin gyis brlabs par bdag nyid bsam par bya'o/ /de nas rgyud phyi ma'i rim pas dkyil 'khor gyi sgo'i phyogs
162b5(rgyud 'grel): gcig tu 'dug la bsgom par bya ba 'am/ rdo rje bzlas pas bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de nas bsgoms pa yang dag par bsdus la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po de nyid du gzhug par bya'o/ /lha gzhan rnams ni rang gi dkyil 'khor
162b6(rgyud 'grel): gyi lha'i nang nyid du gzhug la/ de ltar gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas tha mi dad par gyur nas rang gi lus kyi byin gyis rlab par byed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byin gyis rlob par mdzad pa'i phyir dang/ gzi byin bsrung bar mdzad pa'i phyir dang/ gzi byin
162b7(rgyud 'grel): bskyed par bya ba'i phyir dang/ bskul bar bya ba'i phyir dang/ rang gi lus nyid kyi mchog dga' ba'i bde ba bskyed par bya ba'i phyir yang dag par bsgom par bya'o/ /baM aM a:aoM hUM/ zhes bya ba 'di kha sbyar gyis sbyor bas bdag dang dkyil 'khor bsgom
163a1(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ rgyud phyi ma'i las gsungs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du bsgrub pa bshad par bya ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa'i sa'i rdul phra rab kyi tshul nam mkha' dang rnam par shes pa la sogs par bsgom pa rnams kyi
163a2(rgyud 'grel): snang ba'i ngo bo nyid du bsams la/ rang gi sa bon gyi yi ge spros pa las phyag rgya'i lha'i sku rang gi lha'i gzugs byin gyis brlabs nas/ yang rang gi lus kyi phyag rgya chen po la bcug la/ de'i bde ba'i reg pa nyams su myong ba'i rang gi sa bon gyi yi ge
163a3(rgyud 'grel): snying gar bzhag la/ byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /de ltar ji srid lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du byas na 'di dag thams cad brtan par 'gyur te/ bag chags tsam du yang 'gro ba gzhan yin par bsam par mi bya'o/ /de ltar bslabs na rim gyi ting nge
163a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin dang/ gzungs dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa dang/ rnam par thar pa dang/ sa dang/ ye shes rim gyis 'gyur ba la rtsom par 'gyur ro/ /de la ro myong bar gyur nas rim gyi sangs rgyas nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /gal te de ltar mi 'dod na de'i tshe
163a5(rgyud 'grel): snying gar zla ba'i cha sa bon gyi yi ge las bskyed la de nyid brtan par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub kyi sems rdo rje dang/ chos kyi phyag rgya dang/ las kyi phyag rgya rnams snga ma brtan par byas la rim gyi bsgrub par bya'o/ /gal te rdo rje phra mo bsgoms pas sems
163a6(rgyud 'grel): nyid brtan par bya bar bsgrub par 'dod na/ de'i tshe dpal rdo rje 'byung ba'i rim pa'i man ngag gi rdo rje phra mo bskyed pa bslabs la bsgom par bya ste/ gzhan du na mig la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams rnam par g.yeng bar 'gyur bar byin gyis brlabs par mi
163a7(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur zhing dngos grub 'grub par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /de ltar ji srid du rim pa 'di nyid kyis bsgoms na mtshams med pa lnga byed pa'am/ dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams kyang lo gcig gis sangs rgyas su 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan du na rdo rje slob dpon
163b1(rgyud 'grel): smod pa rnams ni ma yin no/ /gal te de kho na nyid gsang ba'i de kho na nyid sbas pa'i rim gyis myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob par 'dod na/ de'i tshe dpal rdo rje 'byung ba nyid lan mang du mnyan par byas la/ de nyid kyi tshig 'di dag legs par rtogs nas/ de nyid
163b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi rim pa nyid kyis sems so sor rtog pa la sogs pa'i rim pas bdag nyid bskyed la de las bshad pa'i bsgom pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas nyid bsgom par bya zhing/ de las bshad pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bcu gnyis pa rdo
163b3(rgyud 'grel): rje 'dzin pa'i sa bskyed par bya ba'i phyir bsgom pa'i rim pa de yang 'di nyid du shes par bya ste/ dang po kho nar rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor yang dag par rdzogs par gyur pa rjes su dran la/ 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya lag pas bcings nas/ Tak+ki hUM dza:
163b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod la/ bcom ldan 'das spros nas srid pa gsum po ma lus par 'bar bas kun tu bkang ste/ bdag nyid kyi gzugs kyi 'khor ba thams cad du 'jug pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su yang dag par 'gro bar gyur cing/ lag pa bzhi las lag pa'i
163b5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyis 'dod chags kyi mda' rna ba'i mthar thug gi bar du 'dren cing/ 'dzin pa dang/ lag pa gzhan gyi rdo rje 'bar pa dang/ rdo rje lcags kyu'i dril bu 'dzin cing smin ma 'degs par byed pa dang/ dpral ba'i dbyes bsnyer pas rnam par 'phro zhing thugS
163b6(rgyud 'grel): rjes gnod mdzes lta bur g.yon brkyang ba'i gnas bar byed pa dang/ phun sum tshogs pa dang rjes su mthun bar spyod pa rnams kyi drag po'i nyams phyi rol tu gsal bar byed cing sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
163b7(rgyud 'grel): dpag tu med pa rnams su phyogs bcur yang song ste/ bskal pa grangs med pa gsum mam/ bdun gyi bar gyis gang pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang/ sa bcu yongs su thob par sbyang bar byas te/ sangs rgyas kyi sa rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa rnams su de rnams kyi sems
164a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dod chags kyi mdas rab tu bsnun la rdo rje lcags kyus drangs nas/ rdo rje dril bus mnyes par byas te/ spyan drangs nas mdun du yang dag par bzhag ste/ brtan par byas nas gnas par gyur par bsam par bya'o/ /de yang 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i
164a2(rgyud 'grel): gzugs kyi rang gi snying gar zhugs par bsam par bya'o/ /de nas rim gyis pha rol tu phyin pa dang sa nas brtsams te/ grangs ji lta ba bzhin du 'og nas bshad pa'i sa bon rnams las sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa rnams bskyed la/ rang gi phyag rgya bzhi la gzhug
164a3(rgyud 'grel): par bya zhing/ thim par gyur par bsam par bya ste/ de la dang po kho nar pha rol tu phyin pa dang po cig gzhug par bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu sa dang po/ /de'i 'og tu pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis pa/ de'i 'og tu sa gnyis pa ste/ de bzhin du gzhug pa'i rim pa
164a4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la yang shes par bya'o/ /de la pha rol tu phyin pa rnams ni rdo rje phreng ba ma'i gzugs kyi zhugs par bsam par bya'o/ /sa rnams kyang rdo rje sgeg mo'i gzugs kyis gzhug par bya'o zhes man ngag las bshad do/ /de nas de rnams
164a5(rgyud 'grel): bcug la thams cad kyi 'og tu rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa sgeg mo la sogs pa'i rim gyis rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i bar du ste/ de dag kyang sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan la gnas pas dbang bskur ba byas la snga ma bzhin du byin gyis brlabs nas bzhugS?
164a6(rgyud 'grel): par bsam par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya snying ga nas byung bas bdag nyid dbang bskur bar byas la snying po 'dis brtan par bya ste/ oM badzra ratna a b+hi Shiny+tsa sarba mu draM mai tri DhI ku ru ba ra ka ba tse na baM/ zhes bya'o/ /nyin re zhing yang sbyor?
164a7(rgyud 'grel): ba 'di bsgom par gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rang nyid byon nas/ 'khor ba thams cad kyi bsod nams dang ye shes la dbang byed pa'i ngo bo nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur bar gyur pa ni rgyun mi
164b1(rgyud 'grel): 'chad ba dang mi 'jigs pa'i man ngag go /de nas de rnams kyi sa bon gyi yi ge rnams ni 'di dag yin te/ daM shaM k+ShaM baM daM pra:aoM h+raM iM iM aM ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi'o/ /thaM b+h+ruM b+h+raM b+h+ra:b+h+ro b+h+ra b+h+ri b+h+ru b+h+ri:b+h+ru b+h+ruM/ zhes bya ba ni kun tu bzang po'i mthar thug pa'i
164b2(rgyud 'grel): sa rnams kyi'o/ /hUM traM h+rI:aM a:zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems ma nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i mthar thug pa'i bar gyi ste/ de dag thams cad kyis bcu gnyis pa rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa nyid shes par bya ste/ gang sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor
164b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rgyud las kyang/ sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyis dngos/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu zhugs/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs ba'i phyir ro/ /lha'i khang pa nas langs
164b4(rgyud 'grel): pa na yang/ phung po lnga rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa lngas byin gyis brlabs la ldang bar bya'o/ /langs nas kyang g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur gos kyi g.yogs la/ bsgom pa 'am bzlas pa bya zhing 'jig rten gyi tha snyad thams cad kyang mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i
164b5(rgyud 'grel): sbyor pas spyod lam rnam bzhir bya ste/ ji skad du dpal mchog dang po'i rgyud las kyang/ 'gred dam yang na 'dug kyang rung/ /'chag gam ji ltar gnas pa dang/ /rgod dam rab tu smra ba 'am/ /gang dang gang yin ji lta bar/ /dang po rdo rje khu tshur bcing//
164b6(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa'i lag pa g.yogs nas ni/ /mnyam par ma bzhag sbyor ba yis/ /snying po'i don du bzlas pa bya/ /cho ga 'di ni 'dod pa bzhi'i sbyor ba la sogs pas bya ste/ khyad par gyi ye shes phul du byung ba thob pas ni lan cig mngon par 'dus byas
164b7(rgyud 'grel): nas bsgom pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i sems kyi bya ba la nyes pa med do/ /thugs rjes 'byung ba zhes bya ba bsgom pa dang bzlas pa'i cho ga slob dpon chen po ye shes rdo rje'i zhal snga nas mdzad ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan 
165a1(rgyud 'grel): po sh+rad+d+ha ka ra parma dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bcos shing bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o// //spyan dbye ba'i cho ga bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ pra tiSh+Tha bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ spyan dbye ba'i cho ga/
165a2(rgyud 'grel): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shes bya'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pa/ /skad cig gis ni khyab mdzad pa/ /thugs rje'i char ldan 'gro ba'i skyabs/ /'jam dpal dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /slob dpon mtshan nyid ldan pa dang/ /bstan
165a3(rgyud 'grel): bcos kun la 'jigs med pas/ /lha yi gzugs la dmigs pa dang/ /ras bris la sogs bzlas shing bsgom/ /blo dang ldan pa gang zhig ni/ /bsod nams gzhan ni byed 'dod la/ /de ni rnal 'byor rgyud rnams kyi/ /rjes su mthun par 'di brjod bya/ /
165a4(rgyud 'grel): dang por khrus byas lus dris byugs/ /gtsang zhing dag pa'i gos gyon te/ /rgyu skar bzang po ldan pa la/ /mchod pa'i yo byad 'byor par bya/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan la sogs dang/ /bla bre mchog ni bre bya zhing/ /bkra shis rnams kyis brgyan pa yin//
165a5(rgyud 'grel): bum pa gang ba bzhag par bya/ /pi wang gling bu rdza rnga sogs/ /glu gar dga' ston cher bya zhing/ /tsan dan a kar nag pos byug /ma tog sil ma dgram par bya/ /gnas ni nyams dga' 'du 'dzi med/ /nyes pa thams cad rnam spangs pa'i/ /ba yi
165a6(rgyud 'grel): lnga na? btsan dan gyis/ /byug cing bdud rtsi 'khyil bas bsrung/ /ma spyad pa yi ras rnyed pa/ /spos kyi chu yis bkrus nas ni/ /rang gi lha sbyor bdag nyid du/ /der ni de rab gnas par bya/ /sdang? ni cho ga rgyas byas la/ /spyan drangs mchod pa la sogs bya/
165a7(rgyud 'grel): brtson par byas nas de 'og tu/ /mtshan rnams rdzogs par ci bdar ni/ /legs par bri ba 'am bzo bo ni/ /nye bar 'ongs pa 'dri ru gzhug /mkhas pas gshin rje gshed dam ni/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pas bsrung bar bya/ /ri mo 'am sku gzugs gang
165b1(rgyud 'grel): yang rung/ /'di 'dras yang dag rdzogs par bya/ /gnas de nyid du sngar bshad pa'i/ /khrus sa dag ni rab bshams te/ /zur bzhi pa la khru bzhi pa/ /bkra shis shin tu mdzes pa dag /dbangs su khru ni gnyis yod pa/ /yid 'ongs zur rdul nyes 'bul bya/ /de
165b2(rgyud 'grel): steng brtan pa'i stan bzhag pa/ /mkhas pas lha yi khrus gsol te/ /sems can kun la phan bde ba'i/ /sbyangs ba la sogs der bya'o/ /bkra shis rgyas par gyur ba dang/ /yang dang yang du bstong bya zhing/ /rol mo sgra ni sna tshogs dang/ /ca co'i sgra ni gdon par
165b3(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /rgyal ba'i dbang bskur tshul du ni/ /gdugs dkar po yang gzugs par bya/ /bris gzugs glegs bam 'jim gzugs sogs/ /lha la cho ga shes pa yis/ /me long la ni gzugs brnyan bkru/ /lugs ma sku gzugs nyid la'o/ /gsang sngags gang zhig
165b4(rgyud 'grel): khrus dang dbang bskur ba'i phyir/ /dzi na dzi ka la sogs pa rigs kyi bdag po'i snying po'o/ /de rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i snying po de me tog gi phreng bas brgyan pa'i til la sogs pa las kun rig gi snying po rig pa dang/ ras ris bdag po'i gsang sngagS
165b5(rgyud 'grel): bzlas/ /bum pa mtshan nyid dang ldan pas/ /'bru sman rin chen lnga rnams dang/ /tsan dan dag gi chus bkang ste/ /mgul pa gos bzangs dag gis bcing/ /lo ma bzang po kha dgab bya/ /rigs snying rigs kyi rigs pa dang/ /rigs kyi las kun byed par
165b6(rgyud 'grel): bzlas/ /sku yi spyi gtsug dbu dang? ni/ /phyag dang thugs kar byug par bya/ /de nas pus mo btsugs nas ni/ /bdug spos rnams kyis bdugs nas ni/ /mgon po gshegs shing bskul ba'i phyir/ /tshig ni 'di skad brjod par bya/ /'di zhes bya ba bcom
165b7(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das/ /rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag la brtse bar gyur nas ni/ /slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang/ /khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid rab gnas pa/ /mgon po bdag ni bgyid par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan bdag
166a1(rgyud 'grel): ni gus pa la/ /de bas gdang par mdzad par rigs/ /sangs rgyas mgon po brtser ldan dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom dang/ /gang yang gsang ba'i lha rnams dang/ /'jig rten skyong ba'i lha rnams dang/ /gang yang 'byung po mthu
166a2(rgyud 'grel): chen dang/ /gang yang lha yi spyan mnga' pa'i/ /sems can bstan la dga' brnams/ /bdag la dgongs par mdzad du gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba ni/ /yo byad ci 'byor pa yis ni/ /spyan dbye bar ni 'tshal lags na/ /bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la/ /
166a3(rgyud 'grel): thugs ni rtse par mdzad du gsol/ /tshogs pa thams cad spyan 'byed pas/ /byin gyis brlabs par mdzad du gsol/ /ras ris la sogs snying gar ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /rang gi sa bon las byung mtshan/ /chos tshul gsang sngags dgod
166a4(rgyud 'grel): cing bsgoms/ /sngags dang phyag mtshan gyur pa dang/ /spra zhing? bsdu ba byas pa la/ /lha yi sku ni ji bzhin par/ /de la skyes par mkhas pas bsam/ /rgyud las ji skad gsungs pa bzhin/ /rang gi phyag rgya sku la sogs/ /byin brlabs go rims bzhin du
166a5(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /de mdun ye shes sems dpa' ni/ /snga ma bzhin yang legs bsgrubs na/ /rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas/ /de dag dgug gzhug bcing ba dang/ /dbang rgya rang gi phyag rgya rnams/ /sgrub thabs las byung rim pas bya/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pas bsrung
166a6(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ /bgegs gsal la sogs cho ga bya/ /gdan dbul la sogs byas nas kyang/ /dam tshig phyag rgya bstan par bya/ /mdun du ye shes sems dpa' ni/ /sku yi lus la bdug nas ni/ /rang gi rnal 'byor dang ldan pas/ /de nas mgon po 'dus pa
166a7(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /rdo rje ? du sgra dbyangs dang/ /yid 'ong glu yis bstod par bya/ /snga ma bzhin du mchod yon sogs/ /dbul zhing bgegs gsal la sogs bya/ /gzugs brnyan gyi ni sku gzugs la/ /phyogs rnams kun nas lhags pa'i tshogs/ /mgon po dza:hUM
166b1(rgyud 'grel): baM ho:zhes brjod cing dgug par bya/ /rang gi phyag rgya byin brlab cing/ /yi ge brgya pas bstan par bya/ /rdo rje sems ma la sogs pas/ /cho ga shes par byin gyis brlabs/ /snga ma bzhin du gsol ba yang/ /de la dang por gsol btab nas/ /de yi phyag rgya go rims
166b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin/ /dbang bskur ba ni bstan par bya/ /lA sye la sogs rnams kyis mchod/ /dri sogs kyis kyang mchod par bya/ /gos dang rgyan dang so rtsi dang/ /gdu? bu gtsug tor me long dang/ /gi bang dang ni li khri sogs/ /lha bshos rnams kyis rim bzhin mchod//
166b3(rgyud 'grel): de nas cho ga ldan pa yis/ /yid kyis mchod pas yang dag mchod/ /de yis sngags mang bzlas nas ni/ /phyi rol tu ni gtor ma sbyin/ /zho dang 'bras chan yam shing dang/ /til 'bras mar dang bsres pa'i sa/ /bgegs rnams nye bar zhi ba'i phyir/ /dang por
166b4(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi thabs sbyor mchod/ /rang gi spags rnams gang yin pas/ /mkhas pas lha rnams tshim par bya/ /byed pa por 'gyur rigs snying dang/ /rigs kyi rig pas zhi phyir dang/ /rigs kyi bdag pos byin rlob phyir/ /sreg blugs brgya dag so sor bya/ /de nas
166b5(rgyud 'grel): khrus byas lus gtsang ma'i/ /slob ma bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yis/ /bzlas pa'i chu yis bsang gtor bya/ /g.yon gyi phyogs su bzhag par bya/ /de yi lag pa g.yon pa yis /lag g.yas the bor bzung nas ni/ /de nas mar gyi bkang pa yis/ /dgang? gzar gyis
166b6(rgyud 'grel): ni bskor bar bya/ /rang gi lha yi sngags kyis ni/ /dgang blugs brgya ni dbul par bya/ /zho dang til tu bsres pa yis/ /de bzhin dgang blugs brgya byas nas/ /sdig pa rnams ni 'jig par 'gyur/ /tshe 'phel phyir ni dur ba dang/ /khyim rgyas phyir ni 'bras
166b7(rgyud 'grel): kyis bya/ /zho dang 'bras kyis spyin sreg dbul/ /khro bo bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyis/ /bzlas pa'i bsrung skud lag bar gdags/ /gsang mthar zhi ba'i rig pa yis/ /de yi snying gar byug par bya/ /slob ma gus shing mgo? btud nas/ /shes nas bla mas yon
167a1(rgyud 'grel): blang ngo/ /slob mas kyang ni gus pa yis/ /bla ma 'bad de mnyes byas te/ /slob dpon yongs su mnyes pa yi/ /las rnams 'grub par rab tu 'byung/ /de nas bla ma bdag nyid kyis/ /me la ji skad gsungs bzhin bya/ /mchod cing bskor ba
167a2(rgyud 'grel): byas nas ni/ /lha rnams la ni phyag byas nas/ /rang gnas song nas slob ma yin/ /dge 'dun rnams la mchod yon dbul/ /de nas bla ma lha dang ni/ /sku yi gzugs brnyan brtan por bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /go cha gyon pa'i tshul du bya/ /de
167a3(rgyud 'grel): nyid rdo rje skor tshul gyis/ /steng dang 'og gi bar gyi cha'i/ /lus la lan gsum dkri bya zhing/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil ba bzlas par bya/ /dar dpyangs 'ching ba'i tshul las ni/ /rnam par bsgyings par mdza' nas dgrol/ /dar dpyangs tha ma dpyangs nas ni/ /rting
167a4(rgyud 'grel): pa brdabs pas brtan par bya/ /de yi nyin par ci nus par/ /dga' ston rnams ni ci nus byar/ /glu dang gar dang rol mo dang/ /rnam par gnas pas gnas par bya/ /oM badzra ratna traM/ /zhes yo byad lhag ma'i sngags rnams dang/ /phyag rgya rang rigs rjes
167a5(rgyud 'grel): mthun par/ /blo ldan rgyud la mkhas pa yi/ /slob dpon gyis ni sbyang par bya/ /gang zhig rgyud 'di ma bsgoms pas/ /de nyid kun rdzob 'dod min te/ /de la rjes su brtse ba'i phyir/ /cho ga snga ma rjes su sbyar/ /lhag par gnas pa thams cad ni/ /phyi
167a6(rgyud 'grel): dro'i dus su bya bar bshad/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid nang par ni/ /spyan dbye ba ni bya'o zer/ /'di ni khyad par 'di nyid de/ /gshegs gsol bcas kun sngar bshad do/ /nang par yang ni sngar bshad pa'i/ /bya ba de nyid thams cad bya/ /cho ga de ltar bstan
167a7(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams/ /byas nas lha ni legs bzhag pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor chen po bkod ba ni/ /rgyud rnams rgyal bas 'di gsungs so/ /'di nyid 'chol bar byed pa la/ /rtag tu bdag gis bla mas bshad/ /thugs rje chen po rgyud kun tu/ /cho ga 'di de bstan
167b1(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ /slob mas go bar bya phyir gyis/ /rab gnas yi ge yod ma yin/ /rang gi lus sam ras ris sogs/ /spyan drangs cho ga la sogs 'dis/ /sangs rgyas de yi rigs sogs dang/ /mngag?  gzhug la sogs gshegs mi gsol/ /srid pa'i mthar
167b2(rgyud 'grel): thug par du ni/ /de nyid rab tu gnas par bya/ /bsod nams 'di ni 'gro kun yang/ /yang dag byang chub gnas par shog /bdag dang 'gro ba'i bsam pa rnams/ /rdzogs byed 'jam dbyangs nyid gyur cig /spyan dbye ba'i cho ga slob dpon prany+dzA ba li
167b3(rgyud 'grel): tras? mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma sh+rI ba dra dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba band+heM rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //sbyin sreg gi cho ga bzhugs so// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ ho ma
167b4(rgyud 'grel): bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ sbyin sreg gi cho ga /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan gang zhig dran pa yis/ /dngos grub mi 'jig thob 'gyur ba/ /rdo rje can la gus btud nas/ /sbyin sreg cho ga gsal bar bshad/ /gang dag tu ni rang nyid
167b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi/ /las kyi cho ga rnams med pa/ /der ni spyi rgyud las gsungs pa'i/ /cho ga mkhas pas bsten par bya/ /de la zhi ba la ni sa gzhi dkar po la rgyar khru gang tsam/ zabs su sor bcu gnyis pa'i thab khung zlum por brkos la/ de'i dbus su pad+ma'i steng rdo rje
167b6(rgyud 'grel): rtse lnga pa sor brgyad bar bya/ thab khung gi steng du sor bzhi bar du dor la/ dpangs dang rgyar sor bzhi'i kha cher kun nas byas la/ mtshams rnams su rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa dang/ thab khung gis gzhi de ba lang gi lci ba dang/ sa dkar pos byugs la/
167b7(rgyud 'grel): yang de nyid dri dkar pos bsku zhing dus gsum du dri zhim po'i me tog dkar pos gtor bar bya'o/ /rgyas pa la ni sa gzhi ser po la khru do pa/ zabs su de'i phyed pa rin po che zur brgyad pa lta bu 'am/ zur bzhi pa ste/ de zabs su khru gang brkos pa la /
168a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa'i lte bar rdo rje rin po che zur drug pa/ steng du sor brgyad pa tsam gyi kha khyer dbyibs mnyam pa byas la/ sa ser po dang dri ser pos thab khung gi sa gzhi de nye bar byug la/ me tog sna tshogs dgram par bya'o/
168a2(rgyud 'grel): mngon spyod la ni rtsub pa dang/ /tshwa sgo can dang gas pa dang/ /gnag cing sngo ba'i sa gzhi la sor nyi shu pa/ zabs su sor bcu pa/ gru gsum mgo byang du bltas pa/ thab khung gi dbus su rtseg gsum pa'i steng du/ khro bo sor brgyad pa mtshan pa/ de'i steng
168a3(rgyud 'grel): du sor gsum dor bar chur dang dpangs sor gsum pa'i kha khyer kha phyir bltas pas bskor pa/ sa nag po dang ro bsregs pa'i thal ba dang/ bong bu dang rnga mo la sogs pa'i rtug pas ji lta bzhin du byugs te/ dri ngan pa dang me tog sngon po dang
168a4(rgyud 'grel): dmar po dang 'bru 'am phu'i? mas gtor bar bya'o/ /dbang la ni sa gzhi dmar po la/ thab kyi dbyibs b+ha ga lta bu 'am rlung gi dkyil 'khor lta bu 'am a shwad tha'i lo ma lta bu'i dbus su rdo rje pad+mas mtshan pa'o/ /dgug pa la ni rdo rje rtse gcig pa lta bu dbus kyi cha la
168a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje lcags kyus mtshan pa/ kha khyer yang de dang 'dra bas bskor ba/ sa dang dri dmar pos byugs pa/ dri dang me tog gi nye bar mdzes par bya ste/ 'di gnyis kyi brko ba dang kha khyer la sogs pa'i tshad kyang zhi ba'i thab khung dang 'dra bar shes par bya'o/ /las thamS
168a6(rgyud 'grel): cad pa'i thab khur? yang de bzhin te/ 'on kyang la khyer ni pad+ma kha bye ba lta bu la rdo rje phreng bas bskor ba'o/ /rdo rje dang pad+ma dang rin po che dang rdo rje snga tshogs rdo rje'i dbus su chud pa'i 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas mtshan par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor ram lha'i khang ba'i shar
168a7(rgyud 'grel): phyogs su ni zhi ba'i thab khung dang/ lhor ni mngon spyod/ byang du ni rgyas pa/ nub tu ni dgug pa'i thab khung las dang rjes su mthun par thab brko? pa 'am/ tshon gyis bri bar bya'o/ /thab kyi dbang du byas pa'o/ /dgang gzar ni gser ram zangs kyi rgyu las byas pa 'am
168b1(rgyud 'grel): ni ma pa'am mchod sbyin gyi shing las pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i dbyibs lta bu/ de'i yu ba skyes pa tshad dang ldan pa'i mthe bo'i? sor nyi shu rtsa bzhi rdo rje la sogs pa'i khu tshur gyis gzung du rung ba 'am/ de'i steng du sor bzhi pa zur bzhi kha'i zabs su sor gnyis kyis dma' bar
168b2(rgyud 'grel): brkos la rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa/ khu bcud 'dzag pa'i bu ga sor gcig tsam rtse mo la rdo rje rtse gsum sor bzhis mtshan pa/ yu ba'i zhabs su rdo rje dang rin po che sor drug par bya'o/ /blugs gzar khru gang tsam la rtse mo pad+ma'i 'dab ma lta bu rgyar sor gnyis
168b3(rgyud 'grel): thabs su/ de'i phyed brkos pa la/ rdo rje rtse lnga pas de'i dbus su mtshan pa/ yu ba'i 'og rdo rje dang/ rin po ches bya'o/ /yang na sor mo lngas legs par bcer bas kyang dgang gzar bya zhing sor mo gsum bcer bas blugs gzar bya'o/ /dgang gzar gyi dbang du
168b4(rgyud 'grel): byas pa'o/ /yam shing ni pa la sha dang/ u dum bar dang/ a 'bra dang ka daM pa ba ka dang/ a shwad tha dang/ bla k+Sha dang/ sha mi dang/ n+ya gro d+ha la sogs pa shing lo ma can las grub pa 'dab ma dang bcas pa mnyam por bcad pa/ rtse mo'i cha las byung pa mtho
168b5(rgyud 'grel): gad? tsam la/ rtse mo sbrang rtsi dang/ 'o ma dang mar la btags pa/ dri dkar po'i chu las swangs pa/ rtse mo lo ma gnyis dang bcas pa rtse gcig pas dbul par bya'o/ /snying po dang 'dab ma med pa dang/ rul pa dang khong stong dang shun pags med pa dang/ thung du dang
168b6(rgyud 'grel): yon po dang/ rtse mo gnyis su gas pa dang/ phra ba dang/ sbom pa dang/ ring po dang/ 'bus zos pa dang/ srog chags dang bcas pa ni spang bar bya'o/ /zhi ba la ni nas dang 'o ma dang zho dang/ 'bras yos dang/ til dang dur ba dang/ ku sha sngon po dang/ bil
168b7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i lo ma dang/ tsan dan dang/ pri yang ku'i me tog dang/ 'bras sA lu'i chan dang/ me tog dkar po dang/ nag ge sar dang/ thang chu'i dri zhim po dang/ sbrang rtsi dang mar rnams las ji snyed pa sbyin sreg la dbul bar bya'o/ /rgyas pa la ni yam shing de 
169a1(rgyud 'grel): nyid las dbus kyi cha las byung ba chang ba gang gi tshad las dpangs su khru gang tsam/ zho dang 'o ma dang mar las btags pa spos chu ser pos spangs pa/ me dang gsum las brtags pa dang/ zas mchog gi gong bu dang/ zho dang sbrang rtsi dang/
169a2(rgyud 'grel): mar dang ldan pa dang ? nag po dang/ 'bras chan? zho dang mar du bcas pa dang/ sha dang pus pa dang/ bil ba'i 'bras bu dang/ 'bras sA lu dang/ pad+ma dang/ nag ge sar dang/ kar ni kar dang/ 'bru rnams dbul bar bya'o/ /mngon spyod la ni nim pa dang/
169a3(rgyud 'grel): seng ldeng dang/ ko pa'i dar dang/ pi lo ta ka dang/ mdan rnams kyi 'am/ gzhan yang kha ba dang tsher ma can dang che ba'i shing rnams kyi 'am/ ro sregs pa'i 'gal dum la rtsa ba'i cha las byung ba gas pa sor bcu ba rtse mo gnyis dug dang/ khrag dang nyung mar
169a4(rgyud 'grel): khas btags shing/ che mo rno ba'i yam shing dang/ yungs kar dang/ yungs mar dang/ khrag dang/ lan tsha? dang/ ske tshe dang ni ma pa'i lo ma'i thal ba dang/ rkang rjes kyis dang/ bud bu dang/ rnga mo la sogs pa'i rtug pa dang/ sgra brdungs pa dang/ bya rogs
169a5(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i gshog pa dang/ gshad gci dang tsher ma dang/ rus phye dang/ glang po che'i sha la sogs pa'i ji snyed pa dang/ rdzas re re la khrag dang dug las btags shing bshags pa'i rdzas sam thal ba dang/ sol ba dang/ phub? ma las dgra bo'i gzugs 
169a6(rgyud 'grel): brnyan byas la/ dug la sogs pas bskus te/ bcad cing sbyin sreg bya'o /dbang du bya ba la ni/ tsam pa dang/ a sho ka/ ba ku la dang/ pri yang ku dang/ la ku tsa la sogs pa'i nags kyi lcug ma'i yam shing sor lnga pa 'dab ma dang bcas pa 'am/ skyur
169a7(rgyud 'grel): zhing dmar ba dang/ me tog dang 'bras bu gzhan dang gzhan dag gam/ rang gi rtog pa las bshad pa'i rdzas rnams dbul bar bya'o/ /dgug pa la/ yang de dag nyid dam/ tsher ma lcags kyu lta bu yod pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /pa la sha dang/ bla kA dang/ u dum
169b1(rgyud 'grel): bar dang/ ser snang dang/ ar ga dang/ me da dang/ pe dang/ ka ha dang/ a mra dang/ sha? mi dang/ ka? sa ma rgya dang/ a po ma rgya dang/ a shwad tha las byung ba gsar zhing rtse mo ma gos pa/ drang pa mtho gang tsam la spos chus ngan pa sen mo gnyis brtags pa'i
169b2(rgyud 'grel): yam shing las thams cad dbul bar bya'o/ /gang yang zhi ba dang rgyas pa'i sreg rdzas rnams dang/ gang yang bdag nyid kyi kha zas de dag thams cad nyin re bzhin rang gi lha la rtag tu dbul ba dang/ mar gyi rtags pa'i gu kum lam/ sa la'i thab chus yang rang
169b3(rgyud 'grel): gi gsang sngags kyi dbye bas sbyin sreg bya'o/ /dri dang me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i rdzas rnams kyang las dang rjes su mthun par rang gi gsang sngags ji lta ba bzhin du bzlas brjod bya'o/ /sreg rdzas kyi dbang du byas pa'o/ /zhi ba la ni mchod sbyin gyi
169b4(rgyud 'grel): shing rnams kyi bud shing srog chags med pa/ thab khung las cung zad kyi dma' ba 'am/ dgon pa'i ba lang gi lci bas bya'o/ /rgyas pa la ni dgon pa'i ba lang gi lci ba ma gtogs pa ji skad du bshad pa'i bud shing 'dras bu dang bcas pa'o/ /mngon spyod la ni
169b5(rgyud 'grel): tsha ba dang/ tsher ma can dang/ dri ngan pa'i shing rnams sam/ dur khrod pa 'am/ bung buAm rnga mo'i rtug pa la sogs pa 'am/ shing shin tu skam pas bya'o/ /dbang du bya ba ni nim pa dang shing sgyur po dang gzhan yang me tog dang bcas par bya'o/ /dgug pa la
169b6(rgyud 'grel): cher ma dang bcas pas so/ /las thams cad pa'i bud shing ni las dang rjes su mthun pas bya'o/ /nga nas sgrub pa po khrus byas shing lus dri zhim pos bsgos pa/ byams shing bzod pa ldan pa gos dkar po gyon te las dang rjes su mthun par lha'i rnal 'byor
169b7(rgyud 'grel): nas bsrung pa'i chogs byas shing bzlas pa dang mi smra ba bas 'jam shing shin tu bde ba'i stan la pad+ma'i 'dug stangs kyis 'dug pa/ nang par blos bsgrub par bya ba la dmigs nas yar gyi ngo'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te zhi ba'i yid kyis zhi bar bya'o/ /
170a1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du rgyas pa la rgyan dang phreng ba ser po dang/ gos sna tshogs dang bzang po'i 'dug stangs kyi 'dug ste/ dga' ba'i yid kyis byang du bltas nas snga dro zla ba nya nas brtsams te rgyas pa bya'o/ /khros shing gos sngon po 'am
170a2(rgyud 'grel): khrag gam chus gsher ba'i gos bgos te/ stan sra ba la phyogs su kha bltas te 'dug pa 'am/ bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs brnyan gyi brang la mnan cing stan med par rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te/ sos so bca' zhing mig mi g.yo ba dang/ gnyer ma
170a3(rgyud 'grel): bsdus pas zla ba mar gyi ngo bo'i mi bzad pa'i nyin zhag gang yang rung ba la khro ba nyid tshad mar bya ste/ nyi ma phyed dam/ nam phyed na mngon spyod bya'o/ /dmar zhing rgyan dmar po la sogs pa dang/ nub phyogs su kha bltas shing stan mthon po la rdo rje
170a4(rgyud 'grel): skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste/ dbang gi las bya'o/ /dgug pa yang de dang 'dra ste/ 'on kyang kha steng du blta ba'i lha'i sbyor ba 'am/ nub tu bya'o/ /sgrub pa po'i dbang du byas pa'o/ /zhi ba la ni gser ram dngul lam zangs sam shing dam sa las byas pa
170a5(rgyud 'grel): 'am/ dung phor dang nya phyis sam lo ma las byas pa'i mchod yon gyis snod la nas dang bcas pa'i 'o ma dri dkar po la sogs pa dang/ chu bcug pa spos kyis bdugs te/ rang gi lha'i sngags mthar swA hA dang bcas pa dang bzlas brjod bya'o/ /rgyas pa la ni
170a6(rgyud 'grel): ? dri la sogs pa ser po dang chu dang til dang bcas pa'i zhol/ mthar A dang bcas pas bzlas brjod bya'o/ /mngon spyod la ni gnag cing dri mi zhim pa'i dri la sogs pa dang/ chu dang bcas pa dang/ kro ta pa dang ba gcin las mthar phaT dang bcas
170a7(rgyud 'grel): pas bzlas brjod bya'o/ /dbang la ni dri dmar bo la sogs pa chu bcug pa la tha ma ho dang bcas pa'o/ /de bzhin du dgug pa la ni mdza' mar yi ge dza:dang bcas pa'i rang gi sngags kyi tha mar swA hA dang bcas pa dang/ de nyid kyi sngags kyi bzlas 'byor?

170b3(rgyud 'grel): shing dang bud shing la sogs pa sreg rdzas rnams ni rang gi g.yas su gzhag par bya'o/ /gsad pa dang skrad pa dang dgug pa la sogs pa'i las rnams la ni bsang gtor dang bzhag pa'i go bzlog ste bya'o/ /oM badzra yak+Sha hUM/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags te/

173b3(rgyud 'grel): gis gzung ngo/ /rgyas pa ni rin po che'i khu tshur gyis so/ /mngon sbyong la ni g.yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyis so/ /dbang du bya ba dang dgug pa la ni pad+ma'i khu tshur gyis so/ /gzhan dag la ni rdo rje khu tshur gyis so/ /zhi ba la ni rang gi sngags kyi mthar
173b4(rgyud 'grel): che ge mo shAn ting ku ru swA hA/ /zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas so/ /de bzhin du rgyas pa la tha mar oM dang sbyar ro/ /mngon spyod la ni tha mar phaT do/ /dbang du bya ba'i tha mar yi ge ho:O/ /dgug pa la ni tha mar yi ge dza:ste/ bskul ba'i tshig dang ldan
173b5(rgyud 'grel): par brjod la/ sbyin sreg brgya 'am stong dam dpag tu med pa bya'o/ /thams cad du 'am/ de bzhin du zhi ba'i thab la ni til gyi sbyin sreg dang/ zhi ba'i sngags oM sarba pA maM da ha na swA hA/ zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du rgyas pa'i cho ga la ni 'bras kyi sbyin
173b6(rgyud 'grel): sreg dang/ rgyas pa'i sngags oM badzra puSh+Ta ye swAhA/ zhes bya'o/ de bzhin du las thams cad pa'i thab khur du bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa bsams la/ tshe 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir/ dur ba'i myu gu mar las btags ba'i sbyin sreg
173b7(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'dis bya ste/ oM badzra A yu:She swA hA/ de nyid du bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa de bzhin du bsams la/ bsrung ba bya ba'i phyir til mar las btags pa ku sha'i myu gu sbyin sreg sngags 'dis bya ste/ oM a pra ti ha da badzra ya swAhA
174a1(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba brjod la sbyin srag brgya 'am stong dam dpag tu med pa bya ste/ 'di ltar thams cad du yang rang gi bskul ba'i tshig ji lta ba dang/ rang dang gzhan gyi rtog pa'i cho ga ji lta bas sbyin sreg byas la/ mthar oM sarba ta thA ga ta muSh+Ti baM/
174a2(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba dang/ rigs kyi snying po lan gsum mam/ bdun nam/ nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du mar gyi sbyin sreg gi gzi sbyin bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas tha mar rigs kyi bdag po bzlas pa'i dgang blugs dang mchod yon dbul bar bya'o/ /de la oM zhes bya ba
174a3(rgyud 'grel): ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi snying po'o/ /yang hUM h+ri(rgyud 'grel): traM a zhes bya ba ni lhag ma rnams kyi'o/ /de nas bsang gtor dang 'thor 'thung lan gsum phul la/ mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis yang dag bar bstod de/ mchod pa thams cad kyis snga ma bzhin
174a4(rgyud 'grel): du yang dag par mchod nas mchod yon phul te/ yang dag par bzlas la yi ge brgya ba brjod nas/ oM khyed kyis 'gro ba'i don kun mdzad ces bya ba la sogs pas bskul la/ rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te/ gyen du bkrol nas rang gi sngags
174a5(rgyud 'grel): tha ma yi ge mu(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas par brjod par bya'o/ /lha'i dbang du byas pa'o/ /de nas me lha thab tu bsams la yang legs par mchod cing bsang gtor dang 'ther 'thud bya ste/ sbyin sreg gi yo byad lhag ma rnams phul la/ tha mar dgang blugs dang
174a6(rgyud 'grel): 'thor 'thung ji lta ba bzhin du phul te/ bsang la mchod cing mched yon phul nas mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub gsol ba btab la/ badzra satwa zhes snga ma bzhin du zlos shing phyag rgya dgrol ba la sogs pa byas nas/ snga ma bzhin du gshegs su
174a7(rgyud 'grel): gsol te/ oM hUM mu(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod la/ khro bo ti rin ti ri'i phyag rgya bcings te/ gyen du bkrol la gshegs su gsol lo/ /de ltar nyin re zhing rtag tu thun gsum ma mthun bzhir bya ba 'am/ ji srid rang dang gzhan zhib la sogs par gyur gyi bar du
174b1(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /'dir gsungs pa ni/ na ba'i don du zhi ba bya/ /'byor ba'i don du rgyas pa bya/ /gdug pa kun la gsong pa ste/ /dbang la sogs pa phan phyir ro/ /thab dang dgang gzer blugs gzer rdzas/ /shing dang sgrub pa'i rdzas rnams dang/ /rdzas bsang dgod dang me
174b2(rgyud 'grel): sbyangs dang/ /gsang gtor dang ni sbar ba dang/ /ku sha dgram dang gnas pad+ma/ /mi bskyed spyan drang la sogs dang/ /bsrung bskrad bcing dang mchod yon dang/ /zhabs bsil sgrub pa dbang bskur dang/ /dam tshig sgo dang mchod yon mchod/ /bsang
174b3(rgyud 'grel): gtong 'thor 'thung sreg blugs dang/ /me brtags gsang dang dgang blugs dang/ /kun bsreg gsang dang bzod gsol dang/ /thab dang me lha dgod pa dang/ /bsdu dang bstod dang dgug pa dang/ /sngon bzhin phyag rgya dbang bskur la/ /mchod dang mchod
174b4(rgyud 'grel): yon 'thor 'thur bas/ /dgang blugs cig shos las sgrub dang/ /lha rnams gzi sbyin bskyed pa dang/ /me lha dgang blugs mchod yon bcas/ /gsang gtor 'thor 'thung mchod pa dang/ /gshegs su gsol bar bya ba'o/ /bsdus pa'i tshigs
174b5(rgyud 'grel): su bcad pa'o/ /sbyin sreg cho ga rdzogs pa dang/ /mdor bsdus pa yi rim ldan pa/ /rab 'byor bskyangs kyis 'di nyid ni/ /rnal 'byor rgyud las dris pa yin/ /sbyin sreg gi cho ga rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh+rad+hA ka ra barma dang/
174b6(rgyud 'grel): zhu chen gyi lo tsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //dpal ldan rgya che zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bzhugs// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI ma nu da ra nA ma maN+Da la ni bi ka bod skad du/
174b7(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan rgya che ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga /dpal rdo rje chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gru bzhi rdo rje 'chang chen sa/ /gsang sngags lnga yis bsdus pa yi/ /rdo rje theg pas 'thob byed pas/ /theg pa de la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /brgya rtsa bcu yi
175a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa yis/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs bskor zhing/ /de bzhin gshegs dang rdo rje che/ /rin chen pad+ma sogs kyis brgyan/ /sa phyogs bcu gsum pa nyid du/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstan pa/ /gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid
175a2(rgyud 'grel): can/ /de la bdag ni spyi pos 'dud/ /bde gshegs kun la phyag 'tshal te/ /rdo rje slob dpon slob ma yin/ /dngos grub kun byed rab sngags pa/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad par bya/ /de la dang po rdo rje 'chang chen po slob dpon sangs rgyas kyi cha lugs
175a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin par gyur pas bsam gtan dang rjes su 'thun par ri phug gam chu bo 'am rdzid bu la sogs pa'i gnas su gnas nas/ grogs bzang po dang ldan pas sngon du bsnyen pa byas te/ kun tu bzang po'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga'i tshul gyis bgegs
175a4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad gzhom par bya ba dang/ phyogs thams cad bcings nas dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i nam mkha' bcings pa byas la/ phyogs bcu na mthar thug pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dmigs la mchod pa nyi shu bya zhing sdom pa bzung
175a5(rgyud 'grel): bar byas la/ rdo rje lta bu'i sgrub thabs kyi cho gas bdag nyid bsgrub pa byas la/ rang gi snying gar rdo rje pad+ma bsams la/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po nam mkha' dang mnyam pa spyod pas rdo rje la bzhugs te gcig tu gyur par nga rgyal bskyed
175a6(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o/ /badzra d+hA tu ra haM sa haM zhes brjod pa ji srid mngon du mthong bar gyur pa de srid du bsgom par bya'o/ /de ltar rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po grub par gyur pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di rnams kyis bya ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta muSh+Ti haM/ oM badzra
175a7(rgyud 'grel): satwa muSh+Ti a/ oM badzra ratna muSh+Ti traM/ oM badzra d+harmA muSh+Ti khaM/ oM badzra karma muSh+Ti haM/ bsgom par mi nus pa ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs tshig tsam gyi dmigs pa la lha sum cu rtsa bdun gyi snying po re re zhing 'bum bzlas te/ de lta bus kyang
175b1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor chen po 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po sgrub pas ni gsang ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du 'gyur ro/ /de rnams kyi phyag rgya ni 'di yin te/ snying po dang sngags dang phyag rgya dang sngags dang rigs
175b2(rgyud 'grel): par bshad pa dkyil 'khor dang bcas par gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya de'i nang na chud par bsams la/ so so'i rigs sngags 'bum ma ma khri bzla ba 'am/ ji srid bzungs kyi dkyil 'khor grub pa de srid du bsgom par bya'o/ /de la de
175b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi phyag rgya ni 'di yin te/ rdo rje bcing ba dam bcas te/ /gung mo myu gu bzhin du gzhib/ /mthe'u chud dang mdzub mo bsgreng/ /dam tshig mchog gi dam tshig go /de ltar gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgrubs nas/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor bsgrub par
175b4(rgyud 'grel): bya ste/ /rdo rje phra mo'i sbyor ba yis/ /shin tu mnyam gzhag bsgoms nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor rdo rje phra mo dang/ /ting nge 'dzin ni dbang sgyur pa'o/ /de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya ste/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /de yi rdo rje brtan
175b5(rgyud 'grel): par bzung/ /mthe chud mthe bor bcings pa ni/ /rdo rje las mchog dkyil 'khor ro/ /de ltar byas nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ste/ de la rgyal pos ni khru brgya 'am khru lnga bcu pa bya'o/ /blon po 'am blon po chen pos ni khru lnga bcu pa'am nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o//
175b6(rgyud 'grel): tshong dpon nam ded dpon gyis ni khru nyi shu rtsa lnga pa 'am de'i phyed do/ /sgrub pos ni khru bcu gnyis pa 'am khru drug pa'o/ /de nas chung bar ni mi bya'o/ /de nas sa gzhi yongs su gzung bar byaste/ gtsug lag khang dan+ng grong rdal dang/ /kun dga' grong dam
175b7(rgyud 'grel): grong khyer ni/ /gang zhig shar dang byang du blta/ /lho dang nub tu ma yin no/ /shis shing sngon ni yongs brten pa'i/ /sa ni mkhas pas bgrod par bya/ /yang na yid ni dga' gyur pa/ /gang yin der ni brtsam par bya/ /der sa gzhi'i dbus su yi ge haM gi
176a1(rgyud 'grel): zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas sa gzhi yongs su sbyang par bya ste/ rdo dang bong ba shing rul ba la sogs pa bsal bar byas nas/ chu dri zhim po yis yongs su dgang ngo/ /de nas legs par bcags te/ shar dang byang du gzhol ba/ khang
176a2(rgyud 'grel): pa rtsegs ma'i nang du chud pa/ phyogs bzhi nas rta babs kyi phyi rol tu shing gi dri bas bskor cing shing dral sgo bzhis nye bar mdzes par byas pas dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi lhag par mdzes par byas par gyur te/ sa yongs su bzung ba'i cho ga'o//
176a3(rgyud 'grel): der sa'i dbus su sems dpa' i dkyil mo krung gis gnas pas 'dug la/ bsam gtan bzhi'i rim bzhin dmigs nas 'og min gyi gnas su 'dug ste/ mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la dmigs te/ ting nge 'dzin de las blangs nas/ so sor rtog pa
176a4(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i rim gyis rnam par sangs rgyas ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi steng du rdo rje rtse mo khang pa brtsegs pa nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnams bsgom par bya ste/ 'di ni dang por sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin no/ /de nas rnam
176a5(rgyud 'grel): par snang mdzad du bdag nyid bsgoms la rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bskyed de rdo rje bsdu ba byas nas rang gi snying ga na gnas pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod par bsgom pa ni/ dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas
176a6(rgyud 'grel): ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi steng nas babs te dkyil 'khor sa gzhi'i dbus su las rgyal mchog gi ting nge 'dzin bsgom par bya ste/ bskyed pa'i rim pas 'dug nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i gnas su rdo rje sems dpa' bsgoms la/ de'i sngags
176a7(rgyud 'grel): dang phyag rgyas lan cig byin gyis brlab pa byas la/ de nyid kyi phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor de'i steng du nam mkha' la bsgom mo/ /kun tu rnam par bltas nas ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' zhes brjod nas/ /bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor/ /de nas sems
176b1(rgyud 'grel): dpa' chen po bcu drug gi /sngags kyis btab pa'i thig skud ni/ /sar pa las ni bkal nas ni/ /tshad dang mthun par mdzes pa yi/ /thig gi mkhas pas ci nus kyis/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni thig gdab po/ /de nas thig gi phyag rgya dang sngags ni 'di yin te/
176b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje phyag rgyas thig bzung nas/ /dang por dkyil 'khor thig gdab po/ /phyi nas thig bzung bya ba ni/ /ji lta bas ni thig gdab po/ /sngags ni/ oM badzra sa ma sU tra mA ti kra ma hUM/ de nas shar du mngon par phyogs la thig brkyang la slob ma nub tu blta
176b3(rgyud 'grel): bas thig bri ba dang/ slob dpon lho phyogs nas brkyang la/ slob ma byang phyogs su mngon par phyogs la bre bar bya'o/ /de yang phyogs kun mnyam par byas nas ni/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thig gdab ste/ /shar dang nub dang byang dang lho/ /phyogs
176b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhi'i thig gi dkyil 'khor brgyad/ /ces lung las gsungs pa'o/ /de bzhin du nang gi dkyil 'khor la ni cha brgyad du brtag go /de nas cho ga 'di yis ni/ /kun nas zur bzhi legs par byas/ /phyogs bzhir yongs su bskor nas ni/ /sngags shes
176b5(rgyud 'grel): pas ni gnas bya ba/ /dbus kyi gnas ni spangs nas su/ /me yi phyogs su gnas nas ni/ /sngags pas sngags mchog shes pa yis/ /snga ma bzhin du srad pu bre/ /de nas cho ga shes pa yis/ /dbang ldan phyogs su legs par bya/ /der ni nub du
176b6(rgyud 'grel): mngon phyogs nas/ /byang phyogs su ni bre bar bya/ /de nas de ni dbang ldan phyogs/ /spangs nas rlung gi phyogs su gnas/ /lho yi phyogs su mngon phyogs pas/ /nub kyi phyogs su bre bar bya/ /gnas te yongs su spangs nas ni/ /bden bral gyi ni phyogs
176b7(rgyud 'grel): song ni/ /de nas ji srid nub phyogs kyi/ /spyod yul bar du bre bar bya/ /zhes 'khor lo phyogs la sogs pas bsrung ba yin no/ /gru bzhir bgyi zhing sgo bzhi dang/ /rta babs bzhis ni mdzes bgyis la/ /thig bzhi dang ni ldan gyur pa/ /dar dang me tog
177a1(rgyud 'grel): phreng bas brgyan/ /gru bzhi phyogs ni thams cad dang/ /sgo khyud kyi ni nang rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen spras par ni/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rim thig gdab bo/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rim gyi nang du/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang/ /ldan par 'khor
177a2(rgyud 'grel): lo bre bar bya'o/ /'khor lo de'i nang du rdo rje'i thig gis yongs su bskor bar bya'o/ /sgo ni/ zung bzhi pa la sgo bzhi ste/ /sgo ni 'khor lo brgyad cha la/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ /rten cing 'brel ba sngags pa yin/ /nor bu chen po'i rin po
177a3(rgyud 'grel): che'i so sor spras pa'i dril bu kha dog sna tshogs pas brtags pa'i rlung gis bskyod pa dang dang/ /'phan dang/ me tog dang/ phreng ba dang/ dra ba dang/ dra ba phyed pa dang/ zla bas nye bar mdzes par byas pa'i khyams kyis bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor kun
177a4(rgyud 'grel): tu bres pa la/ de'i rim pa'i nang zhugs la 'khor lo 'dra ba'i thig gis yongs su bskor bar bya'o/ /ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes byas pa/ /rdo rje ka ba'i nang logs su/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lngas brgyan la/ /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /sangs

177a7(rgyud 'grel): za ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje rgya gram la sogs bzhag /'khor lo yi ni nad logs su/ /rdo rje lha mo rnams kyang bzhag /dkyil 'khor phyi'i grwa rnams su/ /sangs rgyas mchod pa rnams kyang bzhag /sgo rnams kun gyi nang du ni/ /sgo bsrung bzhi yang
177b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhag par bya/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rim phyogs su ni/ /sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang bzhag /'jug gam phyi rol 'byung ba na/ /ri mo 'am rdo rje srad bu ngag /yid kyi brdeg pa byas na ni/ /de ni dam tshig nyams mi 'gyur/ /oM badzra be gA kra ma hUM/ de la rgyal
177b2(rgyud 'grel): po'i ni rin po che lnga'i phye mas dkyil 'khor dri'o/ /blon po chen po dang mdun blon gyis ni rin po che'i phye ma dang bsres pa 'am/ 'bras sA lu'i phye mas so/ /ded dpon la sogs pa ni 'bras brtags pa'i phye mas so/ /sgrub pa pos ni 'bras kyi phye ma nyid sngags
177b3(rgyud 'grel): pa yin no/ /gur gum la sogs pa'i phye ma dri zhim po'i khu bas sam phye ma lngas btso'o/ /de nas dang por ni sngon po dgye'o/ /de nas ni gser dang pad+ma rA ga dang mar gata dang mu tig dgye ste/ de yang sngon bo thog mar btang bar bya/ /de nas ser po btang
177b4(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /de yi 'og tu dmar po ste/ /de'i 'og tu ljang gu btang/ /kun gyi nang rol dkar po ste/ /tshon gyi cho ga de ltar bshad/ /yang na/ yung ba dang rgya skyegs dang rams mchog ste/ /tshon ni bzhi pos btso bar bya/ /lnga la dkar bo'i rang bzhin te/ /mnyam paS
177b5(rgyud 'grel): kun tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /de la tshon bzlas pa'i phyag rgya dang sngags ni 'di yin te/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis las ni/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni legs sbyar ba/ /byas nas chon rtsi thams cad ni/ /'bar ba'i lta bas dgug par bya/ /oM badzra tsitra sa ma ya hUM
177b6(rgyud 'grel): tshon la yang sems dpa' chen po bcu drug gzhug bya'o/ /kun tu bzang po'i spyin sreg gi skabs su 'jug pa'i cho ga dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya nas brtsams te/ sems dpa' i rdo rje lcags kyu'i nang du bshad pas 'dir ma smras so/ /de yi
177b7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pas/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad gang ba rnams/ /dkyil 'khor rnams su 'dus par gyur/ /de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /phyag rgya chen po sgom byed cing/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni/ /cung
178a1(rgyud 'grel): zad rab tu brjod par bgyi/ /de nas 'dus pa dgyes pa nas/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams brtan par 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab grub pa/ /grub pa nyid du nye par gnas/ /de nas phyag rgya dang sngags 'dis sgo dbye bar bya ste/ rdo rje
178a2(rgyud 'grel): khu tshur gnyis las ni/ /mdzub gnyis dam sbyar gan rgyal bzhag /shin tu khros pas rnam dbye ba/ /sgo dbyo ba yi mchog yin no/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon ni/ /mnyam gzhag dbus su gnas gyur pa'i/ /yid kyis dbye bar bya ba nyid/ /rdo rje'i sgo
178a3(rgyud 'grel): ni bzhi pa'o/ /de la sgo dbye ba'i sngags ni 'di yin te/ oM badzra ud g+ha Da ya sa ma ya pra be sha ya hUM/ de nas sgo rnams thams cad du/ /lcags kyu la sogs pa bgyis nas/ /las chen mchog gi phyag rgya yis/ /dam tshig rnams ni bzhag par
178a4(rgyud 'grel): bgyi/ /rdo rje lta bu'i sgrub pa'i cho gas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa phyag rgya chen po legs par bsgrubs nas las kyi phyag rgya bzhag par bya ste/ dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya yis dang/ sems dpa' rdo rje la sogs pa de ltar sems dpa' 
178a5(rgyud 'grel): chen po sgrub pa dza:hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod cing/ de nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa/ /sems dpa' chen po kun bsdu ba/ /spyan drangs nas ni rab tu bzhug /bcings nas de'i dbang du 'gyur/ /de nas mchod pa bya ste/ gal te rgyal po nor se ba
178a6(rgyud 'grel): yin na nges rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyu las byung ba'i bum pa brgya'am/ nyi shu 'am rtsa lnga pa 'am/ bcu drug gam/ brgyad dam/ lnga 'am/ tha na rin po che las byas pa'i bum pa gcig byas la/ lhag ma dag ni zangs dang sa dag la bya'o/ /blon
178a7(rgyud 'grel): po la sogs pa rnams kyi ni longs spyod dang rjes su 'tsham par bya'o/ /de la bum pa'i mtshan nyid ni mchu 'phyang ba mgrin pa ring ba lho che ba mgrin par ras kyis bkris pa kha 'bras bus bkang ba/ rin po che dang sman dang/ 'bru dang/
178b1(rgyud 'grel): spos chus yongs su gang ba byas nas gsang sngags kyi bsnyen pa bya'o/ /de la gsang sngags ni 'di yin te/ oM badzro da ka hUM/ rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa ni rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa'i me tog gi yal gas bzlas brjod stong byas la/ bdag po'i gnas su
178b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhag go /bum pa gzhan rnams ni bzlas brjod brgya byas la sgo dang mtshams la sogs pa brgyad du gzhag par bya'o/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dag ni 'bum tsam bya ste/ stong las nyung ba mi bya'o/ /spos la sogs pa phyi'i mchod pa rnams la ni sngar
178b3(rgyud 'grel): rang gis sngon par gdab par bya'o/ /mar me'i sdong pu dang spos khang dang/ mal stan la sogs pa ni 'bum las lhag par dbul te/ stong las nyung bar mi bya'o/ /blon po la sogs pas ni 'byor pa dang rjes su mthun par dbul bar bya'o/ /rta dang glang po
178b4(rgyud 'grel): dang ba lang gi tshogs shin tu brtags pa rnams kyang dbul bar bya'o/ /rta babs dril bu la sogs pa dang ldan pa ji snyed pa las kyang bya'o/ /de nas bdag nyid chen po rnams/ /gsang ba'i mchod pas mnyes bgyis la/ /sems can don kun 'grub pa'i
178b5(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ /thams cad mdzod ches gsol ba gdab/ /gsol ba btab nas phyi rol du/ /rdo rje rtsa mo'i rgyud kyi sngags kyis pha rol tu gtor ma byin la/ nye reg byas la nang du zhugs te/ cho ga lhag pa dang ma tshang ba rnams nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir zhi ba'i sbyin
178b6(rgyud 'grel): sreg byas nas/ phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i lan dang slob ma dang lhan cig tu dkyil 'khor bstan par bya'o/ /phyag rgya ni 'di yin te/ gang gi tshe rdo rje sems dpa' ston pa na/ slob mas kyang rdo rje khu tshur nye bar bstan par bya'o/ /gal te rgyal po ston pa na/ rdo rje gnod
178b7(rgyud 'grel): sbyin nye bar bstan par bya'o/ /gang gi rdo rje chags pa ston pa na rdo rje srung ba nye bar brtan par bya'o/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin ston pa na rdo rje las nye bar bstan par bya'o/ /phyag rgya rang gi gnas su bkrol la thal mo mnyam pas mnyes par bya'o/ /gang gi tshe rdo rje smra ba
179a1(rgyud 'grel): ston pa na rdo rje rin chen nye bar bstan par bya'o/ /gang gi tshe rdo rje 'khor lo ston pa na rdo rje gzi brjid nye bar bstan par bya'o/ /gang gi che rdo rje rnon po ston pa na rdo rje rgyal mtshan nyi bar bstan par bya'o/ /gang gi tshe chos ston pa na rdo rje bzhad
179a2(rgyud 'grel): pa nye bar bstan par bya ste/ phyag rgya bkrol? zhing rang bzhin gyi gnas su thal mo nges par bcings te/ de ltar byas pas ni dkyil 'khor du rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa byin gyis rlab par mdzad par 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad du rdo rje slob dpon
179a3(rgyud 'grel): gyi las yin no/ /dkyil 'khor gyi las ni zla ba nya nas brtsams nas phyi ma'i zla ba nya'i bar ram/ tshes gcig nas brtsams nas zla ba nya'i bar ram bcu gnyis nas brtsams nas nya'i bar rim/ phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor ni nyin mtshan gcig
179a4(rgyud 'grel): gis bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yongs su bzung nas lhag par gnas par bya ste/ gzhug par bya'o/ /phyag na rdo rjes byin rlabs shing/ /de bzhin dad pas bsgrub pa dang/ /byang chub sems dang 'gro don gyis/ /byang chub semS
179a5(rgyud 'grel): dpang? 'gyur bas na/ /dag pa'i chos kyi rjes 'jug pa/ /theg pa che la lhag mos pas/ /thams cad du ni kun 'grub 'gyur zhes bya bas rdo rje slob dpon mtshan nyid dang ldan pas slob ma yongs su bzung bar bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyis rigs kyi bu
179a6(rgyud 'grel): spros zhes brjod par bya'o/ /slob mas kyang/ byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ rdo rje slob dpon bdag la stsol/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la/ /tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang/ /dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang/ /sems can don byed tshul khrims
179a7(rgyud 'grel): gsum/ /sangs rgyas kun ni brtul zhugs tshe/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang/ /dkon mchog gsum yang bdag la stsol/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya dang/ /slob dpon dag kyang bdag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po yi/ /slob dpon du yang bdag
179b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur bgyi?/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi/ /sdom pa dag kyang bdag la stsol/ /pad+ma'i rigs mchog dag pa'i yang/ /sdom pa bdag la stsal du gsol/ /de bzhin las kyi rigs chen la/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /mgon pos bdag la sdom pa stsol/ /
179b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod par bya ste/ de ltar yongs su gzung nas lhag par gnas par bya ste/ snying ga dang sbyi bor de bzhin du bsam la/ khu tshur g.yas pas rdo rje bzung nas snying gar bzhag na lhag par gnas par byas bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas sdom pa sbyin par bya ste/ sangS
179b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba dus 'di nas gzung ste/ byang chub snying po la ma chis kyi bar du/ /ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /byang chub tu ni nges byas pa'i/ /byang chub sems
179b4(rgyud 'grel): ni bla med pa/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa lo/ /tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang/ /dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang/ /sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum/ /de bzhin brtan par bzung bar bgyi/ /sangs rgyas chos
179b5(rgyud 'grel): dang dge 'dun te/ /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /deng nas rtsams te bzung bar bgyi/ /nam du yang ni mi spong ngo/ /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang/ /yang dag nyid du bzung bar bgyi/ /slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /rin
179b6(rgyud 'grel): chen rigs mchog chen po yi/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/ /nyin re bzhin du dus drug tu/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rab tu sbyin/ /byang chub chen po las byung ba/ /pad+ma'i rigs mchog dag pa la/ /phyi nang gsang ba theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos ni bzung bar
179b7(rgyud 'grel): bgyi/ /las kyi rigs mchog dag pa la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du bzung bar bgyi/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi/ /byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /sems can kun gyi don gyis phyir//
180a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi sdom pa ma lus bzung/ /ma bsgal ba rnams bsgral bar bgyi/ /ma grol ba ni bdag gis dgrol/ /dbug ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing/ /sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod/ /de ltar sdom pa 'dzin nus pa de las ni
180a2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bgyi/ dkyil 'khor 'dri ba la gal te bgegs byung bar gyur na/ de'i tshe rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags 'bum bzlas pa'i phur bus bgegs thams cad la gdab par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyis sa'i dbus su phur bus gdab
180a3(rgyud 'grel): po/ /phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyab tu lcags ri'i thig gdab de'i rgyab du 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyab kyi phyi rol tu lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa'i bgegs rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas bkug la bcings te phur bus gdab/ shar lho'i mtshams su
180a4(rgyud 'grel): ni me'i bgegs so/ /lhor ni yi dwags kyi bgegs so/ /lho nub tu ni srin po la sogs pa'i bgegs so/ /nub tu ni klu la sogs pa'i bgegs so/ /nub byang du ni rlung gi bgegs te/ byang du ni gnod sbyin la sogs pa'i bgegs so/ /byang shar du ni
180a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur? po'i bgegs so/ /gsang sngags 'dis phur bus gdab po/ /oM badzra kI li sarba big+h+naM band+ha hUM phaT/ rdo rje spyan dang rdo rje me ltar rab tu phur bus bsrung bar bya'o/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis steng du nam mkha' bcing ngo/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed rdo rje spyan dang rdo
180a6(rgyud 'grel): rje bsdams pa'i steng du rdo rje dra ba byas te/ de yang sems can 'tshe bar byed pa dang/ sdig pa med kyis khyed ma 'jigs/ /rig sngags las byung dge ba sbyin/ /bgegs ni rang gi sems las byung/ /zhes gsungs pas so/ /dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba
180a7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rdzogs pa nas lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du gshegs su gsol/ phur bu bton nas 'o mas bkrus te/ sems can thams cad la dmigs nas zhi ba'i sbyin bsreg bya'o/ /shar phyogs kyi sgor kha khyer gyi phyi rol rdo rje lta bu'i kha khyer? la? byang
180b1(rgyud 'grel): du mngon par bltas nas/ til bsregs nas sdig pa bsreg par bya'o/ /de bzhin du lho sgor rin po che 'dra ba'i kha khyer la shar du mngon par bltas nas rgyas par 'dod pas 'bras kyi sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de bzhin du nub sgor zla ba kham pa lta bu'i kha khyer la
180b2(rgyud 'grel): byang du mngon par bltas nas tshe 'phel bar 'dod pas dur ba'i myu gu mar la sbags pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de bzhin du byang phyogs kyi sgor go cha 'dra ba'i kha khyer la lho phyogs su mngon par bltas nas bsrung ba'i phyir/ ku sha'i myu gu til mar gyis phyugs
180b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /yang na de bzhin du shar sgo kha khyer kun nas zlum po'i rnam pa la til la sogs pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /thab khung gi phyi rol tu shar nas byang du blta ba dang/ byang nas shar du blta ba dang/ lho nas shar du blta ba dang/ nub nas lhor? blta
180b4(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ ku sha bkram la sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de yang dkyil 'khor de dag de nyid ni/ /su zhig gis ni brtag par mi nus/ /rang gi lha'i sbyor ba yis/ /dkyil 'khor brtag pa grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so/ /slob dpon
