180b5(rgyud 'grel): gyis rab tu bcug nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyi las rnams bslab par bya ste/ de nyid ni rdo rje slob dpon du dbang bskur ba'i gnas gsang ba ste gsang ba ni 'di nyid do/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so/ /de nas rdo rje slob ma'i
180b6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs rab tu bcug la/ rdo rje'i chu la 'bum bzlas pas dbang bskur la/ rdo rje slob dpon nyid 'thob par 'gyur te/ 'di yang rdo rje slob dpon dbang bskur ba'i sngags so/ /oM badzro da ka hUM 'dis dbang bskur na dkyil 'khor thams cad bri zhing bdag nyid dbang bskur
180b7(rgyud 'grel): bas dbang bskur ro/ /gzhan gyis ni ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sogs pa'i slob dpon gzhan ni/ rdo rje slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor tu gzhug cing dbab bskur bar bya'o/ /rdo rje dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor du rdo rje slob dpon gyi las dang /
181a1(rgyud 'grel): slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par ni de nyid nas byung bas 'dir ma smras so/ /de lte mod kyi khyad par cung zad cig bshad par bya ste/ rdo rje slob dpon gyis slob ma la yon blang bar bya ste/ slob mas kyang gus pas mchod
181a2(rgyud 'grel): yon sngon du 'gro bas yon dbul bar bya'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' lhag par mos pas yon gyi mchog rnams dbul bar bya'o/ /gang la yongs su gtang dka' gang/ /de ni mchog tu bshad pa yin/ /de la gal te mchog 'dod la /de yang ngan pa'i yon
181a3(rgyud 'grel): 'bul na/ /kun gyi slob dpon brnyas pas na/ /de ni rtag tu sdug bsngal 'thob/ /rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du lhag par mos pas ni/ bu mo shin tu brgyan pa 'am/ /de bzhin chung ma sdug pa dag /phul nas
181a4(rgyud 'grel): rim gyis slu ba ni/ /sangs rgyas byang chub mchog gi yon/ /phyag na rdo rje yi ni rin chen rgyan thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa phur nas slar rin gyis slu bar bya'o/ /'jig rten dbang phyug gi ni shin tu dkar ba'i ras zung ngam mu tig gi 'phreng ba
181a5(rgyud 'grel): bzang po'o/ /nam mkha' i snying po'i rta dang glang po dkar po 'am shing rta nor bu rin po che la sogs pas brgyan pa'o/ /rdo rje sna tshogs kyis ni yon thams cad blangs la cho ga 'dis dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de la rgyal po ni rin po che las byas pa'i
181a6(rgyud 'grel): dbu brgyan no/ /lhag ma rnams ni lugs ma'am bcos ma byas pa'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yi ni sangs rgyas thams cad gyi sku'i rin po che dang/ dar dbyangs dang dbang bskur ba'i dbu rgyan no/ /phyag na rdo rje'i ni rdo rjes dbang bskur ba'i nor bu'i dpung
181a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyan no/ /'jig rten dbang phyug gi ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i nor bu'i rgyan no/ /nam mkha' i snying po yi ni rdo rje rin chen gyi myu gu dang ldan pa'i nor bu'i dbu rgyan no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po ches khams gsum gyi rgyal por
181b1(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur ba'i nor bu'i dbu rgyan te/ dbu rgyan gyi gsang sngags sngar bzlas brjod 'bum byas la dbang bskur ba'i dus su dbu rgyan rang gi gsang sngags lan brgya bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de nas dar dbyangs mgo la bcings nas rang gi rdo rje lag par bzhag la/ ji
181b2(rgyud 'grel): lta ba bzhin du bskur bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi/ dbang bskur ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'o/ /de nas khyod don 'byung ba'i dngos grub kyi ye shes dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod do/ /de nas de gar mngon bar 'dod pa de la sbyin bar bya'o/ /yang na
181b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya chen po sgrub par 'dod na de la rdo rje lta bu'i thabs kyi sgrub pa'i tshul gyis rang la sgrub pa'i thabs nye bar bstan par bya'o/ /de nas rang gi gnas su phyag rgya bkrol la dbang bskur ba dang cho ga bcings pa dang/ mnyes par bya ba la sogs pa byas
181b4(rgyud 'grel): nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la gyen du bkrol la/ sems can log par blta ba dang/ sdig pa'i las byed pa dang/ brtson 'grus chung ba dang/ sbyor ba med pa dang/ ri mo mi shes pa de dag gi phyir kun tu bzang po'i sbyin dreg gi cho ga'i tshul gyi rdo rje
181b5(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' i dkyil 'khor khru bcu pa'i byed kyi phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor bri'o/ /yo byad thams cad dang mi ldan pa rnams dang/ dam tshig 'dod pa rnams la ni phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du khams gsum rnam par
181b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi cho ga'i rjes su 'brangs pa dang/ rang gi rtog pa'i cho gas bri bar bya'o// //dkyil 'khor cho ga bsdus pa las/ /bsod nams bdag gis bsags
181b7(rgyud 'grel): pa gang/ /des ni sems can ma lus pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mchog 'grub shog /dpal ldan rgya che ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rdzogs so// //kun tu bzang bo zhes bya ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga bzhugs// //rgya gar skad du/
182a1(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta b+ha dra nA ma ho ma lo bi ka /bod skad du/ kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga /bcom ldan 'das dag gi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems brtan las byung ba/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad phyag 'tshal te/ /dngos grub
182a2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kun bsdus pa/ /sbyin sreg de nyid bdag gis bshad/ /de nyid rig pas sbyin sreg la/ /dgos pa dang po kun byas te/ /grogs bzang bya ba nges pa dang/ /phyi nas sbyin sreg rab tu bya/ /gtsug lag khang dang grong rdal dang/ /kun dga' grong ngam
182a3(rgyud 'grel): grong khyer ni/ /shar dang byang du blta ba ste/ /lho dang nub du ma yin no/ /shis shing sngon ni brten pa yi/ /sa ni mkhas bas bgrod par bya/ /yang na yid ni dga' 'gyur ba/ /gang yin der ni brtsams par bya/ /dkyil 'khor gnas ni sbyangs nas su/ /dkyil 'khor
182a4(rgyud 'grel): mchog ni bri bya ste/ /zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni mdzes byas la/ /thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /dang dang me tog phreng bas brgyan/ /grwa yi phyogs ni thams cad dang/ /sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen spras par ni/ /dkyil
182a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor phyi rim thig gdab po/ /de yi rim pa'i nang zhugs la/ /sbyin sreg thab ni bri bar bya/ /kun nas zung ni bzhi pa la/ /khru gnyis par ni yongs su bskrags/ /zabs su khru gang tsam la ni/ /kha khyer bzhis ni bskor ba'o/ /dbus su gtsug tor dgong? bya
182a6(rgyud 'grel): zhing/ /de yi shar du lhung bzed do/ /lho phyogs na ni rin chen te/ /nub kyi phyogs su pad+ma bri/ /byang du rdo rje hUM mdzad ni/ /gdug pa thams cad bzlog pa'o/ /mtshams kyi cha ni thams cad du/ /gsang ba'i mchod pa bstan pa dgod/ /de ltar thab khung nges byas naS?/
182a7(rgyud 'grel): kha khyer la ni 'jug par bya/ /dang po la ni sems dpa' che/ /bcu drug nyid du bsgrags pa yin/ /de yi rgyar ni sor brgyad la/ /dpangs su sor ni bzhi pa'o/ /kha khyer gnyis par gyur pa dag /de yang rgyar ni sor brgyad de/ /dpangs su sor ni brgyad par
182b1(rgyud 'grel): bshad/ /de dgod bdag gis bshad par bya/ /shar phyogs nas brtsams rim bzhin du/ /pad+ma nags kyi mjug ma dang/ /bgrang phreng ril pa spyi blugs dang/ /a 'dze na'i phyag rgya/ tri shU la dang zla ba phyed/ /ral pa mig dang rgyal mtshan che/ /mdzes shing bde ba'i phyag rgya
182b2(rgyud 'grel): che/ /lho yi phyogs su gzhag par bya/ /dung dang 'khor lo be con dang/ /ral gri dang ni de bzhin phub/ /phag dang seng ge gshibs ba ni/ /nub kyi phyogs su bri bar bya/ /mdung dang dril bu ba dang dang/ /rma bya de bzhin ra skyes dang/ /khyim bya lang tsos myos pa ni/ /byang
182b3(rgyud 'grel): gi phyogs su bri bar bya/ /kha khyer gsum par gyur pa dag /de yang rgyang ni sor brgyad pa/ /dbangs su sor ni bcu drug pa/ /sgo glegs dang ni gtan par bcas/ /de yi phyogs bzhir rta babs dang/ /bcas pa'i sgo rnams bya ba dang/ /dra ba dra byed me long
182b4(rgyud 'grel): bcas/ kha dan la sogs rnams gyis bskor/ /kha khyer bzhi par bshad pa ni/ /khor yug lta bur yang dag gnas/ /rgya ru sor ni bcu gnyis pa/ /dpangs su sor ni drug pa'o/ /de yang rdo rje phreng bas brgyan/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba 'od 'khrug pa/ /'di ni
182b5(rgyud 'grel): srung ma'i mchog yin zhes/ /rdo rje can gyis sngon gsungs so/ /sdig kun 'phrog cing bsod nams dang/ /dag byed dngos grub thams cad ster/ /bkra shis pa nyid yin bshad pa/ /'di ni thab khung yin par bsgrags/ /gang yang brgya rtsa bcu pa yi//
182b6(rgyud 'grel): thab khung bzang po bshad pa rnams/ /spyi yi thab khung gang yin pa/ /bye brag can bzhin gnas pa yin/ /thab khung gi ni mtshan nyid do/ /dgang gzar dang blugs gzar gyi mtshan nyid ni 'di yin te/ /dgang gzar gyi yu ba ni rgyal po'i lag pa'i tshad
182b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi sor bcu drug /kun nas sor bzhi pa/ dgang gcan? gyi zabs su sor gnyis pa/ steng du sor bzhi pa/ dbus su rdo rje rtse lngas mtshan pa/ yu ba'i 'og tu rdo rje dang rin po ches mtshan pa ni dgang gzang gyi mtshan nyid do/ /blugs bzang gyi mtshan nyid ni khru gang
183a1(rgyud 'grel): rtsam la steng du pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba sor gnyis pa la/ dbus rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa ni blugs gzar gyi mtshan nyid do/ /khrus dang nye rig la 'bang nas/ /rtag? tu sbyin sreg khang par 'jug /de nas bgegs rnams nyer zhi'i phyir//
183a2(rgyud 'grel): khro bo'i rgyal po rje 'dran bya/ /de la khro bo'i rgyal po ni 'di yin te/ khro bo ti rin ti ri'i phyag rgya bcings la/ hUM badzra a na la ha ha da ha pa tsa ma tha b+ha? ba na hUM phaT/ khro bo ti rin ti ri'i phyag rgya ni 'di yin te/ rdo rje bcing pa nang du bcings la/ mthe bong gnyis
183a3(rgyud 'grel): pa bsnyams? pas/ sor mo'i rtse mo thams cad brtsir? bar bya ste/ 'dis ni bdud la sogs pa bgegs thams cad bcom par 'gyur ro/ /de nas go cha 'dis phyogs bcing bar bya ste/ rdo rje gtsug tor dang/ rdo rje zhags pas shar phyogs bcing ngo/ /rdo
183a4(rgyud 'grel): rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ mthe'u chung gcig la gcig sprel? te/ mdzud mo gnyis rtse sbyar nas rtse mo bzlog ste/ spyi gtsug tu bzhag pa ni gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya ste/ sngags la oM hUM band+ha hUM/ zhes kyang smos/ rdo rje gtsug tor nyid zlum? por byas pa'i
183a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya ste/ sngags la h+rI(rgyud 'grel): badzra bA sha hUM/ de nas rdo rje'i ba dan gyis nub phyogs bcing bar bya ste/ rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la mthe bo gnyis sems dpa' i skyil mo krung du bya/ mdzub mo gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis brkyang ?
183a6(rgyud 'grel): ni rdo rje ba dan gyi phyag rgya ste/ sngags la/ oM badzra pa tam ka pa tam ke ni phaT?/ de nas rdo rje nag pos byang dang 'og dang steng dang mtshams rnams bcings te/ rdo rje thal mo sbyar ba bcings la mthe bo brkyang ste/ mdzub mo gnyis mche ba 'dra bar byas
183a7(rgyud 'grel): pa ni rdo rje nag po'i phyag rgya ste/ sngags la h+rI badzra kA li ru Ta ma Ta/ de nas rdo rje rtse mos lho phyogs bcings te/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la/ rtse mo ltar steng du bzhag pa ni rdo rje rtse mo'i phyag rgya ste/ sngags la oM badzra shi kha ra ru Ta ma Ta
183b1(rgyud 'grel): de nas rdo rje spyan gyi sngags dang phyag rgya dang rdo rje me ltar rab tu 'bar? bas bgegs bcing bar bya ste/ rdo rje bsdams pa byas la/ mthe bo gnyis brgyad ste mnyam bar bzhag pa ni rdo rje spyan gyi phyag rgya ste/ sngags la badzra Nai tri band+ha sarbba big+h+naM rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la mthe bo
183b2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis brkyang? pa ni rdo rje ? rin ti de'i phyag rgya ste/ 'dis spyi bo nas brtsams te bdag nyid dbang bskur ba byas la dar dpyangs pa'i tshul du bgrol nas/ mnyam pa'i thal mos mnyes bar bya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la/ /rdo rje khu tshur g.yon pa snying gar bzhag /rdo
183b3(rgyud 'grel): rje khu tshur g.yas pa gsor pa'i tshul du bzhag pa ni rdo rje me? ltar? rab? tu 'bar ba'i phyag rgya ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje me ltar rab tu 'bar ba bdung la sogs pa bgegs thams cad bsreg pa dang 'chod pa dang thal bar byed pa la sogs pa la khyab pa ste/ sngags la oM badzra
183b4(rgyud 'grel): dza? ? a na yArka hUM/ rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya bcings la g.yas nas bskor bas phyogs bcing zhing/ dkyil 'khor bcing ba byas nas rdo rje hUM mdzad kyis steng du rdo rje rab byas nas/ dkyil 'khor bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas sa gzhi bcing bar bya ste/ rdo rje bsdams pa
183b5(rgyud 'grel): mthung? du bstan te sa la bzhag na sa'i gzhi rnams rdo rje'i rang bzhin du 'gyur te/ rang bzhin ngan pa rnams kyis 'jug par dka' bar 'gyur ro/ /sngags ni oM badzra dri Dho me b+ha ba rak+Sha sarbbaM swA hA/ zhes pa 'dis sa bcing bar bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgyas nam mkha' 
183b6(rgyud 'grel): bcing bar bya ste/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya ni rdo rje nag mo'i phyag rgya nyid do/ /sngags ni a'oM badzra yak+Sha hUM/ de nas rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi mig gi phyag rgyas steng bcing bar bya ste/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcing la mgal me bskor ba'i tshul du bskor te mgo bo'i steng du mdzub mo
183b7(rgyud 'grel): lcags rgyu? 'dra bar bzhag pa ni rdo rje 'jigs byed sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o/ /sngags ni oM hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje bsdams pas rdo rje'i dra ba bya ste/ rdo rje bsngams pa ni rdo rje bsngam pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /sngags ni oM badzra band+ha/ de nas dogs pa med par gyur par byas
184a1(rgyud 'grel): nas mchod pa bya ste/ rdo rje thal mo brkyang nas lus thams cad kyis phyag rgya'o/ /oM badzra sarbba ta thA ga ta pU dzo pa s+tha nA ya/ At+mA nAM niryA ta ya mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra satwa ad+hi tiSh+Thi swa mAM/ de nas de bzhin du gnas la rdo rje thal mo snying gar
184a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhag ste/ dpral bas phyag bya ste/ oM sarbba ta thA ga ta bU dza a b+hi She kA ya ata mA nAM niryA ta yA mi sarbba ta thA ga ta badzra ratna a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ de nas thal mo spyi bor bzhag la mkhas phyag bya'o/ /oM sarbba ta thA ga ta pU dza pra bar ta na ya At+ma nAM niryA ta ya mi
184a3(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta badzra d+harmma pra bar ta ya mAM/ de nas de bzhin du rdo rje thal mo spyi bo nas phab la/ snying gar bzhag nas/ mgos phyag bya ste/ oM sarbba ta thA ga ta pU dza karma Ni At+mA nAM nirya ta yA mi sarbba ta thA ga ta badzra karmma ku ru mAM/ des ni mchod pa bye ba byas par 'gyur
184a4(rgyud 'grel): lag pa gnyis rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la/ pus mo gnyis la gtsugs te/ spyi bo da la gtugs pa ni phyag bya ba'i phyag rgya ste/ sngags ni oM sarbba ta thA ga ta kA ya bIk+tsat+ta? bA ra ba d+ha naM ka ro mi zhes bya ba'o/ /bdug spos kyi phyag rgya bcings la/ lha'i bdug
184a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mchod pa rnams dran bzhin du sngags 'di brjod do/ /oM sarbba ta thA ga ta d+hA ba pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ya hUM/ de nas me tog gi phyag rgya bcing la/ thang las skyes pa dang chu las skyes pa'i me tog gi sprin rnams spros te/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta?
184a6(rgyud 'grel): puShpe pu dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas mar me'i phyag rgya bcings la/ nyi ma'i snang ba dbul bar bya ste oM sarbba ta thA ga ta A lo ke pU dza me g+ha sa mu tra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ byug pa'i phyag rgya bcings la/ lha la sogs pa'i spos kyi sprin rnam
184a7(rgyud 'grel): dbul bar bya ste/ oM sarbba ta thA ga ta gand+ha d+ha pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas rin po che brag la sogs pa rnams dbul te/ oM sarbba ta thA ga ta bo d+hyaM ga rat nA khaM ka ra pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas rtsed mo'i bde ba thams cad
184b1(rgyud 'grel): dbul te/ oM sarbba ta thA ga ta tA sya la sya kri da ra ti sau khya a nut+ta? ra pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas gos kyi mchod pa rnams dbul te/ oM sarbba ta thA ga ta bo d+hi a laM ka ra bastwa? pU ja me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya bcings te
184b2(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad kyis tshangs pa chen po'i gnas bzhi thob par gyur cig ces brjod la de dbul te/ oM sarbba ta thA ga ta tsa dur? mahA prahma bi ha ra pU dza ma g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas rdo rje snyems pa'i phyag rgya bcings te/ sems can thams cad kyang byang
184b3(rgyud 'grel): chub kyi sems la gnas par gyur cig ces brjod nas dbul te/ oM sarbba ta thA ga ta bo d+hitsit+ta pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ sems can thams cad sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces brjod la de dpul te/ oM sarbba ta thA ga ta badzrod b+ha ba d+hA
184b4(rgyud 'grel): na pA ra mi tA pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje sgeg me'i phyag rgya'o/ /sems can thams cad tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces brjod la de dbul te/ oM sarbba ta thA ga ta ma hA b+ho d+hya ha ra shI
184b5(rgyud 'grel): lnga pa ra ma tA pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje phreng ba ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin ba dang ldan par gyur cig ces brjod la de dbul te/ oM sarbba ta thA ga ta d+harmma a ba bo d+haM
184b6(rgyud 'grel): k+Sha? na ti pA ra mi tA bU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ brjod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje glu mkhan ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /sems can thams cad 'khor ba yongs su mi spong ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces brjod la de
184b7(rgyud 'grel): dbul ta/ oM sarbba ta thA ga ta sa na sA rA pa ri tyaM ka pIrya pA ra mi tA pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje gar mkhan ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /sems can thams cad bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan zhing sems zhi bar gyur
185a1(rgyud 'grel): cig ces brjod la/ bdag gi bsam gtan sangs rgyas thams cad la dbul te/ oM sarbba ta thA ga ta sau khya bi hA da d+hya na pA ra mi tA pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na snga? ma ye hUM/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje me tog ma'i phyag rgya
185a2(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtogs par khong du chud pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces brjod la/ sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa'i phyir de dran par bya ste/ oM sarbba ta thA ga ta kle sha ts+tshe dpu man ta pradz+nyA
185a3(rgyud 'grel): ? mi hA pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje bdug pa ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /bdag nyid 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi tshad dang mnyam par bsams la bdud par bya ste/ oM sarbba ta thA ga ta kA ya/
185a4(rgyud 'grel): na rya ta na pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi tshad dang mnyam pa'i lce bsams la bstod pas mchod pa bya ste/ oM sarbba ta thA ga ta ShAka pra brtan pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ bsod nams de rnams
185a5(rgyud 'grel): bsdus la sems can thams cad la nye bar bsngo bar bya ste/ oM sarbba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta niryA ta pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa mo ye hUM/ mchod pa nyi shu rdzogs so// /de ltar mchod pa byas nas dam tshig dang sdom pa blang bar bya ste/ sangs
185a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas gzung ste/ byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du/ ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /byang chub tu ni nges byas pa'o/ /byang chub
185a7(rgyud 'grel): sems ni bla med pa/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la/ /tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang/ /dge ba'i chos ni bsdu ba dang/ /sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum/ /de bzhin brtan par bzung bar bgyi/
185b1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /de nas brtsams te bzung bar bgyi/ /nam du yang ni mi spang ngo/ /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya dang/ /yang dag nyid du bzung bar bgyi/ /slob dpon dag kyang bzung bar
185b2(rgyud 'grel): bgyi/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/ /nyin de zhing ni dus drug du/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rab tu sbyin/ /byang chub chen po las byung ba/ /pad+ma'i rigs mchog dam pa la/ /phyi dang gsang ba theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos ni bzung bar
185b3(rgyud 'grel): bgyi/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan pa ni/ /yang dag nyid du bzung par bgyi/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi/ /byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed nas ni/ /sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir/ /bdag gis
185b4(rgyud 'grel): sdom pa ma lus bzung?/ /ma brgal ba rnams bsgral bar bgyi/ /mgrol ba rnams dgrol bar bgyi/ /dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing/ /sems can mya ngan 'dis? bzhag bgyi/ /sdom pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyi/ /dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya ?
185b5(rgyud 'grel): cho ga bzhin bcings zhugs nas kyang/ /po tI'i phyag rgya dbab par bgyi/ /de la dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya ni 'di yin te/ zla ba lta bu'i lag gnyis kyi/ /gung mo btang bar gyur pa yi/ /mthe po mthe chung so sor bsgreng/ /sems dpa' i rdo rje rdo rje bsgreng/ /shar
185b6(rgyud 'grel): phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yid kyis bcings la/ /gsang sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ /badzra aM ku sha dzdza(rgyud 'grel): lho phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje zhags pas bskul bar bya ste/ badzra pA sha hUM /nub phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje lcags sgrog rjes su dran par bya ste/
185b7(rgyud 'grel): badzra sphoT? paM/ byang phyogs kye sgor rdo rje dril bu brjod par bya ste/ badzra A be a:rdo rje 'bebs pa rjes su dran pas bskor ba lan gsum bya'o/ /oM badzra be gA kra ma hUM/ rdo rje sems ma'i snying po ni/ sa ma ya stwaM/ oM sa ma ya hUM/ snying po 'dis sbyin sreg gi
186a1(rgyud 'grel): khang par rtag tu 'jug par bya'o/ /oM sa ma ya pre be sha ya mi hUM/ oM pad+ma spho Ta a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa ba a/ gsang sngags 'di dang/ rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya bcing ba sbyar pa byas la/ ye shes bskyed par bya'o/ /a zhes bya ba lan brgya
186a2(rgyud 'grel): bzlas nas babs par 'gyur ro/ /theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa yang ci 'dod par bzlas par bya'o/ /gsol pa btab la/ phyag rgya de snying gar bcings nas/ snying po 'dis dgrol bar bya'o/ /oM tiSh+Tha badzra dzri Dho me b+ha pa/ su to Sh+yo ma b+ha ba/ shA shwa
186a3(rgyud 'grel): nyo me b+ha pa/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ h+ri da ya me a d+hi tiSh+Tha sarba sid d+hi me pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma su tsa ma tsit+taM sh+ri ya(rgyud 'grel): ku ru hUM ha ha ha ha ho(rgyud 'grel): de nas phreng ba de thab khung du snying po 'di sa dor par bya'o /oM pra tits+tsha badzra ho:de nas phreng ba de rang gi
186a4(rgyud 'grel): mgo la snying po 'dis bcing bar bya'o/ /pra ti grih+na swa mi maM satwa mahA ba la/ de nas snying po 'dis rang gi gdong g.yogs dgrol bar bya'o/ /oM badzra satwa swa yaM te d+hya/ tsak+Shu ud+g+ha Ta na tatpa? ra/ ud+g+ha Ta ya ti sarbba k+Sho badzra tsak+Shur a nut+ta ra ma he badzra pA sh+ya ha
186a5(rgyud 'grel): rnam? rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa'i spos chu dang snying po 'dis bdag nyid dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /oM badzra a b+hi Shinyitsa/ de nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis bdag nyid dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de la
186a6(rgyud 'grel): de rnams kyi phyag rgya ni 'di yin te/ mthe po gnyis ni bsnol nas ni/ /mdzub mo'i rtse mo bkug nas ni/ /gung mo mnyams pa'i tshigs su sbyar/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad/ /de nyid gung mo rdo rjer bya/ /gung mo gnyis ni nor bur bya/ /pad+ma srin lag
186a7(rgyud 'grel): mthe'u chung gung/ /lag pa'i sor mo rab tu brkyang/ /de la de rnams kyi rig pa ni 'di yin te/ oM badzra d+hA twI shwA ri hUM/ oM badzra badzri Ni hUM oM ratna badzri Ni hUM/ oM d+hArma badzri Ni hUM/ oM karma badzra Ni hUM/ de nas rang gi rdo rje lag tu bzhag nas 'di skad
186b1(rgyud 'grel): ces brjod par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje'i dbang/ /de ring khyod ni skur bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun tu rab bsgrub phyir/ /rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long/ /oM badzra a d+hi pa ti twaM/ /a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi tiSh+Tha badzra sa ma yaM stwaM/ de nas snying po 'dis ming gi dbang bskur bas
186b2(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur ro/ /oM badzra satwa twaM a b+hi Shin? kAM badzra nA ma a b+hi She kra ta he badzra nA ma/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub rdo rje'i brtul zhugs blang bar bya'o/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad de/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i lag na 'dug /khyod kyis kyang
186b3(rgyud 'grel): ni rtag tu bcang/ /phyag na rdo rje brtul zhugs brtan/ /oM sarbba ta thA ga ta sid+ha badzra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha e ka twaM d+ha ra yA mi badzra satwa hi hi hi ha hUM/ bdag la byin gyis brlabs la sogs/ /ji lta bar ni bka' nod do/ /de ltar bgyis nas bdag ming brjod/ /da nas  
186b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rjes bsgrub par bgyi/ /zhes gang gsungs pa de slar yang bshad pa de dag yin no/ /rdo rje slob dpon sems dpa' yi/ /rdo rje lcags kyu bcings nas ni/ /se gol mang ba brdab bgyis la/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bgyi/ /dza:hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): snying
186b5(rgyud 'grel): po 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na/ des sangs rgyas thams cad sras dang bcas pa dang/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa gshegs par 'gyur na/ gzhan rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos/ da nas rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /phyag rgya chen po sgom
186b6(rgyud 'grel): byed cing/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni/ /lan cig rab tu brjod par bgyi/ /de nas sgo rnams thams cad du/ /lcags kyu la sogs las bgyis nas/ /las chen mchog gi phyag rgya yis/ /dam tshig rnams ni gzhug par bgyi/ /dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya dang
186b7(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' rdo rje la sogs pas/ /de ltar sems dpa' chen po bsgrub/ /ja:hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod bcing/ /de nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa/ /sems dpa' chen po kun bsdu par/ /spyan drangs nas ni rab tu bcug /bcing nas de yi dbang du 'gyur/ /de nas
187a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid chen po rnams/ /gsang ba'i mchod pas mnyes bgyis la/ /thams cad don kun 'grub pa'i phyir/ /thams cad mdzad ces gsol ba bgyi/ /de nas sbyin sreg gi yo byang thams cad rdo rje'i rtse mo'i sngags kyis bsang la gags
187a2(rgyud 'grel): phyogs su gzhag go /mchod yon gyi snod ni g.yon du gzhag nas/ rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid kyi gsang sngags 'dis dgang blugs gsum dbul lo/ /oM badzra dzwa la agni bra dI pa ta A ka ra
187a3(rgyud 'grel): Sha la sarbba ta wA gtan ma mahA sa ma ya badzra hUM dza:de nas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad thab kyi dbus su ji lta ba bzhin bsgoms la/ byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcings nas/ til gyi sreg blugs dbul lo/ /yam shing
187a4(rgyud 'grel): dbang po rnams kyi ma/ /rab sbar rdo rje khro bo yi/ /mnyam par bzhag par snyoms? zhugs par/ /til sregs pas ni sdig bsregs shing/ /gsang sngags ni 'dis bya ste/ oM sarbba pA paM da ha na badzrA ya swA hA/ khyim rgyas par 'dod pas bcom ldan 'das
187a5(rgyud 'grel): ? 'byung ldan thab gyi dbus su bsgoms la/ mar gyi dgang blugs gsum dbul lo/ /yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni/ /me ni rab tu spar nas kyang/ /rtag tu 'bras ni bsregs byas nas/ /gong ni mi za bar khyim byas 'gyur/ /gsang sngags ni 'dis
187a6(rgyud 'grel): bya ste/ mi badzra puSh+Ta ye swA hA/ de nas tshe ring bar 'dod pas/ bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu med pa thab kyi dbus su bsams la mar gyi bgang blugs gsum dbul lo/ /yam shing mngar po rnams kyis kyang/ /mkhas pas rtag tu me spar te/ /bUr? ba'i
187a7(rgyud 'grel): myu gu mar bcas pas/ /sbyin sreg byas na tshe 'phel 'gyur/ /gsang sngags ni 'dis bya ste/ oM badzra A yu:She swA hA/ de nas bdag gam gzhan rnams bsrung bar 'dod pas/ bcom ldan 'das don yong grub pa thab kyi dbus su bsgoms la til mar gyi
187b1(rgyud 'grel): dgong glugs gsum dbul lo/ /yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni/ /me ni rab tu sbar bya la/ /ku sha'i yal ga 'bru mar gyis/ /sbyin sreg byas nas nges par bsrung/ /gsang sngags ni 'dis bya ste/ oM a pra ti ha ta badzrA ya swA hA/ de nas rang gi lha thab kyi dbus su bsamS
187b2(rgyud 'grel): la til dang 'bras dang mar dang dur ba dang til mar dang/ ku sha'i myu gu la sogs pa dbul ba dang dgang blugs dang po dang rdzogs khar dbul par bya'o/ /zhi ba phal cher srod la bya'o/ /rgyas pa snga dro bya ba yin/ /mngon sbyor nyi ma gung la ste/ /sgrub pa pos ni
187b3(rgyud 'grel): mdor bsdus pa'o/ /zhi la kha dog dkar po ste/ /rgyas la ser po snang ba yin/ rjes su chags la kha dog dmar/ /mngon spyod la ni sngo dang gnag /de'i dngos grub kyi mtshan ma ni 'di dag yin te/ rdo rje lcags kyu mda' mgu dang/ /rin chen nyi ma rgyal mtshan 'dzum
187b4(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma ral gri 'khor lo gzung/ /las dang go cha 'jigs byed bcangs/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang/ du ba dang dri'i mtshan mar gyur pa rnams te de rnams mthong nas/ dgang blugs phul la sbyin sreg bya'o/ /sbyin sreg gis lha rnams tshim par byas nas/ bya
187b5(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad 'grub par ro 'gyur ? zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so/ /de bas na nus pa med pas kyang ci nus pas sbyin sreg bya'o/ /nus pa med pa'i phyir brjod par bya ste/ rang gi khang pa'i byang shar gyi phyogs su thab khur zur bzhi
187b6(rgyud 'grel): 'am/ bla ma ? khru gang tsam la thabs su mtho gang tsam brkos te thab khung gi dbus su rdo rje rtsi lnga pa sor brgyad pa'i tshad la dpangs su sor bzhi pa bzhag thab kyi ngos la dpangs su sor bzhi pa'i grwa bzhir rdo rje mtshan pa bya'o/ /de la phyag rgya mdor
187b7(rgyud 'grel): bsdus pa ni 'di yin te/ thal mo dam du sbyar ba las/ /sor mo thams cad bsnol ba ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ /rdo rje thal mo'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje 'chang chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya yang dam tshig gam phyag rgya'i rim pa rnams nye bar
188a1(rgyud 'grel): bstan te/ rdo rje bcing pas phyag rgya thams cad bcing ngo/ /rdo rje thal mo'i phyag rgya de nyid bcings nas/ rab tu bsdams pa ni rdo rje bsdams pa ste/ snying gar dgrol lo/ /badzra b+han d+ha traT/ de nas phyag rgya thams cad bcings la rang la byin
188a2(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlab pa nas ji srid rdo rje rjes su dran pa dang dgug pa la sogs pa sgrub pa'i bye brag rnams rang gi lus dang ngag yid rdo rje la dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/ bcing ba dang/ dbang du byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya
188a3(rgyud 'grel): bcings la snying po 'di brjod par bya'o/ /a rdo rje khu tshur gyi mdzub mo sbyar ba ni rdo rje 'bebs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /de nas bzhugs nas rang la byin gyis brlabs pa nas ji srid sgrub pa'i khyad par gyis mdza' po nyid du gnas par 'gyur ro//
188a4(rgyud 'grel): de nas dam tshig chen po'i sems dpa' rjes su dran la/ snying po 'di brjod par bya'o/ /sa ma ya satwa haM/ 'dis ni rdo rje rgyal po la sogs pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgyas dam tshig chen po'i sems dpa' dang gcig tu gyur pa nyid du 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya thams
188a5(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o/ /de nas thun mong gi sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/ bcom ldan 'das dam tshig sems dpa' chen po de nyid rang gyi lus la brten cing zla ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la bzhugs te/ rdo rje rgyal po la sogs pa'i sku
188a6(rgyud 'grel): ban ? nyid du snying po 'dis bsgom par bya'o/ /sa ma yo haM/ de nas rang gi phyag rgya'i sems dpar bdag nyid rnam par bsams la sngags 'dis der byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /sa ma ya satwa a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM de nas rang gi lha snga ma bzhin du thab kyi dbus su
188a7(rgyud 'grel): bsams la sbyin sreg ji lta ba bzhin du bya ste/ mchod nas snying po 'dis gsol lo/ /badzra mu:de nas rang gi snying ga las byung ba'i rdo rje rin chen gyis phyag rgya rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas na gnas pa'i dbang bskur la mdzub mo gnyis kyi phreng ba bcing zhing de
188b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du snying po 'dis bcing bar bya'o/ /oM badzra ratna a b+hi Shiny+tsa sarbba mu dra mai dri d+hi ku ru ba ra ka ba tse na baM/ rin chen sems ma'i phyag rgya ni 'di yin te/ rin chen rdo rje las mthe po bsnyams te mdzub mo bkug pa dang rtse sbyar ba'o/ /de nas yang go cha'i mthar phreng ba bcing
188b2(rgyud 'grel): ba de dkrol? la snying po 'di dang mnyam pa'i thal mos mnyes par bya'o/ /badzra tu Sh+ya ho/ /go cha 'dis phyag rgya dgrol ba dang/ dbang bskur bcing zhing/ mnyes par bya ba 'am/ rdo rje sems dpas kyang rdo rje nyid du nye bar dgrol bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa
188b3(rgyud 'grel): brjod la/ gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhi bya'o/ /rdo rje 'gying ba'i tshul gyis su/ /bsams pa g.yos pas gdung par bya/ /phreng ba bcing dang kha nas 'byung/ /rdo rje gar ni bskor ba yin/ /rdo rje khu tshur sbyor ba yis/ /spos la sogs pa de bzhin dbul/ /thur du blugs ?
188b4(rgyud 'grel): gyen du gnyid/ /bskor dang de bzhin byug pa'o/ /badzra lA sye/ badzra mU le/ badzra g+hi ti/ badzra nri tye/ badzra d+hu be/ badzra puShpe/ badzra a lo ke/ badzra gan d+he/ rdo rje bstod pa'i glu ni 'di yin te/ oM badzra satwa su saM gra ha ta/ badzra ratna ma nut+ta ra/ badzra d+harma gA ya ne/ badzra ?
188b5(rgyud 'grel): ? rdo rje bston pa'i glu 'di dang/ glu blangs la/ lag pa'i rtse mos gar byas nas/ mchod pa thams cad bya'o/ /rab dang 'bad pas khrus byas te/ rtag tu sbyin sreg khang par zhugs shes ji skad du bshad pa de ma smras so zhe na/ de brjod par bya ste/ rnam rtog
188b6(rgyud 'grel): khrus kyi sbyor ba 'di/ /rdo rje slob dpon gyis bshad pa/ /de ni rnam rtog tsam gyis pas/ /de la blo ni 'jug mi bya/ /de bas sngags dang phyag rgya yis/ /legs byas khrus ni bshad par bya/ /rnam rtog la ni sbyor bzhin du/ /gang gi bgegs ni mi 'jug pa'o/ /zhes bcom ldan
188b7(rgyud 'grel): 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so/ /khro bo ti rin ti ri'i phyag rgya bcings la/ snying gar bzhag ste/ lus 'bar ba'i gsang 'sngags bzla'o/ /oM kru bi ku bi kA ya ku pi pra dzwa la ni swA hA/ de nas cho ga 'di dang/ dang po'i yi ge'i go chas go bgo ste rdo rje khu tshur
189a1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis bcings te/ snying gar mdzub mo gnyis kyis mdud pa byas la rgyab du drangs te mdud pa bya/ slar yang snying gar drangs te mdud pa bya/ de bzhin lkog ma'i steng du mdud par bya ba dang/ dpral bar mdud pa bya ba dang/ ltag par mdud pa byas nas
189a2(rgyud 'grel): rna ba gnyis gyi gong du mdza' nas dgrol bas dar dbyangs bya ste/ mnyam pa'i thal mos mnyes par bya'o/ /de la gsang sngags ni 'di yin te/ oM TuM rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis gdug pa thams cad bza' bar bya zhing/ mche ba'i phyag rgya bcings la/ gsang sngags
189a3(rgyud 'grel): brjod par bya'o/ /hUM de nas bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi gsang sngags brjod de/ a bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi phyag rgya ni rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nas gsang sngags 'dis ? snyim pa gsum gyen du gtor par bya'o/ /oM b+hur? dzwa la hUM swA hA/ rig sngags 'dis chags sum du
189a4(rgyud 'grel): bya ste/ gcig gis ni dag pa'i gtsang sbra bya'o/ /gnyis pas lus kyi gtsang sbra bya'o/ /gsum pas ni khrus dang nye reg bya zhing/ rang gi mgor rang gi gsang sngags dang phyag rgyas chu gtor na/ rang gi rnam par rtog pa las skyes pa'i bgegs mi 'byung ste/ semS
189a5(rgyud 'grel): can 'tshe ba'am sdig pa dag/ khyed la med kyis ma 'jigs shig/ rigs pa las byung dge ba bzhin/ /bgegs ni rang gi sems las byung/ /khrus byas nas ni sbyin sreg gi cho ga thams cad spyad par bya'o/ /de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te/ snying po 'dis
189a6(rgyud 'grel): gyen du dgrol lo/ /oM khyed kyis 'gro ba'i don kun mdzad/ /dngos grub ji bzhin gsol lags kyis/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs su gsol/ /badzra satwa mu(rgyud 'grel): de nas thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i byang chub kyi sems chen po rjes su dran la/ ci bde bar gnas pa
189a7(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i ming tsam zhig/ lan cig yongs su gzung bas kyang/ /'di ni bsrung ba dam pa ste/ /mi zad rtag pa'i dngos grub ster/ /mkhas pa dang pa'i rgyal pos rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /'dir ni sbyin sreg chog bris pas dge ba gang
189b1(rgyud 'grel): bsags pa/ /des ni srid gsum tsher ma 'byin cing zhi bzhi rtog ldan pa/ /rgyal ba lnga yi cod pan 'dzin dang 'gro ba rjes su mnyam par shog /kun tu bzang po'i zhes bya ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga rdzogs so// //bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag
189b2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' la/ /kun nas dang bas phyag 'tshal te/ rgyud rnams thams cad las bsdus te/ /rab gnas cho ga bshad par bya/ /de la dang po re zhig rnal 'byor pa dkyil 'khor du zhugs shing dbang thob pa/ rigs pa'i sdom pa gzung
189b3(rgyud 'grel): pa/ gsang ba'i cho ga'i bya ba shes pa/ dpal brtan pa spro ba che ba/ dul ba phrin las rnam pa bzhi'i spyod pa dang ldan pa/ gsang ba'i ye shes bslab pa/ phyag rgya bzhi bsgom par mos pa'i rnal 'byor pa dang/ sgrub pa'i grogs po byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/
189b4(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i cho ga'i bya ba shes pa/ gtsang ma/ gsang ba'i bya ba la mkhas pa/ blo dang ldan pa dang/ snying stobs dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ grong khyer ram grong rdal lam/ nags tshal lam/ ljongs sam/ kun dga' ra ba'am/ gtsug lag khang du lugS
189b5(rgyud 'grel): su blugs pa'am/ 'bur du brkos pa'am/ ri mor bris bzhi pa'am/ dbang dam rgyas pa'am/ mngon spyod la sogs pa'i sku rab tu gnas pa byed par 'dod na/ dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi nye 'khor du dris nye bar byug nas dkon mchog gsum dang/ rab tu gnas
189b6(rgyud 'grel): par byed pa'i lha dang/ rdo rje slob dpon la dmigs te/ maN+Dal lnga byas nas mchod pa lnga bshams nas/ stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs bgos nas cod pan dang rgyan btags te/ phreng ba dang dag byed dang ldan pas/ skar ma rgyal dang gza' phur bu'i nyin par
189b7(rgyud 'grel): khrus byas shing zas dkar gsum zos par gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang bdan dang dril bu rnams bres te/ gu gul gyi dud pas bdug pa dang/ yungs kar gyis bgegs bzlog nas bsnyems pa dang/ de la re zhig rnam par rtog pa shas chung na/ stong pa nyid kyi
190a1(rgyud 'grel): khrus bya ba/ lce byin gyis brlab pa dang/ lag pa byin gyis brlab pa dang/ khro bo bzhi'i lus bskyed pa dang/ khro po gsum gyis bgegs bsal ba dang/ khro bo drug gis phyogs bcing ba dang/ khro bo gsum gyis rab dang dra ba byas la/ mchod pa
190a2(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlabs nas/ rdo rje 'khor los dkyil 'khor sbrul la/ mchod pa dang phyag btsal ba dang/ sdig pa bshags pa dang/ rjes su yi rang ba dang/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul pa dang/ mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba gdab pa dang/
190a3(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa'i sprin dang lus dbul ba dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba sngo ba dang/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang/ sdom pa bzung ba dang/ gzugs brnyan gyi lhar bskyed na/ mnyam pa'i thal mo dang/ rdo rje sdams pa dang/ bsdams pa dral ba dang/ ye shes dbab pa dang
190a4(rgyud 'grel): dbab pa nye bar bsdu ba dang/ ngan song dgug bcing sdig pa dang dral ba dang/ dkyil 'khor snying gar bsdu ba dang/ mngon par byang chub pa lngas lhar bskyed la/ byin gyis brlab pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyis bsgom pa dang/ snying gang dbang bskur ba dang/ phrin laS
190a5(rgyud 'grel): gyi brtul zhugs blang ba dang/ rnal 'byor chen po bskyed pa dang/ rjes su rnal 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i khams bzhugs pa dang/ byin gyis brlab pa dang/ dbang bskur ba dang/ mchod pa dang bstod pa byas la/ bdag nyid thabs kyi 'khor lo rdzogs
190a6(rgyud 'grel): par byas la/ ye shes kyi sbyor bstong ba nyid bsgom pa dang/ rdo rje'i sa sbyong ba 'byung ba rim brtsegs gzhal yas khang gdan dang bcas pa bskyed pa dang/ 'chi ba'i srid pa ri rab kyi rtse mos lus bzhag pa dang/ srid pa bar ma do bsam gtan gzugs nang
190a7(rgyud 'grel): pa bsgom pa dang/ skye ba'i rnal 'byor byang chub sems dpa' don grub tu bskyed pa dang/ mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin las bslang nas dang po'i sbyor ba dang/ dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog dang/ las rgyal mchog bsgoms la/ ye shes sems dpa' gzhug
190b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i las brgyad kyis ye shes sems dpa' bcug la/ rgyas btab nas dbang bskur ba dang/ mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod la/ ji lta ba bzhin du bsgom par bya'o/ /de ltar mchin ma ma thob kyi bar du bsgom pa 'am/ gtso bo la 'bum dang/ 'khor rnams la khri khri
190b2(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pa dbul ba dang/ rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma bzhin du/ zla ba bzhi 'am zla ba drug tu bsnyen pa bya'o/ /de ltar bsnyen pa byas nas sa sbyar pa'am ma sbyangs pa'i gnas sa'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du byas te/ lhag par gnas par bya'o/ /de la mchod pa bshams pa dang/
190b3(rgyud 'grel): rdzas bsags te rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan la gdong dri zhim par byas la/ me tog gi phreng ba btags te/ rgyu skad rgyal gyi zhag dang gza' phur bu la/ bsrung ba'i 'khor lo rten dang bcas pa dang/ tshogs sogs pa'i dmigs pa'i yul dang bcas pa dang
190b4(rgyud 'grel): tshigs kyi lam dngos sems bskyed pa dang bcas pa dang/ rdo rje dbab pa chog bzhin du bya ba dang/ phyag rgya chen po cho ga bzhin du bcing ba dang/ mdun du sems dpa' cho ga bzhin du bskyed de/ bdag nyid rdzogs par byas nas// 'byung ba ri rab dang bcas pa
190b5(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pa'i steng du sa'i lha mo spyan drangs la/ cho ga bzhin du de nas dbang du gsol te ji ltar bzhin du spro ba bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas bsam gtan dang gzugs med kyis ting nge 'dzin gsum du byas nas/ 'og min du don grub kyi gzugs su skyes par
190b6(rgyud 'grel): bsams la/ phyogs bcu sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bar bya'o/ /de nas dang por sbyor ba dang/ dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog dang/ las rgyal mchog bsgoms la/ bsod nams kyi tshogs sogs pa'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas/ sgrub pa'i grog
190b7(rgyud 'grel): kyis mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas gsol ba btab la/ bdag nyid 'khor lo sgyur ba'i phyed du brjod par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor nam mkha' la khro bo'i bstod pa dang/ bgegs la bka' bsgo ba byas nas/ rdo rje'i lta bas rab dang/ dra ba byas nas/ stang stabs gyis?
191a1(rgyud 'grel): dgegs bsal ba dang/ sngags dang phyag rgyas bsrung ba'i 'khor los byas la/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bkug nas/ de'i yan lag phur bu ji lta ba bzhin du btab nas/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi bgegs bsal la dri'i thig le dang
191a2(rgyud 'grel): me tog tshom bu bkod la/ lha lhag par gnas par bya'o/ /de nas bum pa lhag par gnas pa dang/ sbyin sreg lhag par gnas pa dang/ gtor ma lhag par gnas pa ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o/ /de nas shing bu gru gsum gyi nang du/ kham por
191a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhag nas/ der me blugs la zur gsum du bag zan gyi skor bu gsum byas te/ der me mar btang nas bag zan gyi chang ba gsum byas nas/ rdo rje gtsug tor gyi sngags sam/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags kyis/ yungs kar gyis bgegs bzlog
191a4(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /sku gzugs sam glegs bam la sogs pa rab gnas gang byed pa de ras kyis g.yogs la/ hUM bruM h+rI:gsum gyis bsrungs nas gzhag par bya'o/ /de nas snyan gsan dbab par bya ste/ ji ltar sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /dga' ldan
191a5(rgyud 'grel): du ni bzhugs pa na/ /lha mo sgyu 'phrul lhu ma bzhags ltar/ /de bzhin gzugs brnyan 'dir bzhugs shig /'dir mgon po brtan bzhugs nas/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed pa dang/ /che ge mo yi don slad du/ /bdag ni 'byor pa nyid kyis ni/ /ci 'byor pa
191a6(rgyud 'grel): yi mchod pa rnams/ /me tog la sogs 'di bzhes shig /bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la/ /rjes su brtse bar dgongs su gsol/ /kun gyis 'di la byin brlab cing/ /de nyid du ni bzhugs par rigs/ /de nas nyi ma shar khar dkyil 'khor thig btab pa
191a7(rgyud 'grel): chen? dgye zhing lha dgod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga las bshad pa bzhin byas la/ rdzas bsags nas/ dkyil 'khor blangs te/ lhag pa dang mtshang ba/ bskangs la/ bum pa gzhug par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi byang phyogs su khrus kyi khang pa yid du
191b1(rgyud 'grel): 'od ba/ shes gyis gzhi la rin po che'i ka bas brgyan pa/ mu tig dang rin po ches spras pa brtsigs pa 'am bris la/ rab tu gnas pa byed par 'dod pas/ thog mar khrus gyi khang pa der lha spyan drangs la/ khri'i steng du bzhag pa 'am ras ris po ti la sogs
191b2(rgyud 'grel): pa yin na mdun du bzhag la/ me long bstan la bum pa rnams kyis sku khrus gsol ba bstod dbyangs dang bcas pa bya ste/ de la bstod dbyangs ni/ ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni/ /lha yi chu ni dag pa yis/ /de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ltar/ /de bzhin
191b3(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis sku khrus gsol/ /yoM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka sa ma ya sh+rI ye hUM/ de nas rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang ldan pa'i/ lha'i sku la gnam gsum du/ yi ge oM A:hUM gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs la/ gser dngul lam zangs las byas pa bum pa lto ba
191b4(rgyud 'grel): yangs pa mgrin pa ring ba mchu 'phyang ba/ sman dang 'bru dang rin po che lnga dang ldan pa/ ras sar pas mgul la bcings pa/ ldum bcas lcug mas kha brgyan la/ sngar bsnyen pa byas pa'i dre'i chus gang ba slob dpon gyis yongs su bzung nas/ me long dri'i thig le
191b5(rgyud 'grel): lnga dang/ til mar thigs pa lnga dang/ me tog gi tshem bu lnga dang/ 'dag chal dang bcas pa'i pir? gyis sbyangs la/ bkra shis kyis tshigs su bcad pa dang/ rdza rnga la sogs pa rol mo'i sgra dang bcas pas sku khrus gsol bar bya'o/ /de la til mar gyi sngagS
191b6(rgyud 'grel): ni/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bi sho d+ha na ye swA hA/ dri'i sngags ni/ gan d+ha ma la ya swA hA/ dUr ba'i pir sngags ni/ oM ma lA saM sho d+ha ne swA hA/ de nas sku khrus gsol ba'i bstod dbyangs ni/ /gzugs kyi phung po rnam dag pa/ /nyon mongs gti mug spyod byed pa//
191b7(rgyud 'grel): me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis/ /dpal ldan sku'i khrus gsol lo/ /chor ba'i phung po rnam dag pa/ /nyon mongs nga rgyal sbyong ba yi/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis/ /dpal ldan yon tan dbang bskur ro/ /'du shes phung po rnam dag pa/ /nyon mongs 'dod chags spyod byed
192a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ /so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyis/ dpal ldan gsung gi dbang bskur ro/ /'du byed phung po rnam dag pa/ /nyon mongs phrag dog sbyong byed pa/ /bya ba nan tan ye shes kyis/ /dpal ldan phrin las dbang bskur ro/ /rnam shes phung po rnam dag
192a2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /nyon mongs zhe sdang spyod byed pa'i/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis/ /dpal ldan thugs kyi dbang bskur ro/ /ji ltar dam pa tog dkar dga' ldan nas/ /lha mdzas lhums nas bltams la khrus gsol lhar/ /sku gdung ring bsrel dri ma med par bcas
192a3(rgyud 'grel): sprul sku yid 'ong rnams la khrus gsol lo/ /zhes bya ba dang/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sun su pra tiSh+Thi ta swA hA/ zhes bya bas sran phye dang/ bag phye'i tshal dang/ yung ba dang/ 'bras yos dang/ til mar dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ 'o ma dang/ 'gan ta pa dang bcas pa sku gzung?
192a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid dam/ me long gi steng du btab la/ tsandan dang ga bur gyi dri'i thig le byas la/ me tog dang bcas pa la ku sha'i bir gyis bkru bar bya'o/ /de ltar sku la sogs pa lan gsum mam lnga lnga bkrus nas/ gos gtsang ma'i dris bgos pas sku phyis te/ de bzhin gshegs
192a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sku gzugs rnams la ni/ bla gos dang snam sbyang gsol bar bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gos sna tshogs pa dang/ khro bo rnams la ni gos sngon po dang/ dmar po dbul zhing bkra shis tshigs su bcad par gdon par bya'o/ /de la snam sbyar
192a6(rgyud 'grel): gsol bsang sngags ni/ oM di pa pra ba ye swA hA/ de la dri dbul ba'i sngags ni/ oM badzra gand+he swA hA/ de la byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa la rgyan dbul ba'i sngags ni/ oM A ba ra na b+hi bu Sha Ne swA hA/ de nas dkyil 'khor chen po spyan drangs la gtsug ?
192a7(rgyud 'grel): khang yin na/ /mdun nam phyogs su ma lo zhing drang bar sku gzugs mdzes par bkod la/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams gtso bo dang bcas pa mdun du der bstan la dkyil 'khor bsgrubs nas bdag dang gtso bo dang tha mi dad par bsgoms la pU dza bya'o/ /da ltar
192b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor/ pU dza rdzogs pa'i rjes la rab gnas kyi lha la pU dza lnga phul nas dam tshig sems dpa' i yi ge hUM gis gsal bar byas la/ ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te rgyud las 'byung ba'i phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab la dbang bskur nas dngos su
192b2(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pa'i sU dza lnga dang/ yid kyis sprul pa brgyad dang/ rig ma bcu drug gis mchod par bya'o/ /de la me tog dbul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa ni/ chu dang thab las skyes pa yi/ /me tog dam pa mchog 'di dag /mchog tu dar bas 'bul lags na/ /khyod kyis ci
192b3(rgyud 'grel): bder bzhes su gsol/ /oM badzra puShpa? a:hUM/ lhan cig skyes dang sbyar byung ba'i/ /lha rdzas dam pa'i bdug pa 'di/ /mchog tu dad pas 'bul lags na/ /khyed kyis ci bder gshes su gsol/ /oM badzra d+hu pe A:hUM/ lhan cig skyes dang sbyar byung pa'i/ /lha
192b4(rgyud 'grel): dang mi yi dri mchog 'di/ /mchog tu dad pas 'bul lags na/ /ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol/ /oM badzra gand+ha A:hUM/ bza' dang bca' pa phun tshogs pa'i/ /kha dog dri dang do ldan pa'i/ /thams cad 'byor pa'i zhal zas 'di/ /bdag gi 'bul gyis bzhes
192b5(rgyud 'grel): mu gsol/ /oM badzra nai be b+ha A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ sgeg mo la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa ni/ rdo rje rin chen bla na med/ /rdo rje chos kyi glu blangs pas/ /rdo rje las rnams byed par shog/ ces brjod cing/ badzra satwa su sang gra ha ta/ zhes pa la sogs pa glu blangs par
192b6(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor nas 'byung ba'i rig ma bcu drug gi phyag rgya dang bcas pas kyang mchod par bya'o/ /de nas gzugs rin chen sna bdun dang/ dpag bsam gyi shing dang/ buM pa bzang po dang/ 'dod 'dzo'i ba dang/ bkra shis kyi rdzas
192b7(rgyud 'grel): brgyad dang/ sgra rol mo cha byad bcu dang/ dri'i snod brgya 'am stong dam/ rol snod brgya'am steng dam/ reg bya res gzung stong dam/ tha ma yang spyir zung gcig dbul lo/ /de ltar 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad kyis mchod la/ sbyin sreg dang gtor ma byas
193a1(rgyud 'grel): nyin mo nyal nas/ phyi de nang bar nyi ma shar kar spyan dbye bar bya ste/ ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis/ /'jig rten ling tog bsal ba ltar/ /de bzhin rgyal ba rnams kyi spyan/ /sems can don du dbye bar bgyi/ /oM tsak+Shu tsak+Shu sa man+ta tsak+Shu bi shod+ha
193a2(rgyud 'grel): ne swA hA/ zhes bya bas gser la sogs pa'i thur mas spyan dbye bar bya'o/ /de nas snyan dbye bar bya ste/ gser la sogs pa'i rna 'bru thogs la/ 'gro rnams thos pas phongs gyur pa/ /rgyal bos chos kyi rnga brdungs ltar/ /de bzhin sems can don gyi phyir/ /rgyal ba'i
193a3(rgyud 'grel): snyan ni dbye bar bgyi/ /oM di bya kar+Na ye swAhA/ de nas shangs dbye bar bya ste/ gser la sogs pa'i smad tsher thogs te/ zag bcas phung po dri spangs pa'i/ /'gro ba'i sems can don bgyid phyir/ /rnam par dag pa dri rnyed ltar/ /rgyal ba'i shangs ni dbye bar bya/ /di bya
193a4(rgyud 'grel): g+ha Na ye swAhA/ de nas thur ma thog ? la zhal dbye bar bya ste/ 'gro ba thams cad tshim mdzad ltar/ /ro mchog brgya ldan zhal zas dam pa 'di/ /dbul phyir rgyal ba'i zhal ni dbye bar bya/ /oM dbye mu kha ye swA hA/ de nas sdu gri thogs la/ rab tu byung ba'i gzugs
193a5(rgyud 'grel): yin na/ skra bzhang ba ltar byas te/ ji ltar rang byung mchod rten drung/ /ston pas khyim pa'i rtags spangs ltar/ /'gro ba sems can don gyi phyir/ /khyim pa'i rtags rnams spang bar bya/ /snam sbyar dang/ sham thabs dang/ bla gos gsol nas/ ji ltar sman pa'i
193a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis/ /rgyal ba'i sku la na bza' gsol ba ltar/ /de bzhin 'gro ba rnams la phan bya'i phyir/ /ngo tsha khrel yod gos mchog gsol bar bgyi/ /oM di bya bstan ye swAhA/ chu tshags dang/ lhung bzed thogs la/ oM i na yugs pa ri kar ye swAhA/
193a7(rgyud 'grel): de nas thugs kar rdo rje bzung la/ mtshan dang dpe byang la sogs bskyed pa'i phyir/ /dung dang dpal be'u g.yung drung 'khyil pa dang/ /bkra shis rdzas brgyad dag gis rnam brgyan pa/ rgyal ba'i thugs la rnam par brgyan par shog /oM hwa? tri sha da mahA pu ru Sha ?
193b1(rgyud 'grel): Ni shi ti a nu byany+dza nA ya swAhA/ po ti dang glogs pa ma yin na yi ge A(rgyud 'grel): h+rI las rdo rje chos sam snang ba mdza' yas kyi skur bskyed pa 'am/ yang na yi ge brum las yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa 'am/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma/ phyag dang po
193b2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyag rgya 'dzin pa/ g.yas kyi gnyis pa na bgrang phreng /g.yon gyi gnyis pa na pad+ma'i steng na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam bsnams pa bskyed la/ ye shes sems dpa' bcug nas rgyas btab ste/ dbang bskur nas
193b3(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod la/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi na bza' gsol te/ rgya rim pa bdun gyis gdab ste yig 'bru'i rang bzhin du zhu bar bsam mo/ /de la na bza' dbul ba'i sngags ni/ dbyi ba sra ye swA hA/ na bza' i steng du mdud pa btang la/ spra tshil
193b4(rgyud 'grel): las sin d+hu ra'i rgyas btab la/ oM badzra mu dra ba na da ya a d+hi tiSh+Tha swAhA/ zhes brjod do/ /na bza' dbul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa ni/ byang chub yan lag rnam dag pa'i/ /dam chos gsung gi 'od zer gyis/ /na bza' dri ma med pa 'di/ /dam pa'i chos la dbul bar bya//
193b5(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod de/ mchod rten yin na/ rigs rnam pa lnga'i sprul pa'i sku bskyed la/ ye shes sems dpa' bcug nas/ rgyas btab cing dbang bskur nas/ mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod la/ mthar mchod rten gyi tshul du bzhugs pa la/ oM a ra dze bir dze swAhA/ zhes
193b6(rgyud 'grel): bya bas sa dkar gsol lo/ /oM ha ra myA ye swAhA/ zhes bya bas bre gzugs par bya'o/ /tsakra ba bar tsa ta mA ye swAhA/ zhes pas 'khor lo gzugs pa dang/ oM tshtsha traM ye swA hA/ zhes gdugs gzugs pa dang/ oM ku b+hi ra d+hwa dzA ye swAhA/ zhes pas chu srin gyi
193b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyal mtshan gzugs pa dang/ oM pa ta ka d+hwa dza ye swAhA/ zhes pas ba dan gzugs pa dang/ oM pa Ta laM bA ye swAhA/ zhes bya bas dar dbyangs gzugs pa dang/ oM puShpa? mA lA ye swAhA/ zhes bya bas me tog gi phreng ba gdags pa dang/ oM tsa ma dA ya
194a1(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ zhes pas rnga ? kyi g.yab bar bya'o/ byang chub sems dpa' i cha lugs yin na so mangs dang/ khab dang/ bslung bu dang/ gri dang/ chu gri rnams phul la/ 'gro ba sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /rig pa'i gnas lnga dag la bslab bya zhes
194a2(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar thugs dam rgya che ba zhes ba bzhin/ /mkho ba'i yo byang rnams ni dbul bar bya/ /oM A pa yu ka sa pa ri skar ye swA hA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ byang chub sems thun mong du rin po che sna bdan dang/ bkra shis gyi rdzas brgyad dang/ 'jig rten
194a3(rgyud 'grel): pa? bkra shis pa'i bil pa dang/ sta rkad da/ zho dang ras yug dkar po dang/ gdugs gser gyi lu ba can rnams dbul bar bya ste/ dang bor las thams cad pa'i chus bsangs la dri'i thig le dang/ me tog gi tshom bu bkod nas ji ltar mi dbang 'khor lo sgyu rang?
194a4(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /rin chen sna bdun tshogs dang bcas pa ltar/ /rgyal ba rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' la/ /rin chen sna bdun tshogs ni dbul bar bya/ /lha'i dbang po lha min g.yul rgyal nas/ /bkra shis lha mo brgyad kyis mchod par bgyis/ /rgyal pa rnams dang byang
194a5(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dpa' rnams/ /bkra shis rdzas brgyad dag gis mchod par bgyis/ /'jig rten khyim bdag rnams kyi dpal rnyed na/ /bil ba stad bum pa bzang dang bcas/ /mdun du bsngar nas bkra shis byed pa ltar/ /rgyal ba sras dang bcas la dbul bar
194a6(rgyud 'grel): bgyi/ /de nas 'byor pa yong na sbyin sreg bya'o/ /med na skyed bu dkar po gsum btsugs la/ /sa las byas pa'i snod gtsang mar/ dkar gsum dang/ mngar gsum gyi gzhi la sman sna tshogs btab ste/ /sbyin sreg gi me 'am/ rig pa'i me la yi ge brgya
194a7(rgyud 'grel): pa zlos shing bskol bar bya'o/ /de nas ? du dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha gshegs su gsol pa ni/ rdzogs sangs rgyas dang de yi sras/ /tshangs sogs lha yi tshogs rnams dang/ /gang dag cho ga ma tshang ba/ /de dag bzod pa mdzad par rigS//
194b1(rgyud 'grel): kun bzhi dang rgyas dang ni/ /yon bdag che la rab mdzad nas/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang/ /slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol/ /sa dang chu dang me rlung gis/ /ji srid bskal pa 'jig par ru/ /lha rnams kun gyi sku bzhugs la/ /de srid bcom ldan bsrung
194b2(rgyud 'grel): bar mdzod/ /thugs bzangs dgyes bar gyur pa yi/ /slob dpon slob mar bcas pa yi/ /bu dang tshi bo bsrung mdzad nas/ /rang gnas dge bar bshegs su gsol/ /de nas dam tshig sems dpa' rang la bsdu'o/ /de nas yon bdag dang slob dpon gnyis kas sku'i
194b3(rgyud 'grel): gdan khri nas bzung nas me tog gi phreng ba phul te/ ji srid ma dang chu dang ni/ /rlung gis bskal pa 'jig par du/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /bcom ldan khyod ni bzhugs par mdzod/ /de nas phyogs skyong dam/ /mahA kA la dang/ yul gyi bgegs la gtor mi byin
194b4(rgyud 'grel): la/ /'gro ba sems can don slar du/ /bder gshegs rnams ni bzhugs kyi bar/ /bdag dang gzhan gyi don gyi phyir/ /sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan bsrung bar mdzad/ /ces bya ba dang/ bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje la yang mchod pa phul la/ bde bar gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i
194b5(rgyud 'grel): sku/ bsrung bar zhal gyis bzhes pas/ ji srid bcom ldan 'das bzhugs kyi bar du bsrung bar mdzad du gsol/ zhes brjod pa dang /rab tu bsrung ba'i gnas brtan dang/ khyim pa'i gtso bo rnams la yang/ snyigs ma lnga'i dus kyi sprul pa'i sku ni 'di yin gyis/ 'di
194b6(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyis ma nyams par bsrungs zhes brjod par bya la/ lugs ma 'am/ ras ris sam/ po ti yin na/ na bza' bzang po drangs la/ shing rta las bskyon nas dri'i thig le byas te/ 'gro ba rnams dad par bya ba'i phyir grong khyer rnams bskor bar bya'o/ /yon gyi bdag
194b7(rgyud 'grel): po rnams kyang glu dang/ gang dang/ brgyan gdags pa dang/ bkra shis pa rnams byed do/ /de la rab gnas kyi dus ni/ dpyid zlar ba 'am 'bring po 'am/ zhes pa nas/ skye dang skye ba 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes pa'i bar de/ rgyu dang mthun no/ /gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa
195a1(rgyud 'grel): la/ /bstan pa'i snying po ma nus pas/ /rnal 'byor so so'i mos pa yis/ /'dzam gling 'di ru sprul pa'i sku/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/ /lugs sku la sogs gzugs brnyan la/ /rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga ni/ byas pas sprul sku thob
195a2(rgyud 'grel): par shog /rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga /rab gnas kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bzhugs// //rgya gar skad du/ badzra d+hA tu mahA maN+Da la lo pa i ka sarba badzrod ya nA ma pi Na DArtha/ bod
195a3(rgyud 'grel): skad du/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rdo rje thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i don bsdus pa/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gi lus ngag yid dag rnam dag pas/ /bdud kyi 'tshe ba go skabs ma mdzad cing/ /bsod nams
195a4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs dang de bzhin ye shes te/ /de gnyis rab rdzogs rgyu dngos 'gro phan mdzad/ /skye pa gcig gis thogs dang srid mdza' ba/ /legs bgrod de nas rang gi sems rtogs pa/ /sngon 'gro mngon par byang chub rin bzang pos/ /chos rgyal nyid brnyes byams
195a5(rgyud 'grel): pa la sogs phyir/ /dkyil 'khor sprul mdzad phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor ba/ /rang gi rnam par thar pas yang dag par/ /'gro ba gdul phyir bsdus shing las la bzhag /rnam par bya ba khyab pa bsdus pas rnam 'phrul bstan/ /de nas 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan
195a6(rgyud 'grel): mi rnams la/ /phan phyir ji bzhin cho ga bzang bo yis/ /tshon gyi dkyil 'khor skyon med ston mdzad pa/ /bdag dang gzhan don phun gsum gnas brnyes pa/ /dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' rnams 'dren pa/ /rnal 'byor rgyud kyi dbang phyug bdag phyag 'tshal//
195a7(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni go rims nges pa tsam/ /gtso bor bya la gzhol pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga mchog 'di yi/ don bsdus bdag nyid dran phyir bri/ /gang du rnam par rmongs pa'i gnas/ /der ni tshig don 'ga' zhig brjod/ /gzhan du blo gros ngan pa rnams/ /sgra tsam la
195b1(rgyud 'grel): yang log par rtogs/ /deng gsang sngags kyi theg pa mchog /yi ge'i don gyis rnam dkrugs shing/ /bla ma gcig nas gcig 'ongs pa'i/ /man ngag rim la gus dang bral/ /de phyir bla ma'i man ngag gis/ /'di'i snying po cung zad bri/ /'dir slob dpon gyi zhal sdams?
195b2(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi lugs kyis slob ma dbang bskur te/ tshe 'di nyid la dga' ba dang bde ba'i mchog gi mthar thug pa 'thob pa la sogs pa'i dgos pa gzigs nas/ dkyil 'khor cho ga rgyas pa bsdu pa bzhed pas/ phyag 'tshal dngos po thams cad
195b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher smos pa mdzad do/ /de la 'dir ci'i phyir phyag btsal zhe na/ bdag nyid dam pa'i spyod pa can du bstan pa'i phyir dang/ 'di'i sgrub bar bya ba dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la dang pa ni legs pa thams cad 'thob pa'i rgyu yin pas
195b4(rgyud 'grel): gzhan de la dang ba bskyed ba'i phyir dang/ bgegs zhi bar bya ba'i yang phyir ro/ /de la phyag bcal ba ni 'dud pa ste skad kyi byings las de skad du bstan pas so/ /rab kyi sgra ni mchog tu gyur pa ste de yang lus dang ngag dang yid thams cad kyis gus pa nye bar
195b5(rgyud 'grel): gnas pas so/ /de'i phyir dngos po thams cad kyis zhes pa ste/ lus ngag yid thams cad kyis so/ /gzhan dag 'dir rigs spyi dang khyad par gyi phyag 'tshal pa lnga ni dngos po thams cad kyis zhes zer na/ 'di slob dpon gyi de kho na ltar mdzad ces grub par
195b6(rgyud 'grel): mi nus pas btags pa tsam du zad do/ /su zhig la phyag 'tshal zhe na/ rdor sems khyab bdag chen po la/ zhes pa ste/ rdo rje zab mo'i cha brjod pa ste/ 'dir bskal pa grangs pa de snyed du spros pa'i tshogs bor te shin tu brtan pa dang/ 'phel 'grib ?
195b7(rgyud 'grel): byas pa'i rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes ni rdo rje ste/ dang po'i bye brag ma lus pa 'gegs pas nor bu rin po che rdo rje dang 'dra ba'i phyir ro/ /de ltar na/ bskal pa du mar rab goms byas pa yi/ /rgyu dang rigs pa'i tshul dang sa la mkhas/ /gang gis
196a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dus byas grong khyer rnam 'jig pa/ /ye shes rdo rje brtan de 'phags bdag stsol/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de yang blo bur pa'i dri ma rnams bsal ba kho nar zad kyi/ rang gi ngo bo nyid thog ma nas rdo rje lta bu mi phyed pas na/ rab tu brtan
196a2(rgyud 'grel): zhing dus gsum du mi 'gyur bar gnas pas sems dpa' ste/ sems dpa' sngon dang tha ma med/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /'di ni rang 'byung bcom ldan 'das/ /gcig pu rab tu phye ba'i lha/ /zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/ /de ltar thob
196a3(rgyud 'grel): ma dang tha ma med pa'i phyir/ 'di ni sems can gyi gnas skabs na yang brtan pa/ sems can kun gyi sems gang yin/ /rdo rje zhes ni bshad pa ste/ /brtan pa'i phyir na dpa' zhes brjod/ /ces gsungs shing/ de nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
196a4(rgyud 'grel): ngo bo sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang de las lhag par ma gyur pas na/ rnam pa kun mkhyen ye shes ni/ /de 'dir rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /bstan pa'i phyir na dpa' zhes bya zhes gsungs so/ de ltar na 'di ni chos sku'i ngo bo can te/ bsgribs pa dang
196a5(rgyud 'grel): ma bsgribs pa'i lus ngag tu yang rang gi bdag nyid la 'bri ba dang/ 'phel ba spangs pas mi 'gyur ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung ma byung yang rung ste/ chs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de bzhin du gnas pa'o zhes gsungs pa
196a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin no/ /de ltar chos kyi sku'i dbang las gzugs kyi sku dpe med pa 'byung ba ni rgya che ba ste/ ji skad du/ rgyal bas chos nyid lus med rab zhi ba/ /gnyis med rang bzhin med pa thugs chud nas/ /gzugs sku bzang po mtshan gyis brgyan pa yis/ /
196a7(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba ma lus bkang zhing ston par mdzad/ /ces gsungs pas so/ /de ltar de lta bur thams cad du khyab pa ni khyab bdag ste brtan pa dang g.yo ba thams cad du snang ba ston pas shin tu rgya cher gyur to/ /de ltar zab pa rgya che ba 'di ni ji skad du/ /mtshan
196b1(rgyud 'grel): yang dag par brjod pa las/ /mi 'gyur kun 'gro khyab pa bo/ /zhes gsungs pas gsal bor mdzad do/ /de lta bu ni byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu pa'i bkod pas kyang bsgrin du med pas na chen po'i sgre yis bstan pa ste/ rang bzhin dang/ las dang/ rgyu dag ?
196b2(rgyud 'grel): na 'di chen po yang yin la khyab bdag kyang yin pas na chen po khyab bdag go/ de ltar zab pa dang rgya che ba'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen bo la phyag 'tshal nas da 'dir ci zhig byed ce na/ dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad bya ste/ /rdo rje thams cad 'byung dge ba /
196b3(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba smos te/ 'dis ni 'dir rtog ba dang ldan pa dag 'jug pa'i yan lag du gyur pa dgos pa dang thabs phul du byung ba dag bstan te/ re zhig dang bo nyid du 'di la brjod par bya ba khyad par can med de/ smyon pa'i tshig las dur khrod dang ri rtsa nyams tshig
196b4(rgyud 'grel): dga' bar yul gyi bzab mo dang grad pa med pa lta bu'o snyam du sems dpa' dgag pa'i phyir/ dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bshad bya ste/ zhes bya ba smos te/ 'di na sngags kyi theg pa 'di las dkyil 'khor ni rab tu grags pas khyab pa'i dngos po'i stobs bo mas shing
196b5(rgyud 'grel): skyes bu'i 'dod pa tsam gyis ma phye ba yin la/ de dang mthun pa'i brjod pa dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bshad par bya'o/ /zhes dam bca' pa ni snying la 'bab pas na snyon pa'i tshig las 'phags pas na 'di la brjod par bya ba yod dam zhes rtog par 'gyur gyi 'di ni
196b6(rgyud 'grel): mi 'tsham pa'i ngag go zhes zlog pa'i yan lag ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /'dir brjod par bya ba de yang gang zhig yin/ dkyil 'khor ni 'di na rab tu mang ste 'di las phyi rol tu gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor yang yod la/ de ni sngags kyi rgyud las bkag ste/ kha
196b7(rgyud 'grel): cig lha gzhan gyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pas/ ngan song gi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa de dag ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pas so/ /yang 'di na bya ba'i rgyud las rab tu sdug bsngal pa'i dka' thub rten par bya ba'i dkyil 'khor yod la 
197a1(rgyud 'grel): de yang 'dod par bya ba ma yin te rnam par g.yeng bas nang gi rnal 'byor dang 'gal zhing gcig tu sdug bsngal bas na mi 'dod la/ de yang dpal mchog dang po las bkag ste/ dka' thub spyad pa mi zad pas/ /sems g.yeng gyur
197a2(rgyud 'grel): nas mi 'grub bo/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher bstan pas so/ /de bzhin du 'di na kha cig de gzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs te gsungs pa khong du mchud pas bud med brten pa la sogs pa sgra ji bzhin par 'dzin cing bud med brten pa'i dkyil 'khor
197a3(rgyud 'grel): dag yod la/ de yang 'dod pa ma yin te/ rdo rje rtse mo la sogs pa'i rgyud las ring du spangs pa'i phyir ro/ /des na 'di la brjod par bya ba yod kyang brjod par bya ba khyad par can ma yin nam zhes bzlog pa srid pas na de dgag pa'i phir/ rdo rje thams
197a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur zhes bya ba smos te/ rdo rje dbyings nas ji srid rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar du lha sum cu rtsa bdun snyed ni thams cad rdo rje'i ming gis mtshan pas na rdo rje ste/ de rnams ma lus pa brjod pa ni thams cad de/ 'di thams cad kyang yin la rdo rje yang yin
197a5(rgyud 'grel): bsan thams cad rdo rje'o/ /de rnams kyi 'byung pa ni ji ltar bskyed pa dang byin gyis brlab pa dang/ mchod pa dang/ bzlas brjod bya ba'i thabs kyi rin pa phyin ci ma log par 'byung bar byed ston par byed la gsal bar byed ces pa'i bar du ste/
197a6(rgyud 'grel): des ni the tshom las bzlog pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad bsal bas/ thun mong ma yin pa'i dkyil 'khor nges par bzung bas 'jug tu rung bar byas so/ /de ltar bstan pas brjod par bya ba yod du zin kyang brjod par bya ba bstan
197a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gzhung 'di la don byed pa khyad par can ci yang med pas 'di mi brtsam ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyis rtsa ba'i rgyud las dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bshad zin la/ gdul bya chen po dag gis ni ri rab kyi rtse mor dkyil
197b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor sprul pa mthong zin pas na de'i cho ga mi dgos so zhe na/ de'i phyir sngar bshad bya ste/ zhes bya ba smos te/ gdul bya chen po dag lam yin yang/ phyis 'byung ba'i skye bo phal la dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dgos shing/ de yang bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang
197b2(rgyud 'grel): gis ni zur tsam zhig bstan pas na blo gros chung ngu'i skye bo dag gis gal rtogs/ de bas na de ni ma bshad pa dang 'dra ste/ don bya ba la mthu che ba ma yin pas so/ slob dpon gyi zhal snga nas 'dir de gsal zhing rdzogs par rnam par phye bas the tshom
197b3(rgyud 'grel): med par bya ste/ de na dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bde blag du rtogs par byas pa ni 'di rtsom pa'i dgos pa ste/ 'di bya rog gi so brtag pa'i bstan bcos lta bu ma yin no/ /kha cig 'di la 'bral pa med par the tshom za bas brjod bya de 'dis brjod par byed
197b4(rgyud 'grel): dam ci ma yin zhes rtogs pa srid na 'di la 'brel pa yod de/ gang zhig gang med na mi 'byung la gang yod na 'byung ba de ni rgyu dang 'bras bur 'khrul pa med cing 'di las gzhan gyis ji ltar yang rdo rje thams cad bstan pa 'byung ba gsal por rtogs pa
197b5(rgyud 'grel): mi 'byung la/ 'di las ni pas par de 'byung bas 'di dag thabs dang/ de las 'byung bar des pas de nyid las byung ba'i 'brel pa'o/ /des na 'jog po'i gtsug gi nor bu blangs pa'i yon tan gyi snyan dang gis? ltar 'di nus pa med pa'i ngo bo ma
197b6(rgyud 'grel): yin no/ /de'i mtshan nyid khong du chud pas kyang ci zhig bya/ ma dag mang blangs pa'i rim pa'i man ngag la brjod par bya ba dang dgos pa dang 'brel pa yod kyang de 'dod par bya ba ma yin no zhe na/ de bsal ba'i phyir dge ba'i zhes bya ba smos te/ 'dir
197b7(rgyud 'grel): de dag gi mtshan nyid bde blag tu rtogs nas 'jug par byed pa ni thun mong dang khyad par gyi dngos grub rnams thob pas dge zhing don yod par 'gyur te de mi 'chad par 'gyur ba las/ rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' mchog /dngos grub thamS
198a1(rgyud 'grel): cad sbyin mdzad pa// zhes gsungs so/ /de bas na 'di na 'di mngon par mtho ba dang legs pa thams cad 'byung bas na dgos pa'i dgos pa grub bo/ /de ltar don mdza' dag la the tshom bskyed pa ni 'jug pa'i yan lag ste/ 'di na
198a2(rgyud 'grel): mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can don med par the tshom bskyed pa ni bzlog par byed de /dug tu the tshom za ba la ni longs spyod pa las ldog la/ zhing pa la sogs pa don yod par the tshom za ba ni 'jug par byed de/ dngos po'i stobs kyis zhugs pa
198a3(rgyud 'grel): 'di de kho na ltar bya ba byas par 'gyur gyi mi bya ba byas par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /de ltar 'di la rtog ba dang ldan pa dag 'jug pa'i yan lag du gyur pa'i brjod par bya ba dang/ dgos pa dang/ thabs dang /dgos pa'i dgos ba dag brjod cing
198a4(rgyud 'grel): mthar thug pa'i go 'phangs sgrub par bya ba dgos pa'i dgos par rtogs pa yang zur gyis bstan nas/ da ni 'dir dkyil 'khor cho ga gshad par bya ste/ zhes bya ba las glengs te dkyil 'khor ni ji lta bu/ de ji snyed ci gci'i phyir de skad ces bya
198a5(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba bsams pa dang/ cho ga ni ji lta bu cho ga'i sgo don gang zhes pa 'dir brjod de/ gzhung 'di'i brjod par bya ba ni 'di tsam du zad do/ /de la 'dir dkyil 'khor zhes bya ni rnam bar mi rtog pa'i rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings te de ni snying por
198a6(rgyud 'grel): gyur pas so/ /de ltar ni/ yan lag kun las rnam grol zhing/ /dbyangs dang yi ge rnam bral ba/ /'dren dang chog las yang dag 'das/ /'di ni dkyil 'khor mchog ces gsungs so/ /de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings de ji lta bar rtogs pa rnam par
198a7(rgyud 'grel): mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyang dkyil 'khor te/ 'di lta bu yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te/ sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub sems/ /bla na med pa rtogs gyur pa/ /rgyal bas gsungs pa'i ye shes gang/ /de ni dkyil 'khor snying por
198b1(rgyud 'grel): gsungs zhes so/ /de bzhin du sngon gyi smon lam dang tshogs kyi mthus yul dang dus dang der de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gzugs kyi sku'i bkod pa dpe med pa snang ba yang dkyil 'khor te/ sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil
198b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor thams cad bya ba gsungs pas so/ /de nyid ni sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ste/ gdul bya'i ngor nges pa med par sna tshogs par sprul pa'i phyir ro/ /'di la rnam par smin pa'ang med pa ma yin te/ yun ring du shin tu goms par byas pa laS
198b3(rgyud 'grel): byung ba'i phyir te/ rang gi mi mthun pa'i phyogs de dang de rnam par spangs pas brnyes pa'o/ /'on kyang 'di ni rtog pa'i lam du gyur pa dkon la/ sna tshogs par snang ba ni mos pas sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor gcig kyang sna tshogs par brjod do/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor de dag
198b4(rgyud 'grel): ni 'bras bu'i ngo bor grub pas 'bras bu'i dkyil 'khor zhes rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi lugs kyis bstan to/ /de bzhin du rnal 'byor pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba tha mal pa'i rnam par rtog pa las grol ba ting nge 'dzin khyad par can 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs
198b5(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams kyi gzugs kyi sku dang rab tu 'dra bar bsgoms pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di ni ji lta bar sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ste/ rnam pa 'dra bar mos pa'i phyir dang/ de'i 'bras bu la rgyu de ji lta bar sbyor ba'i phyir ro/ /gang du sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor de rjes su
198b6(rgyud 'grel): dran pa'i rten gyur pa dang/ rnam par 'dra 'ang rung ste/ rdul tshon dang bris skur byas pa la sogs pa yang ji lta bar sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis tha mal pa'i gnas skabs kyi chos kyi dbyings dag pa ma yin pa dang /
198b7(rgyud 'grel): bdag med pa gnyis la gzhol ba'i shes rab dang ting nge 'dzin yang dkyil 'khor zhes bya ste/ 'bras bu nye bar brtags pa las gnod pa med pas so/ /de ltar de dag ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i 'bras bu'i dkyil 'khor 'thob pa'i thabs kyi dngos po'i phyir na
199a1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor te/ ji skad du dkyil ni snying po'o/ /'khor ni len pa'o zhes rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyud las gsungs pa bzhin no/ /de ltar de dag ni rgyus bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor du brjod do/ /de ltar byas na dkyil
199a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi sa dang/ de'i rgyu rigs dang lam gyi bdag nyid 'di tsam zhig la bya'o/ /de'i rnam par dbye pa yang ji ltar bstan pa'i phyogs las rnam pa bdun te/ rgyas par dbye ba la ni tshad med do/ /de'i ming gi don kyang snying po 'dzin
199a3(rgyud 'grel): bar byed pa zhes bye brag med par byas te/ yang bye brag tu na 'bras bu ni de'i rang bzhin 'dzin bas snying po nyid 'dzin pa zhes bya ba 'am/ snying po yang yin la 'dzin pa yang yin pas snying po 'dzin pa zhes bsdu'o/ /rgyu ni snying po'i phyir 'dzin pa 'am/
199a4(rgyud 'grel): snying po len pa zhes bsdu'o/ /de ltar na 'dir 'bras bu'i dkyil 'khor ni thabs las byung ba yin la/ rgyu'i bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor ni de thob pa'i thabs phul du byung pa yin pas 'di dag thabs dang thabs las byung pa'i 'brel pa khyad par can dang
199a5(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa ste/ 'bras bus kyang 'gro ba mdza' dag la ji srid nam mkha' gnas pa de srid du phan pa dang bde ba bsgrubs pas 'di'i 'bras bu'i 'bras bu ste/ rgyu'i rjes la bdag po'i yu bla dag nyid/ /'bras bu'i stobs kyis dgra las rnam par rgyal zhes pa
199a6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ gzhan don phun tshogs sangs rgyas kyi/ /'bras bu'i gtso bor 'dod pa ste/ /sangs rgyas nyid sogs de las gzhan/ /de yi don gyi 'bras bur 'dod ces gsungs pas so/ /de lta bas na gzhung 'di'i brjod par bya ba dkyil 'khor yin la/
199a7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor de yang rgyu dang 'bras bus sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i don du 'gyur bas 'di don chen por nye bar gnas pa'i phyir 'bad pas bshad par rigs so zhes bya ba ni lam dang 'bras bu'i go rims so/ /de khong du
199b1(rgyud 'grel): rgud par byed pa'i rim pa'i gzhung ni 'dir chog zhes bya ste/ nye bar khrid bas na thabs yin la/ thabs de yang 'di la yod pas na thams can te/ dkyil 'khor gyi don mdza' dag khong du chud par byed pa la blo 'khrid pa'i thabs zab mo dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'i
199b2(rgyud 'grel): don to/ /'on kyang 'dir dkyil 'khor mdza' dag ma bstan pas na gtsor ni rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zung la gzhan dag gi cho ga yang shugs las go bar bya'o/ /da ni slob dpon gyi zhal snga nas dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bsdu bar bya ba la su zhig snod
199b3(rgyud 'grel): du gyur pa yin pa de bstan pa'i phyir/ de la dam tshig la sogs pa thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i phyir/ 'phags pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rgyud chen po'i cho gas dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga kun las btu bar bya'o zhes smos te/ gzhan du na cho ga mi 'grub ces dgongs
199b4(rgyud 'grel): la/ kho bos cho ga kun las btus pa brtsams pa yang don med ces dgongs pa'o/ /'dir dam tshig la sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgra ni dbang bskur bar bsdu'o/ /'di na dam tshig la sogs pa thob pa de dag nyid kyi dngos grub kyi phyir bsnyen pa byed pa yang rung/ slob
199b5(rgyud 'grel): ma mngon par dbang bskur ba'i phyir bsnyems pa'ang rung ste/ bsnyems pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa'i cho ga ni ji lta bu/ slob ma dbang bskur ba'i cho ga ji lta bu zhes rtog pa la/ dang po bsnyen pa'i cho ga gsungs pas de'i go rims brjod de/ 'di na thog ma
199b6(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i dus nas byas pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi spyod pa phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang ting nge 'dzin 'grub pa la bar du gcod pa'i sgrub pa bsal ba'i phyir/ dang por re zhig bdag med pa la lhag par mos pas nang bdag nyid can gyi khrus byas la zhes bya
199b7(rgyud 'grel): ba la sogs pas lus ngag yid gsum rnam par dag par bya'o/ /'jig rten 'di ni sems kyi khrid ces bya ba la sogs pa'i theg pa chen po 'dir sems gtso bor gyur pas de sbyang ba sngar bstan cing/ ngag gi nyes pa ni sgrub sla bas lus can rnams la
200a1(rgyud 'grel): rab tu med ba'i phyir dang/ 'dir bzlas brjod las gtsor dngos grub kyi mtshan ma 'dod pa'i dbang du byas pa'i phyir de'i 'og tu ngag sbyar bar bstan to/ /mtshan nyid de gnyis las bzlog pa ni lus yin pas thams cad kyis mjug
200a2(rgyud 'grel): tu'o/ /lus dang ngag dang yid rnam par dag pa'i sgrub pa po la bdud kyi klags su gyur pa spang ba'i phyir bsrung ba'i bya ba ni/ de nas yi ge hUM las rdo rje 'bar ba nyi ma'i me lta bur bdag nyid sprul te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ji srid badzra band+ha baM zhes pa'o
200a3(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i bar du smos pa'o/ /skabs 'di la bsam par bya ba 'ga' yod de/ cis na bsrung ba'i cho ga gzhan ston par byed/ rtsa ba'i rgyud nyid las ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i mtshan tsam zhig /dran nam nyan bar byed kyang rung/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pas
200a4(rgyud 'grel): rigs so so'i bsrung ba gsungs pa ma yin nam/ de lta bu rang gi cho ga nges pa bor nas 'dir bsrung ba gzhan ston 'di ni mi 'tsham mo zhe na/ bden mod kyi 'on kyang nyes pa med de/ 'di na gang zag gnyis te rang gi bya ba tsam sems shing mchog tu
200a5(rgyud 'grel): mnyam par bzhag pa nang gi bdag nyid la lhag par gzhal ba'i rnal 'byor pa dang/ de las gzhan pa dkyil 'khor chen po spros pa la gzhug pas slob ma'i don byed pa'o/ /de la dang po'i dbang du byas nas ni rtsa ba'i rgyud las nang gi byed pa'i
200a6(rgyud 'grel): bsrung ba tshogs med pa bstan te/ de ni chos bsdams pas de tsam gyis bsrung bar 'gyur la/ 'dir ni gtso cher dkyil 'khor chen po'i spros pa la bzhugs pa'i rdo rje slob dpon gyi dbang du byas pas nang dang phyi rol gi bgegs ldang ba rab tu
200a7(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i phyir/ sngags dang phyag rgya mchog tu mi zad par drag cing rno ba dag gis bsrung ba chen po bya dgos pas nyes pa med do/ /yang na 'di srung ba 'di ste bu yang yod ces rnam grangs la mkhas par bya ba'i phyir te/ rang gi rgyud kyi bsrung ba
200b1(rgyud 'grel): yang sun mi 'byin pas so/ /gzhan dag na de bdag bsrung ba bsgoms ba 'di'i nang du mngon bar sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du 'gro bar mi bya'o/ /zhes dam bcas pa la gnas pa'i bsrung ba ni dang po ste 'di'o/ /phyis thun mtshams dag la ni nang gi bsrung
200b2(rgyud 'grel): ba tsam zhes zer na 'di ni ma yin te/ bsrung ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rgya che bar gyur pas 'gro ba bgegs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /'dir su yis bsrung ba ji ltar bsrung dgos pa gang zhig mthong zhe na/ rdo rje 'bar ba nyi ma'i me lta bur bdag nyid sprul
200b3(rgyud 'grel): te zhes bya ba ni srung ba lo stwaM/ nyi ma'i me ni mas 'jig pa'i dus kyi nyi ma bdun shar bas thams cad me'i phung por 'bar bar gyur pa ste de dang 'dra ba po/ /tshig phyi ma 'di kho nas rdo rje 'bar ba zhes bya ba 'di bstan te/ rdo rje'i rang bzhin 'od 'bar ba
200b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i don to/ /'di'i mtshan nyid ni 'phags pa ngan song thams cad sbyong ba'i rgyud las gsungs so/ /khyad par du na yi ge hUM las byung ba dang dbang bskur zhing cho ga byas la/ rang gi sngags zlos bas bgegs gzhom mo/ /de la dbang bskur ba ni
200b5(rgyud 'grel): khro bo ti rin ti ri'i zhes bya ba rdo rje 'bar ba nyi ma'i me lta bu nyid de de nyid gyi phyag rgyas 'di la dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de nas de la rdo rje phyed ma'i 'dug stangs kyis 'dug ste/ rdo rje ti rin ti ri'i bcings la rdo rje phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba blang ngo zhes bya ba ni rdo
200b6(rgyud 'grel): rje byed ma'i 'dug stangs nye rdo rje skyil mo krung phyed mar 'dug la'o/ /rdo rje phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba ni rgyud phyi ma las rigs so so'i dbang bskur ba bstan pa las/ rdo rje rigs la rdo rje phreng ba mgo la bcings pas dbang bskur bar bsrungs pas na 'dir
200b7(rgyud 'grel): yang de bzhin te/ khro bo 'di ni rdo rje rigs su byung bas so/ /gzhan dag khro bo ti rin ti ri zhes bya ba rdo rje 'bar ba las gzhan du 'dod pa de mi 'thad de/ oM badzra dzwa lA na lArka hUM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mA zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis byin gyis brlabs pa'i ti rin 
201a1(rgyud 'grel): ti ri'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur ba na phyag rgya dang sngags tha dad pa phan tshun byin gyis rlab par mi 'gyur ba'i nyes pa yod pa dang/ 'phags pa ngan song thams cad yongs su spyod par yang khro bo nyi ma'i me'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa
201a2(rgyud 'grel): na khro bo ti rin ti ri bcings zhes 'di nyid bstan pa dang/ de bzhin du dkyil 'khor gang du gang zhig gtso bor gyur ba de'i phyag rgyas 'jug par bstan pa'o/ /de la go cha bya ba ni oM TuM zhes bya ba'i yi ge gnyis kyi go chas go cha byas la zhes bya ba ni
201a3(rgyud 'grel): 'chad par byed la/ de'i rjes la oM TuM zhes bya ba dang/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis snying gar mdud pa bcing pa'i tshul gyis go cha bgo bar bya zhing/ de bzhin du mgrin pa dang/ ltag pa dang/ snying ga dang/ nu ma'i bar dang/ yang snying ga dang/ mgrin
201a4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ rgyab dang/ dpral ba'i steng du mdud pa dar dbyangs bcing ba'i tshul du bya ste/ sgeg pa dang bcas pas mdza' ma nas brtsams la bkrol te/ mthar mnyam pa'i thal mo dang/ badzra tu Sh+ye ho zhes bya bas mnyes par zhes bshad la go chab go
201a5(rgyud 'grel): ba 'di ni rgyas par rnal 'byor gyi rgyud gzhan las kyang gsungs te/ rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor bas/ /ji lta'i tshul bzhin byed pa yis/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /go cha bgo pa'i tshul du bya/ /spyi po dang ni dpral bar gnyis/ /glo
201a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis dang ni rgyab tu gnyis/ /rdo rje phreng bas bcings pa dang/ /sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu dag /dang cing thabs su bcing nas ni/ /'gying dang bcas pas mdza' nas dgrol/ /dar dbyangs pa'i thabs byas nas/ /thal mo brdabs pas brtan
201a7(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /'di yis bsrung ba byas nas ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal dang 'dra/ /mi chod pa dang mi phyed pa'i/ /rdo rje'i sku ni rab tu 'grub/ /rims dang dug dang dbyig dug nang/ /mkha' 'gros gtses dang gdon rnams dang/ /yan lag mdungs byed
